average_utils.f90       coverage:  100.00 %func     57.64 %block

     1) !==========================================================================================!
     2) !==========================================================================================!
     3) !     This module contains sub-routines used to create the averaged output variables.      !
     4) !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
     5) module average_utils
     6) 
     7)    !=======================================================================================!
     8)    !=======================================================================================!
     9) 
    10) 
    11)    contains
    12) 
    13) 
    14) 
    15)    !=======================================================================================!
    16)    !=======================================================================================!
    17)    !                           |----------------------------------|                        !
    18)    !                           |** FREQUENT AVERAGE SUBROUTINES **|                        !
    19)    !                           |----------------------------------|                        !
    20)    !=======================================================================================!
    21)    !=======================================================================================!
    22)    !     The following subroutine finds the polygon averages from site-, patch-, and       !
    23)    ! cohort-level properties that have fmean variables associated.                         !
    24)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
    25)    subroutine aggregate_polygon_fmean(cgrid)
    26)       use ed_state_vars         , only : edtype             & ! structure
    27)                                        , polygontype        & ! structure
    28)                                        , sitetype           & ! structure
    29)                                        , patchtype          ! ! structure
    30)       use grid_coms             , only : nzg                ! ! intent(in)
    31)       use consts_coms           , only : wdns               & ! intent(in)
    32)                                        , t00                ! ! intent(in)
    33)       use therm_lib             , only : uextcm2tl          & ! subroutine
    34)                                        , uint2tl            & ! subroutine
    35)                                        , idealdenssh        & ! function
    36)                                        , press2exner        & ! function
    37)                                        , extheta2temp       ! ! function
    38)       use soil_coms             , only : tiny_sfcwater_mass & ! intent(in)
    39)                                        , soil               & ! intent(in)
    40)                                        , dslz               ! ! intent(in)
    41)       use ed_max_dims           , only : n_pft              ! ! intent(in)
    42) 
    43) 
    44)       implicit none
    45)       !----- Arguments.      --------------------------------------------------------------!
    46)       type(edtype)         , target  :: cgrid
    47)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
    48)       type(polygontype)    , pointer :: cpoly
    49)       type(sitetype)       , pointer :: csite
    50)       type(patchtype)      , pointer :: cpatch
    51)       real, dimension(nzg)           :: cgrid_fmean_soil_hcap
    52)       integer                        :: ipy
    53)       integer                        :: isi
    54)       integer                        :: ipa
    55)       integer                        :: ico
    56)       integer                        :: k
    57)       integer                        :: nsoil
    58)       real                           :: site_area_i
    59)       real                           :: poly_area_i
    60)       real                           :: poly_lai
    61)       real                           :: poly_wai
    62)       real                           :: poly_nplant
    63)       real                           :: site_wgt
    64)       real                           :: patch_wgt
    65)       real                           :: skin_energy
    66)       real                           :: skin_water
    67)       real                           :: skin_hcap
    68)       real                           :: skin_fliq
    69)       real                           :: dslzsum_i
    70)       real                           :: can_exner
    71)       real                           :: atm_exner
    72)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
    73) 
    74) 
    75) 
    76) 
    77) 
    78)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
    79)       !   WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! WARNING! !
    80)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
    81)       !     Please, don't initialise polygon-level (cgrid) variables outside polyloop.     !
    82)       ! This works in off-line runs, but it causes memory leaks (and crashes) in the       !
    83)       ! coupled runs over the ocean, where cgrid%npolygons can be 0 if one of the sub-     !
    84)       ! -domains falls entirely over the ocean.  Thanks!                                   !
    85)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
    86)       ! cgrid%blah = 0. !<<--- This is a bad way of doing, look inside the loop for the
    87)       !                 !      safe way of initialising the variable.
    88)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
    89)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
    90)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
    91) 
    92)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
    93)          !     This is the right and safe place to initialise polygon-level (cgrid) vari-  !
    94)          ! ables, so in case npolygons is zero this will not cause memory leaks.  I know,  !
    95)          ! this never happens in off-line runs, but it is quite common in coupled runs...  !
    96)          ! Whenever one of the nodes receives a sub-domain where all the points are over   !
    97)          ! the ocean, ED will not assign any polygon in that sub-domain, which means that  !
    98)          ! that node will have 0 polygons, and the variables cannot be allocated.  If you  !
    99)          ! try to access the polygon level variable outside the loop, then the model       !
   100)          ! crashes due to segmentation violation (a bad thing), whereas by putting the     !
   101)          ! variables here both the off-line model and the coupled runs will work, because  !
   102)          ! this loop will be skipped when there is no polygon.                             !
   103)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   104)          ! cgrid%blah(ipy) = 0. ! <<- This way works for all cases. 
   105)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   106) 
   107) 
   108)          !----- Inverse of this polygon area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
   109)          poly_area_i = 1./sum(cpoly%area)
   110)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   111) 
   112)          !----- Re-set some support variables. --------------------------------------------!
   113)          poly_lai                 = 0.0
   114)          poly_wai                 = 0.0
   115)          poly_nplant              = 0.0
   116)          cgrid_fmean_soil_hcap(:) = 0.0
   117)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   118) 
   119)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   120)          !     Loop over sites.                                                            !
   121)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   122)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
   123)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
   124) 
   125)             !----- Inverse of this site area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
   126)             site_area_i=1./sum(csite%area)
   127)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   128) 
   129) 
   130)             !----- Site weight. -----------------------------------------------------------!
   131)             site_wgt = cpoly%area(isi) * poly_area_i
   132)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   133) 
   134)             !----- Inverse of the soil depth. ---------------------------------------------!
   135)             dslzsum_i = 1./ sum(dslz(cpoly%lsl(isi):nzg))
   136)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   137) 
   138)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   139)             !     Loop over patches.                                                       !
   140)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   141)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
   142)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
   143) 
   144) 
   145)                !----- Site weight. --------------------------------------------------------!
   146)                patch_wgt = csite%area(ipa) * site_area_i * site_wgt
   147)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   148) 
   149) 
   150)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   151)                !     Loop over cohorts.                                                    !
   152)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   153)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
   154)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   155)                   !    Aggregate AIs and density, they may be used to normalise averages.  !
   156)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   157)                   poly_nplant = poly_nplant + cpatch%nplant(ico) * patch_wgt
   158)                   poly_lai    = poly_lai    + cpatch%lai   (ico) * patch_wgt
   159)                   poly_wai    = poly_wai    + cpatch%wai   (ico) * patch_wgt
   160)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   161) 
   162) 
   163)                   !----- Aggregate the other properties. ----------------------------------!
   164)                   cgrid%fmean_gpp           (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_gpp            (ipy)       &
   165)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_gpp           (ico)       &
   166)                                                   * cpatch%nplant              (ico)       &
   167)                                                   * patch_wgt
   168)                   cgrid%fmean_npp           (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_npp            (ipy)       &
   169)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_npp           (ico)       &
   170)                                                   * cpatch%nplant              (ico)       &
   171)                                                   * patch_wgt
   172)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_resp     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_resp      (ipy)       &
   173)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_leaf_resp     (ico)       &
   174)                                                   * cpatch%nplant              (ico)       &
   175)                                                   * patch_wgt
   176)                   cgrid%fmean_root_resp     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_root_resp      (ipy)       &
   177)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_root_resp     (ico)       &
   178)                                                   * cpatch%nplant              (ico)       &
   179)                                                   * patch_wgt
   180)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_growth_resp(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_growth_resp  (ipy)  &
   181)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_leaf_growth_resp (ico)  &
   182)                                                     * cpatch%nplant                 (ico)  &
   183)                                                     * patch_wgt
   184)                   cgrid%fmean_root_growth_resp(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_root_growth_resp  (ipy)  &
   185)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_root_growth_resp (ico)  &
   186)                                                     * cpatch%nplant                 (ico)  &
   187)                                                     * patch_wgt
   188)                   cgrid%fmean_sapa_growth_resp(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sapa_growth_resp  (ipy)  &
   189)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_sapa_growth_resp (ico)  &
   190)                                                     * cpatch%nplant                 (ico)  &
   191)                                                     * patch_wgt
   192)                   cgrid%fmean_sapb_growth_resp(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sapb_growth_resp  (ipy)  &
   193)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_sapb_growth_resp (ico)  &
   194)                                                     * cpatch%nplant                 (ico)  &
   195)                                                     * patch_wgt
   196)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_storage_resp(ipy)= cgrid%fmean_leaf_storage_resp (ipy)  &
   197)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_leaf_storage_resp(ico)  &
   198)                                                     * cpatch%nplant                 (ico)  &
   199)                                                     * patch_wgt
   200)                   cgrid%fmean_root_storage_resp(ipy)= cgrid%fmean_root_storage_resp (ipy)  &
   201)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_root_storage_resp(ico)  &
   202)                                                     * cpatch%nplant                 (ico)  &
   203)                                                     * patch_wgt
   204)                   cgrid%fmean_sapa_storage_resp(ipy)= cgrid%fmean_sapa_storage_resp (ipy)  &
   205)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_sapa_storage_resp(ico)  &
   206)                                                     * cpatch%nplant                 (ico)  &
   207)                                                     * patch_wgt
   208)                   cgrid%fmean_sapb_storage_resp(ipy)= cgrid%fmean_sapb_storage_resp (ipy)  &
   209)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_sapb_storage_resp(ico)  &
   210)                                                     * cpatch%nplant                 (ico)  &
   211)                                                     * patch_wgt
   212)                   cgrid%fmean_plresp        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_plresp         (ipy)       &
   213)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_plresp        (ico)       &
   214)                                                   * cpatch%nplant              (ico)       &
   215)                                                   * patch_wgt
   216)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_energy   (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_energy    (ipy)       &
   217)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_leaf_energy   (ico)       &
   218)                                                   * patch_wgt
   219)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_water    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_water     (ipy)       &
   220)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_leaf_water    (ico)       &
   221)                                                   * patch_wgt
   222)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_hcap     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_hcap      (ipy)       &
   223)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_leaf_hcap     (ico)       &
   224)                                                   * patch_wgt
   225)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_vpdef    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_vpdef     (ipy)       &
   226)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_leaf_vpdef    (ico)       &
   227)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   228)                                                   * patch_wgt
   229)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_gsw      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_gsw       (ipy)       &
   230)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_leaf_gsw      (ico)       &
   231)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   232)                                                   * patch_wgt
   233)                   cgrid%fmean_leaf_gbw      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_gbw       (ipy)       &
   234)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_leaf_gbw      (ico)       &
   235)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   236)                                                   * patch_wgt
   237)                   cgrid%fmean_wood_energy   (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_wood_energy    (ipy)       &
   238)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_wood_energy   (ico)       &
   239)                                                   * patch_wgt
   240)                   cgrid%fmean_wood_water    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_wood_water     (ipy)       &
   241)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_wood_water    (ico)       &
   242)                                                   * patch_wgt
   243)                   cgrid%fmean_wood_hcap     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_wood_hcap      (ipy)       &
   244)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_wood_hcap     (ico)       &
   245)                                                   * patch_wgt
   246)                   cgrid%fmean_wood_gbw      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_wood_gbw       (ipy)       &
   247)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_wood_gbw      (ico)       &
   248)                                                   * cpatch%wai                 (ico)       &
   249)                                                   * patch_wgt
   250)                   cgrid%fmean_fs_open       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_fs_open        (ipy)       &
   251)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_fs_open       (ico)       &
   252)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   253)                                                   * patch_wgt
   254)                   cgrid%fmean_fsw           (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_fsw            (ipy)       &
   255)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_fsw           (ico)       &
   256)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   257)                                                   * patch_wgt
   258)                   cgrid%fmean_fsn           (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_fsn            (ipy)       &
   259)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_fsn           (ico)       &
   260)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   261)                                                   * patch_wgt
   262)                   cgrid%fmean_a_open        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_a_open         (ipy)       &
   263)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_a_open        (ico)       &
   264)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   265)                                                   * patch_wgt
   266)                   cgrid%fmean_a_closed      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_a_closed       (ipy)       &
   267)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_a_closed      (ico)       &
   268)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   269)                                                   * patch_wgt
   270)                   cgrid%fmean_a_net         (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_a_net          (ipy)       &
   271)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_a_net         (ico)       &
   272)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   273)                                                   * patch_wgt
   274)                   cgrid%fmean_a_light       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_a_light        (ipy)       &
   275)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_a_light       (ico)       &
   276)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   277)                                                   * patch_wgt
   278)                   cgrid%fmean_a_rubp        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_a_rubp         (ipy)       &
   279)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_a_rubp        (ico)       &
   280)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   281)                                                   * patch_wgt
   282)                   cgrid%fmean_a_co2         (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_a_co2          (ipy)       &
   283)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_a_co2         (ico)       &
   284)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   285)                                                   * patch_wgt
   286)                   cgrid%fmean_a_open        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_a_open         (ipy)       &
   287)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_a_open        (ico)       &
   288)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   289)                                                   * patch_wgt
   290)                   cgrid%fmean_a_closed      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_a_closed       (ipy)       &
   291)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_a_closed      (ico)       &
   292)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   293)                                                   * patch_wgt
   294)                   cgrid%fmean_psi_open      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_psi_open       (ipy)       &
   295)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_psi_open      (ico)       &
   296)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   297)                                                   * patch_wgt
   298)                   cgrid%fmean_psi_closed    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_psi_closed     (ipy)       &
   299)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_psi_closed    (ico)       &
   300)                                                   * cpatch%lai                 (ico)       &
   301)                                                   * patch_wgt
   302)                   cgrid%fmean_water_supply  (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_water_supply   (ipy)       &
   303)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_water_supply  (ico)       &
   304)                                                   * patch_wgt
   305)                   cgrid%fmean_par_l         (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_par_l          (ipy)       &
   306)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_par_l         (ico)       &
   307)                                                   * patch_wgt
   308)                   cgrid%fmean_par_l_beam    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_par_l_beam     (ipy)       &
   309)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_par_l_beam    (ico)       &
   310)                                                   * patch_wgt
   311)                   cgrid%fmean_par_l_diff    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_par_l_diff     (ipy)       &
   312)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_par_l_diff    (ico)       &
   313)                                                   * patch_wgt
   314)                   cgrid%fmean_rshort_l      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rshort_l       (ipy)       &
   315)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_rshort_l      (ico)       &
   316)                                                   * patch_wgt
   317)                   cgrid%fmean_rlong_l       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rlong_l        (ipy)       &
   318)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_rlong_l       (ico)       &
   319)                                                   * patch_wgt
   320)                   cgrid%fmean_sensible_lc   (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sensible_lc    (ipy)       &
   321)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_sensible_lc   (ico)       &
   322)                                                   * patch_wgt
   323)                   cgrid%fmean_vapor_lc      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_vapor_lc       (ipy)       &
   324)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_vapor_lc      (ico)       &
   325)                                                   * patch_wgt
   326)                   cgrid%fmean_transp        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_transp         (ipy)       &
   327)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_transp        (ico)       &
   328)                                                   * patch_wgt
   329)                   cgrid%fmean_intercepted_al(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_intercepted_al (ipy)       &
   330)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_intercepted_al(ico)       &
   331)                                                   * patch_wgt
   332)                   cgrid%fmean_wshed_lg      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_wshed_lg       (ipy)       &
   333)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_wshed_lg      (ico)       &
   334)                                                   * patch_wgt
   335)                   cgrid%fmean_rshort_w      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rshort_w       (ipy)       &
   336)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_rshort_w      (ico)       &
   337)                                                   * patch_wgt
   338)                   cgrid%fmean_rlong_w       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rlong_w        (ipy)       &
   339)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_rlong_w       (ico)       &
   340)                                                   * patch_wgt
   341)                   cgrid%fmean_sensible_wc   (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sensible_wc    (ipy)       &
   342)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_sensible_wc   (ico)       &
   343)                                                   * patch_wgt
   344)                   cgrid%fmean_vapor_wc      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_vapor_wc       (ipy)       &
   345)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_vapor_wc      (ico)       &
   346)                                                   * patch_wgt
   347)                   cgrid%fmean_intercepted_aw(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_intercepted_aw (ipy)       &
   348)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_intercepted_aw(ico)       &
   349)                                                   * patch_wgt
   350)                   cgrid%fmean_wshed_wg      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_wshed_wg       (ipy)       &
   351)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_wshed_wg      (ico)       &
   352)                                                   * patch_wgt
   353) 
   354)                   cgrid%fmean_bdead         (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_bdead          (ipy)       &
   355)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_bdead         (ico)       &
   356)                                                   * patch_wgt
   357)                   cgrid%fmean_lai           (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_lai            (ipy)       &
   358)                                                   + cpatch%fmean_lai           (ico)       &
   359)                                                   * patch_wgt
   360)                end do cohortloop
   361)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   362) 
   363) 
   364) 
   365) 
   366)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   367)                !     Aggregate the patch-level variables.                                  !
   368)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   369)                cgrid%fmean_rh             (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rh             (ipy)         &
   370)                                                 + csite%fmean_rh             (ipa)         &
   371)                                                 * patch_wgt
   372)                cgrid%fmean_cwd_rh         (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_cwd_rh         (ipy)         &
   373)                                                 + csite%fmean_cwd_rh         (ipa)         &
   374)                                                 * patch_wgt
   375)                cgrid%fmean_nep            (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_nep            (ipy)         &
   376)                                                 + csite%fmean_nep            (ipa)         &
   377)                                                 * patch_wgt
   378)                cgrid%fmean_rk4step        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rk4step        (ipy)         &
   379)                                                 + csite%fmean_rk4step        (ipa)         &
   380)                                                 * patch_wgt
   381)                cgrid%fmean_available_water(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_available_water(ipy)         &
   382)                                                 + csite%fmean_available_water(ipa)         &
   383)                                                 * patch_wgt
   384)                cgrid%fmean_can_theiv      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_theiv      (ipy)         &
   385)                                                 + csite%fmean_can_theiv      (ipa)         &
   386)                                                 * patch_wgt
   387)                cgrid%fmean_can_theta      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_theta      (ipy)         &
   388)                                                 + csite%fmean_can_theta      (ipa)         &
   389)                                                 * patch_wgt
   390)                cgrid%fmean_can_vpdef      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_vpdef      (ipy)         &
   391)                                                 + csite%fmean_can_vpdef      (ipa)         &
   392)                                                 * patch_wgt
   393)                cgrid%fmean_can_shv        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_shv        (ipy)         &
   394)                                                 + csite%fmean_can_shv        (ipa)         &
   395)                                                 * patch_wgt
   396)                cgrid%fmean_can_co2        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_co2        (ipy)         &
   397)                                                 + csite%fmean_can_co2        (ipa)         &
   398)                                                 * patch_wgt
   399)                cgrid%fmean_can_prss       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_prss       (ipy)         &
   400)                                                 + csite%fmean_can_prss       (ipa)         &
   401)                                                 * patch_wgt
   402)                cgrid%fmean_gnd_temp       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_gnd_temp       (ipy)         &
   403)                                                 + csite%fmean_gnd_temp       (ipa)         &
   404)                                                 * patch_wgt
   405)                cgrid%fmean_gnd_shv        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_gnd_shv        (ipy)         &
   406)                                                 + csite%fmean_gnd_shv        (ipa)         &
   407)                                                 * patch_wgt
   408)                cgrid%fmean_can_ggnd       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_ggnd       (ipy)         &
   409)                                                 + csite%fmean_can_ggnd       (ipa)         &
   410)                                                 * patch_wgt
   411)                cgrid%fmean_sfcw_depth     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sfcw_depth     (ipy)         &
   412)                                                 + csite%fmean_sfcw_depth     (ipa)         &
   413)                                                 * patch_wgt
   414)                !----- Temporarily convert pounding internal energy to J/m2. ---------------!
   415)                cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy    (ipy)         &
   416)                                                 + csite%fmean_sfcw_energy    (ipa)         &
   417)                                                 * csite%fmean_sfcw_mass      (ipa)         &
   418)                                                 * patch_wgt
   419)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   420)                cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass      (ipy)         &
   421)                                                 + csite%fmean_sfcw_mass      (ipa)         &
   422)                                                 * patch_wgt
   423)                cgrid%fmean_rshort_gnd     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rshort_gnd     (ipy)         &
   424)                                                 + csite%fmean_rshort_gnd     (ipa)         &
   425)                                                 * patch_wgt
   426)                cgrid%fmean_par_gnd        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_par_gnd        (ipy)         &
   427)                                                 + csite%fmean_par_gnd        (ipa)         &
   428)                                                 * patch_wgt
   429)                cgrid%fmean_rlong_gnd      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rlong_gnd      (ipy)         &
   430)                                                 + csite%fmean_rlong_gnd      (ipa)         &
   431)                                                 * patch_wgt
   432)                cgrid%fmean_rlongup        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rlongup        (ipy)         &
   433)                                                 + csite%fmean_rlongup        (ipa)         &
   434)                                                 * patch_wgt
   435)                cgrid%fmean_parup          (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_parup          (ipy)         &
   436)                                                 + csite%fmean_parup          (ipa)         &
   437)                                                 * patch_wgt
   438)                cgrid%fmean_nirup          (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_nirup          (ipy)         &
   439)                                                 + csite%fmean_nirup          (ipa)         &
   440)                                                 * patch_wgt
   441)                cgrid%fmean_rshortup       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rshortup       (ipy)         &
   442)                                                 + csite%fmean_rshortup       (ipa)         &
   443)                                                 * patch_wgt
   444)                cgrid%fmean_rnet           (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rnet           (ipy)         &
   445)                                                 + csite%fmean_rnet           (ipa)         &
   446)                                                 * patch_wgt
   447)                cgrid%fmean_albedo         (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_albedo         (ipy)         &
   448)                                                 + csite%fmean_albedo         (ipa)         &
   449)                                                 * patch_wgt
   450)                cgrid%fmean_albedo_par     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_albedo_par     (ipy)         &
   451)                                                 + csite%fmean_albedo_par     (ipa)         &
   452)                                                 * patch_wgt
   453)                cgrid%fmean_albedo_nir     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_albedo_nir     (ipy)         &
   454)                                                 + csite%fmean_albedo_nir     (ipa)         &
   455)                                                 * patch_wgt
   456)                cgrid%fmean_rlong_albedo   (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_rlong_albedo   (ipy)         &
   457)                                                 + csite%fmean_rlong_albedo   (ipa)         &
   458)                                                 * patch_wgt
   459)                cgrid%fmean_ustar          (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_ustar          (ipy)         &
   460)                                                 + csite%fmean_ustar          (ipa)         &
   461)                                                 * patch_wgt
   462)                cgrid%fmean_tstar          (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_tstar          (ipy)         &
   463)                                                 + csite%fmean_tstar          (ipa)         &
   464)                                                 * patch_wgt
   465)                cgrid%fmean_qstar          (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_qstar          (ipy)         &
   466)                                                 + csite%fmean_qstar          (ipa)         &
   467)                                                 * patch_wgt
   468)                cgrid%fmean_cstar          (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_cstar          (ipy)         &
   469)                                                 + csite%fmean_cstar          (ipa)         &
   470)                                                 * patch_wgt
   471)                cgrid%fmean_carbon_ac      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_carbon_ac      (ipy)         &
   472)                                                 + csite%fmean_carbon_ac      (ipa)         &
   473)                                                 * patch_wgt
   474)                cgrid%fmean_carbon_st      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_carbon_st      (ipy)         &
   475)                                                 + csite%fmean_carbon_st      (ipa)         &
   476)                                                 * patch_wgt
   477)                cgrid%fmean_vapor_gc       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_vapor_gc       (ipy)         &
   478)                                                 + csite%fmean_vapor_gc       (ipa)         &
   479)                                                 * patch_wgt
   480)                cgrid%fmean_vapor_ac       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_vapor_ac       (ipy)         &
   481)                                                 + csite%fmean_vapor_ac       (ipa)         &
   482)                                                 * patch_wgt
   483)                cgrid%fmean_throughfall    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_throughfall    (ipy)         &
   484)                                                 + csite%fmean_throughfall    (ipa)         &
   485)                                                 * patch_wgt
   486)                cgrid%fmean_runoff         (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_runoff         (ipy)         &
   487)                                                 + csite%fmean_runoff         (ipa)         &
   488)                                                 * patch_wgt
   489)                cgrid%fmean_drainage       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_drainage       (ipy)         &
   490)                                                 + csite%fmean_drainage       (ipa)         &
   491)                                                 * patch_wgt
   492)                cgrid%fmean_sensible_gc    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sensible_gc    (ipy)         &
   493)                                                 + csite%fmean_sensible_gc    (ipa)         &
   494)                                                 * patch_wgt
   495)                cgrid%fmean_sensible_ac    (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sensible_ac    (ipy)         &
   496)                                                 + csite%fmean_sensible_ac    (ipa)         &
   497)                                                 * patch_wgt
   498)                cgrid%fmean_qthroughfall   (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_qthroughfall   (ipy)         &
   499)                                                 + csite%fmean_qthroughfall   (ipa)         &
   500)                                                 * patch_wgt
   501)                cgrid%fmean_qrunoff        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_qrunoff        (ipy)         &
   502)                                                 + csite%fmean_qrunoff        (ipa)         &
   503)                                                 * patch_wgt
   504)                cgrid%fmean_qdrainage      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_qdrainage      (ipy)         &
   505)                                                 + csite%fmean_qdrainage      (ipa)         &
   506)                                                 * patch_wgt
   507) 
   508)                !----- Soil (extensive) properties. ----------------------------------------!
   509)                do k=1,nzg
   510)                   nsoil = cpoly%ntext_soil(k,isi)
   511)                   cgrid%fmean_soil_energy (k,ipy) = cgrid%fmean_soil_energy (k,ipy)        &
   512)                                                   + csite%fmean_soil_energy (k,ipa)        &
   513)                                                   * patch_wgt
   514)                   cgrid%fmean_soil_mstpot (k,ipy) = cgrid%fmean_soil_mstpot (k,ipy)        &
   515)                                                   + csite%fmean_soil_mstpot (k,ipa)        &
   516)                                                   * patch_wgt
   517)                   cgrid%fmean_soil_water  (k,ipy) = cgrid%fmean_soil_water  (k,ipy)        &
   518)                                                   + csite%fmean_soil_water  (k,ipa)        &
   519)                                                   * patch_wgt
   520)                   cgrid%fmean_smoist_gg   (k,ipy) = cgrid%fmean_smoist_gg   (k,ipy)        &
   521)                                                   + csite%fmean_smoist_gg   (k,ipa)        &
   522)                                                   * patch_wgt
   523)                   cgrid%fmean_transloss   (k,ipy) = cgrid%fmean_transloss   (k,ipy)        &
   524)                                                   + csite%fmean_transloss   (k,ipa)        &
   525)                                                   * patch_wgt
   526)                   cgrid%fmean_sensible_gg (k,ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sensible_gg (k,ipy)        &
   527)                                                   + csite%fmean_sensible_gg (k,ipa)        &
   528)                                                   * patch_wgt
   529)                   cgrid_fmean_soil_hcap   (k)     = cgrid_fmean_soil_hcap   (k)            &
   530)                                                   + soil(nsoil)%slcpd                      &
   531)                                                   * patch_wgt
   532) 
   533)                   !----- Find the mean soil wetness. --------------------------------------!
   534)                   cgrid%fmean_soil_wetness  (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_soil_wetness    (ipy)      &
   535)                                                   + ( ( csite%fmean_soil_water(k,ipa)      &
   536)                                                       - soil(nsoil)%soilwp) )              &
   537)                                                   / ( soil(nsoil)%slmsts                   &
   538)                                                     - soil(nsoil)%soilwp)                  &
   539)                                                   * dslz(k) * dslzsum_i * patch_wgt
   540)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   541)                end do
   542)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   543)             end do patchloop
   544)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   545) 
   546) 
   547) 
   548) 
   549)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   550)             !     Aggregate the patch-level variables.                                     !
   551)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   552)             cgrid%fmean_atm_theiv      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_theiv      (ipy)            &
   553)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_theiv      (isi)            &
   554)                                              * site_wgt
   555)             cgrid%fmean_atm_theta      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_theta      (ipy)            &
   556)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_theta      (isi)            &
   557)                                              * site_wgt
   558)             cgrid%fmean_atm_temp       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_temp       (ipy)            &
   559)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_temp       (isi)            &
   560)                                              * site_wgt
   561)             cgrid%fmean_atm_vpdef      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_vpdef      (ipy)            &
   562)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_vpdef      (isi)            &
   563)                                              * site_wgt
   564)             cgrid%fmean_atm_shv        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_shv        (ipy)            &
   565)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_shv        (isi)            &
   566)                                              * site_wgt
   567)             cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort     (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort     (ipy)            &
   568)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort     (isi)            &
   569)                                              * site_wgt
   570)             cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort_diff(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort_diff(ipy)            &
   571)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi)            &
   572)                                              * site_wgt
   573)             cgrid%fmean_atm_par        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_par        (ipy)            &
   574)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_par        (isi)            &
   575)                                              * site_wgt
   576)             cgrid%fmean_atm_par_diff   (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_par_diff   (ipy)            &
   577)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_par_diff   (isi)            &
   578)                                              * site_wgt
   579)             cgrid%fmean_atm_rlong      (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_rlong      (ipy)            &
   580)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_rlong      (isi)            &
   581)                                              * site_wgt
   582)             cgrid%fmean_atm_vels       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_vels       (ipy)            &
   583)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_vels       (isi)            &
   584)                                              * site_wgt
   585)             cgrid%fmean_atm_rhos       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_rhos       (ipy)            &
   586)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_rhos       (isi)            &
   587)                                              * site_wgt
   588)             cgrid%fmean_atm_prss       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_prss       (ipy)            &
   589)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_prss       (isi)            &
   590)                                              * site_wgt
   591)             cgrid%fmean_atm_co2        (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_atm_co2        (ipy)            &
   592)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_co2        (isi)            &
   593)                                              * site_wgt
   594)             cgrid%fmean_pcpg           (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_pcpg           (ipy)            &
   595)                                              + cpoly%fmean_pcpg           (isi)            &
   596)                                              * site_wgt
   597)             cgrid%fmean_qpcpg          (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_qpcpg          (ipy)            &
   598)                                              + cpoly%fmean_qpcpg          (isi)            &
   599)                                              * site_wgt
   600)             cgrid%fmean_dpcpg          (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_dpcpg          (ipy)            &
   601)                                              + cpoly%fmean_dpcpg          (isi)            &
   602)                                              * site_wgt
   603)          end do siteloop
   604)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   605) 
   606) 
   607) 
   608) 
   609)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   610)          !      Find the derived properties for the air above canopy.                      !
   611)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   612)          atm_exner                 = press2exner (cgrid%fmean_atm_prss(ipy))
   613)          cgrid%fmean_atm_temp(ipy) = extheta2temp(atm_exner,cgrid%fmean_atm_theta(ipy))
   614)          cgrid%fmean_atm_rhos(ipy) = idealdenssh ( cgrid%fmean_atm_prss  (ipy)             &
   615)                                                  , cgrid%fmean_atm_temp  (ipy)             &
   616)                                                  , cgrid%fmean_atm_shv   (ipy) )
   617)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   618) 
   619) 
   620) 
   621) 
   622)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   623)          !      Find the derived properties for the canopy air space.                      !
   624)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   625)          can_exner                 = press2exner (cgrid%fmean_can_prss(ipy))
   626)          cgrid%fmean_can_temp(ipy) = extheta2temp(can_exner,cgrid%fmean_can_theta(ipy))
   627)          cgrid%fmean_can_rhos(ipy) = idealdenssh ( cgrid%fmean_can_prss  (ipy)             &
   628)                                                  , cgrid%fmean_can_temp  (ipy)             &
   629)                                                  , cgrid%fmean_can_shv   (ipy) )
   630)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   631) 
   632) 
   633) 
   634) 
   635)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   636)          !   If the patch had some temporary snow/pounding layer, convert the mean energy  !
   637)          ! to J/kg, then find the mean temperature and liquid fraction.  Otherwise, set    !
   638)          ! them to either zero or default values.                                          !
   639)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   640)          if (cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass(ipy) > tiny_sfcwater_mass) then
   641)             cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipy)                    &
   642)                                          / cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass(ipy)
   643)             call uint2tl(cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipy),cgrid%fmean_sfcw_temp(ipy)           &
   644)                         ,cgrid%fmean_sfcw_fliq(ipy))
   645)          else
   646)             cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass  (ipy)  = 0.
   647)             cgrid%fmean_sfcw_depth (ipy)  = 0.
   648)             cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipy)  = 0.
   649)             cgrid%fmean_sfcw_temp  (ipy)  = cgrid%fmean_soil_temp(nzg,ipy)
   650)             cgrid%fmean_sfcw_fliq  (ipy)  = cgrid%fmean_soil_fliq(nzg,ipy)
   651)          end if
   652)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   653) 
   654) 
   655) 
   656) 
   657)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   658)          !     Find the temperature and the fraction of liquid water.                      !
   659)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   660)          do k=1,nzg
   661)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%fmean_soil_energy(k,ipy)                                 &
   662)                           , cgrid%fmean_soil_water (k,ipy) * wdns                          &
   663)                           , cgrid_fmean_soil_hcap  (k)                                     & 
   664)                           , cgrid%fmean_soil_temp  (k,ipy)                                 &
   665)                           , cgrid%fmean_soil_fliq  (k,ipy) )
   666)          end do
   667)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   668) 
   669) 
   670) 
   671)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   672)          !     Find the vegetation temperature and liquid fraction.                        !
   673)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   674)          !----- Leaf. ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
   675)          if (cgrid%fmean_leaf_hcap(ipy) > 0.) then
   676)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%fmean_leaf_energy(ipy), cgrid%fmean_leaf_water (ipy)     &
   677)                           , cgrid%fmean_leaf_hcap  (ipy), cgrid%fmean_leaf_temp  (ipy)     &
   678)                           , cgrid%fmean_leaf_fliq  (ipy) )
   679)          else
   680)             cgrid%fmean_leaf_temp (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_temp (ipy)
   681)             if (cgrid%fmean_can_temp(ipy) > t00) then
   682)                cgrid%fmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 1.0
   683)             elseif (cgrid%fmean_can_temp(ipy) == t00) then
   684)                cgrid%fmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 0.5
   685)             else
   686)                cgrid%fmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 0.0
   687)             end if
   688)          end if
   689)          !----- Wood. ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
   690)          if (cgrid%fmean_wood_hcap(ipy) > 0.) then
   691)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%fmean_wood_energy(ipy)                                   &
   692)                           , cgrid%fmean_wood_water (ipy)                                   &
   693)                           , cgrid%fmean_wood_hcap  (ipy)                                   &
   694)                           , cgrid%fmean_wood_temp  (ipy)                                   &
   695)                           , cgrid%fmean_wood_fliq  (ipy) )
   696)          else
   697)             cgrid%fmean_wood_temp(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_temp(ipy)
   698)             if (cgrid%fmean_can_temp(ipy) > t00) then
   699)                cgrid%fmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 1.0
   700)             elseif (cgrid%fmean_can_temp(ipy) == t00) then
   701)                cgrid%fmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 0.5
   702)             else
   703)                cgrid%fmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 0.0
   704)             end if
   705)          end if
   706)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   707) 
   708) 
   709) 
   710) 
   711)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   712)          !    Normalise the "intensive" properties.  The weight was either the LAI, WAI,   !
   713)          ! or plant density.  In case none of the cohorts qualified to contribute, then we !
   714)          ! assign either the canopy air space property, or a default number.               !
   715)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   716)          if (poly_lai > 0.) then
   717)             cgrid%fmean_leaf_vpdef(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_vpdef (ipy) / poly_lai
   718)             cgrid%fmean_leaf_gsw  (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_gsw   (ipy) / poly_lai
   719)             cgrid%fmean_leaf_gbw  (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_leaf_gbw   (ipy) / poly_lai
   720)             cgrid%fmean_fs_open   (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_fs_open    (ipy) / poly_lai
   721)             cgrid%fmean_fsw       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_fsw        (ipy) / poly_lai
   722)             cgrid%fmean_fsn       (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_fsn        (ipy) / poly_lai
   723)          else
   724)             cgrid%fmean_leaf_vpdef(ipy) = cgrid%fmean_can_vpdef  (ipy)
   725)             cgrid%fmean_leaf_gsw  (ipy) = 0.0
   726)             cgrid%fmean_leaf_gbw  (ipy) = 0.0
   727)             cgrid%fmean_fs_open   (ipy) = 0.5
   728)             cgrid%fmean_fsw       (ipy) = 0.5
   729)             cgrid%fmean_fsn       (ipy) = 0.5
   730)          end if
   731)          if (poly_wai > 0.) then
   732)             cgrid%fmean_wood_gbw  (ipy) = cgrid%fmean_wood_gbw   (ipy) / poly_wai
   733)          else
   734)             cgrid%fmean_wood_gbw  (ipy) = 0.0
   735)          end if
   736)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   737) 
   738) 
   739) 
   740)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   741)          !    Compute the average amongst all surfaces (soil, temporary surface water, and !
   742)          ! vegetation, the last two only if they really exist).  All energy terms are      !
   743)          ! converted to J/m2, all water terms to kg/m2, and the heat capacities of every-  !
   744)          ! thing that is not water is in J/m2/K.                                           !
   745)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   746)          skin_energy = cgrid%fmean_leaf_energy(ipy) + cgrid%fmean_wood_energy(ipy)         &
   747)                      + cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipy) * cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass  (ipy)         &
   748)                      + cgrid%fmean_soil_energy(nzg,ipy) * dslz(nzg)
   749)          skin_water  = cgrid%fmean_leaf_water(ipy)  + cgrid%fmean_wood_water(ipy)          &
   750)                      + cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass (ipy)                                         &
   751)                      + cgrid%fmean_soil_water(nzg,ipy) * dslz(nzg) * wdns
   752)          skin_hcap   = cgrid%fmean_leaf_hcap(ipy) + cgrid%fmean_wood_hcap(ipy)             &
   753)                      + cgrid_fmean_soil_hcap(nzg) * dslz(nzg)
   754)          call uextcm2tl(skin_energy,skin_water,skin_hcap                                   &
   755)                        ,cgrid%fmean_skin_temp(ipy),skin_fliq)
   756)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   757)       end do polyloop
   758)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   759)       return
   760)    end subroutine aggregate_polygon_fmean
   761)    !=======================================================================================!
   762)    !=======================================================================================!
   763) 
   764) 
   765) 
   766) 
   767) 
   768) 
   769)    !=======================================================================================!
   770)    !=======================================================================================!
   771)    !     This subroutine increments the time averaged site met-forcing variables.  The     !
   772)    ! polygon-level averages are found after the site-level are normalised.                 !
   773)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   774)    subroutine integrate_ed_fmean_met_vars(cgrid)
   775)       use ed_state_vars  , only : edtype          & ! structure
   776)                                 , polygontype     ! ! structure
   777)       use met_driver_coms, only : met_driv_state  ! ! structure
   778)       use ed_misc_coms   , only : dtlsm           & ! intent(in)
   779)                                 , frqsum          ! ! intent(in)
   780)       implicit none
   781)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
   782)       type(edtype)      , target  :: cgrid
   783)       !----- Local variables --------------------------------------------------------------!
   784)       type(polygontype)   , pointer :: cpoly
   785)       type(met_driv_state), pointer :: cmet
   786)       integer                       :: ipy
   787)       integer                       :: isi
   788)       !----- Locally saved variables. -----------------------------------------------------!
   789)       real              , save      :: dtlsm_o_frqsum = 1.e34
   790)       logical           , save      :: first_time     = .true.
   791)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   792) 
   793) 
   794)       !----- Assign the constant scaling factor. ------------------------------------------!
   795)       if (first_time) then
   796)          first_time     = .false.
   797)          dtlsm_o_frqsum = dtlsm / frqsum
   798)       end if
   799)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   800) 
   801)       polyloop: do ipy = 1,cgrid%npolygons
   802)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
   803) 
   804)          siteloop: do isi = 1,cpoly%nsites
   805)             cmet  => cpoly%met(isi)
   806) 
   807)             !----- The site-level averages. -----------------------------------------------!
   808)             cpoly%fmean_atm_theiv      (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_theiv      (isi)            &
   809)                                              + cmet%atm_theiv                              &
   810)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   811)             cpoly%fmean_atm_theta      (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_theta      (isi)            &
   812)                                              + cmet%atm_theta                              &
   813)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   814)             cpoly%fmean_atm_vpdef      (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_vpdef      (isi)            &
   815)                                              + cmet%atm_vpdef                              &
   816)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   817)             cpoly%fmean_atm_shv        (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_shv        (isi)            &
   818)                                              + cmet%atm_shv                                &
   819)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   820)             cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort     (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort     (isi)            &
   821)                                              + cmet%rshort                                 &
   822)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   823)             cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi)            &
   824)                                              + cmet%rshort_diffuse                         &
   825)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   826)             cpoly%fmean_atm_par        (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_par        (isi)            &
   827)                                              + ( cmet%par_beam + cmet%par_diffuse )        &
   828)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   829)             cpoly%fmean_atm_par_diff   (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_par_diff   (isi)            &
   830)                                              + cmet%par_diffuse                            &
   831)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   832)             cpoly%fmean_atm_rlong      (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_rlong      (isi)            &
   833)                                              + cmet%rlong                                  &
   834)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   835)             cpoly%fmean_atm_vels       (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_vels       (isi)            &
   836)                                              + cmet%vels                                   &
   837)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   838)             cpoly%fmean_atm_prss       (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_prss       (isi)            &
   839)                                              + cmet%prss                                   &
   840)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   841)             cpoly%fmean_atm_co2        (isi) = cpoly%fmean_atm_co2        (isi)            &
   842)                                              + cmet%atm_co2                                &
   843)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   844)             cpoly%fmean_pcpg           (isi) = cpoly%fmean_pcpg           (isi)            &
   845)                                              + cmet%pcpg                                   &
   846)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   847)             cpoly%fmean_qpcpg          (isi) = cpoly%fmean_qpcpg          (isi)            &
   848)                                              + cmet%qpcpg                                  &
   849)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   850)             cpoly%fmean_dpcpg          (isi) = cpoly%fmean_dpcpg          (isi)            &
   851)                                              + cmet%dpcpg                                  &
   852)                                              * dtlsm_o_frqsum
   853)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   854)          end do siteloop
   855)       end do polyloop
   856)       return
   857)    end subroutine integrate_ed_fmean_met_vars
   858)    !=======================================================================================!
   859)    !=======================================================================================!
   860) 
   861) 
   862) 
   863) 
   864) 
   865) 
   866)    !=======================================================================================!
   867)    !=======================================================================================!
   868)    !       The following sub-routine scales several variables that are integrated during   !
   869)    ! one output step (frqsum) to actual rates, and find derived properties.                !
   870)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   871)    subroutine normalize_ed_fmean_vars(cgrid)
   872)       use grid_coms    , only : nzg                ! ! intent(in)
   873)       use ed_misc_coms , only : dtlsm              & ! intent(in)
   874)                               , frqsum             & ! intent(in)
   875)                               , radfrq             ! ! intent(in)
   876)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype             & ! structure
   877)                               , polygontype        & ! structure
   878)                               , sitetype           & ! structure
   879)                               , patchtype          ! ! structure
   880)       use therm_lib    , only : uextcm2tl          & ! subroutine
   881)                               , uint2tl            & ! subroutine
   882)                               , idealdenssh        & ! function
   883)                               , press2exner        & ! function
   884)                               , extheta2temp       ! ! function
   885)       use consts_coms  , only : t00                & ! intent(in)
   886)                               , wdns               ! ! intent(in)
   887)       use soil_coms    , only : tiny_sfcwater_mass & ! intent(in)
   888)                               , soil               & ! intent(in)
   889)                               , matric_potential   ! ! function
   890)       implicit none
   891)       !----- Arguments.  ------------------------------------------------------------------!
   892)       type(edtype)      , target     :: cgrid
   893)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
   894)       type(polygontype) , pointer    :: cpoly
   895)       type(sitetype)    , pointer    :: csite
   896)       type(patchtype)   , pointer    :: cpatch
   897)       integer                        :: ipy
   898)       integer                        :: isi
   899)       integer                        :: ipa
   900)       integer                        :: ico
   901)       integer                        :: nsoil
   902)       real                           :: dtlsm_o_frqsum
   903)       real                           :: radfrq_o_frqsum
   904)       real                           :: frqsumi
   905)       real                           :: pss_npp
   906)       real                           :: pss_lai
   907)       real                           :: atm_exner
   908)       real                           :: can_exner
   909)       integer                        :: k
   910)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   911) 
   912) 
   913) 
   914) 
   915)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   916)       !     Find some useful conversion factors.                                           !
   917)       ! 1. FRQSUMI         -- inverse of the elapsed time between two analyses (or one     !
   918)       !                       day).  This should be used by variables that are fluxes and  !
   919)       !                       are solved by RK4, they are holding the integral over the    !
   920)       !                       past frqsum seconds.                                         !
   921)       ! 2. DTLSM_O_FRQSUM  -- inverse of the number of the main time steps (DTLSM) since   !
   922)       !                       previous analysis.  Only photosynthesis- and decomposition-  !
   923)       !                       related variables, or STATE VARIABLES should use this        !
   924)       !                       factor.  Do not use this for energy and water fluxes, CO2    !
   925)       !                       eddy flux, and CO2 storage.                                  !
   926)       ! 3. RADFRQ_O_FRQSUM -- inverse of the number of radiation time steps since the      !
   927)       !                       previous analysis.  Only radiation-related variables should  !
   928)       !                       use this factor.                                             !
   929)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   930)       frqsumi         =    1.0 / frqsum
   931)       dtlsm_o_frqsum  =  dtlsm * frqsumi
   932)       radfrq_o_frqsum = radfrq * frqsumi
   933)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   934) 
   935) 
   936) 
   937) 
   938)       polyloop: do ipy = 1,cgrid%npolygons
   939)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
   940) 
   941)          siteloop: do isi = 1,cpoly%nsites
   942)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
   943) 
   944)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   945)             !      Now we find the derived properties for the air above canopy.            !
   946)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   947)             atm_exner                 = press2exner (cpoly%fmean_atm_prss(isi))
   948)             cpoly%fmean_atm_temp(isi) = extheta2temp(atm_exner,cpoly%fmean_atm_theta(isi))
   949)             cpoly%fmean_atm_rhos(isi) = idealdenssh ( cpoly%fmean_atm_prss  (isi)          &
   950)                                                     , cpoly%fmean_atm_temp  (isi)          &
   951)                                                     , cpoly%fmean_atm_shv   (isi) )
   952)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   953) 
   954) 
   955) 
   956)             patchloop: do ipa = 1,csite%npatches
   957)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
   958) 
   959)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   960)                !      Reset the patch-level GPP and plant respiration, used to find NEP.   !
   961)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   962)                pss_npp    = 0.0
   963)                pss_lai    = 0.0
   964)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   965) 
   966) 
   967) 
   968) 
   969) 
   970)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   971)                !     The following variables are fluxes that cam from the RK4 and there-   !
   972)                ! fore hold the integral over time, divide them by the total time to obtain !
   973)                ! the mean fluxes.                                                          !
   974)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
   975)                csite%fmean_rk4step       (ipa) = csite%fmean_rk4step       (ipa) * frqsumi
   976)                csite%fmean_ustar         (ipa) = csite%fmean_ustar         (ipa) * frqsumi
   977)                csite%fmean_tstar         (ipa) = csite%fmean_tstar         (ipa) * frqsumi
   978)                csite%fmean_qstar         (ipa) = csite%fmean_qstar         (ipa) * frqsumi
   979)                csite%fmean_cstar         (ipa) = csite%fmean_cstar         (ipa) * frqsumi
   980)                csite%fmean_carbon_ac     (ipa) = csite%fmean_carbon_ac     (ipa) * frqsumi
   981)                csite%fmean_carbon_st     (ipa) = csite%fmean_carbon_st     (ipa) * frqsumi
   982)                csite%fmean_vapor_gc      (ipa) = csite%fmean_vapor_gc      (ipa) * frqsumi
   983)                csite%fmean_vapor_ac      (ipa) = csite%fmean_vapor_ac      (ipa) * frqsumi
   984)                csite%fmean_throughfall   (ipa) = csite%fmean_throughfall   (ipa) * frqsumi
   985)                csite%fmean_runoff        (ipa) = csite%fmean_runoff        (ipa) * frqsumi
   986)                csite%fmean_drainage      (ipa) = csite%fmean_drainage      (ipa) * frqsumi
   987)                csite%fmean_sensible_gc   (ipa) = csite%fmean_sensible_gc   (ipa) * frqsumi
   988)                csite%fmean_sensible_ac   (ipa) = csite%fmean_sensible_ac   (ipa) * frqsumi
   989)                csite%fmean_qthroughfall  (ipa) = csite%fmean_qthroughfall  (ipa) * frqsumi
   990)                csite%fmean_qrunoff       (ipa) = csite%fmean_qrunoff       (ipa) * frqsumi
   991)                csite%fmean_qdrainage     (ipa) = csite%fmean_qdrainage     (ipa) * frqsumi
   992)                !------ Soil flux. ---------------------------------------------------------!
   993)                do k=cpoly%lsl(isi),nzg
   994)                   csite%fmean_sensible_gg(k,ipa) = csite%fmean_sensible_gg   (k,ipa)       &
   995)                                                  * frqsumi
   996)                   csite%fmean_smoist_gg  (k,ipa) = csite%fmean_smoist_gg     (k,ipa)       &
   997)                                                  * frqsumi
   998)                   csite%fmean_transloss  (k,ipa) = csite%fmean_transloss     (k,ipa)       &
   999)                                                  * frqsumi
  1000)                end do
  1001)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1002) 
  1003) 
  1004) 
  1005) 
  1006)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1007)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1008)                !     Most state variables are already normalised.  All that we need to do  !
  1009)                ! is to find the derived properties.                                        !
  1010)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1011) 
  1012)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1013)                !     Soil matric potential, temperature, and liquid water.                 !
  1014)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1015)                do k=1,nzg
  1016)                   nsoil = cpoly%ntext_soil(k,isi)
  1017)                   call uextcm2tl( csite%fmean_soil_energy(k,ipa)                           &
  1018)                                 , csite%fmean_soil_water (k,ipa) * wdns                    &
  1019)                                 , soil(nsoil)%slcpd                                        &
  1020)                                 , csite%fmean_soil_temp  (k,ipa)                           &
  1021)                                 , csite%fmean_soil_fliq  (k,ipa))
  1022) 
  1023)                   csite%fmean_soil_mstpot (k,ipa) =                                        &
  1024)                                      matric_potential(nsoil,csite%fmean_soil_water (k,ipa))
  1025)                   
  1026)                end do
  1027)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1028) 
  1029) 
  1030) 
  1031) 
  1032)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1033)                !      Now we find the derived properties for the canopy air space.         !
  1034)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
