  1035)                can_exner                 = press2exner ( csite%fmean_can_prss  (ipa) )
  1036)                csite%fmean_can_temp(ipa) = extheta2temp( can_exner                         &
  1037)                                                        , csite%fmean_can_theta (ipa) )
  1038)                csite%fmean_can_rhos(ipa) = idealdenssh ( csite%fmean_can_prss  (ipa)       &
  1039)                                                        , csite%fmean_can_temp  (ipa)       &
  1040)                                                        , csite%fmean_can_shv   (ipa)       )
  1041)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1042) 
  1043) 
  1044) 
  1045) 
  1046)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1047)                !   If the patch had some temporary snow/pounding layer, convert the mean   !
  1048)                ! energy to J/kg, then find the mean temperature and liquid fraction.       !
  1049)                ! Otherwise, set them to either zero or default values.                     !
  1050)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1051)                if (csite%fmean_sfcw_mass(ipa) > tiny_sfcwater_mass) then
  1052)                   csite%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipa) = csite%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipa)              &
  1053)                                                / csite%fmean_sfcw_mass(ipa)
  1054)                   call uint2tl(csite%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipa),csite%fmean_sfcw_temp(ipa)     &
  1055)                               ,csite%fmean_sfcw_fliq(ipa))
  1056)                else
  1057)                   csite%fmean_sfcw_mass  (ipa)  = 0.
  1058)                   csite%fmean_sfcw_depth (ipa)  = 0.
  1059)                   csite%fmean_sfcw_energy(ipa)  = 0.
  1060)                   csite%fmean_sfcw_temp  (ipa)  = csite%fmean_soil_temp(nzg,ipa)
  1061)                   csite%fmean_sfcw_fliq  (ipa)  = csite%fmean_soil_fliq(nzg,ipa)
  1062)                end if
  1063)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1064) 
  1065) 
  1066) 
  1067) 
  1068)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1069)                !      Loop over the cohorts and find the mean for derived properties.      !
  1070)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1071)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  1072) 
  1073)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1074)                   ! Dead biomass and lai defined for the tower file required by pecan. If  !
  1075)                   ! not working with pecan, just ignore this.                              !
  1076)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1077) 
  1078)                   cpatch%fmean_bdead (ico)  =  cpatch%bdead  (ico) * cpatch%nplant  (ico)
  1079)                   cpatch%fmean_lai   (ico)  =  cpatch%lai    (ico) * cpatch%nplant  (ico)
  1080) 
  1081)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1082)                   !    Energy and water fluxes were integrated over the past frqsum        !
  1083)                   ! interval.   Use frqsumi to normalise them.  Energy fluxes will become  !
  1084)                   ! W/m�, and water fluxes will become kg/m�/s.                            !
  1085)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1086)                   cpatch%fmean_sensible_lc   (ico) = cpatch%fmean_sensible_lc   (ico)      &
  1087)                                                    * frqsumi
  1088)                   cpatch%fmean_vapor_lc      (ico) = cpatch%fmean_vapor_lc      (ico)      &
  1089)                                                    * frqsumi
  1090)                   cpatch%fmean_transp        (ico) = cpatch%fmean_transp        (ico)      &
  1091)                                                    * frqsumi
  1092)                   cpatch%fmean_intercepted_al(ico) = cpatch%fmean_intercepted_al(ico)      &
  1093)                                                    * frqsumi
  1094)                   cpatch%fmean_wshed_lg      (ico) = cpatch%fmean_wshed_lg      (ico)      &
  1095)                                                    * frqsumi
  1096)                   cpatch%fmean_sensible_wc   (ico) = cpatch%fmean_sensible_wc   (ico)      &
  1097)                                                    * frqsumi
  1098)                   cpatch%fmean_vapor_wc      (ico) = cpatch%fmean_vapor_wc      (ico)      &
  1099)                                                    * frqsumi
  1100)                   cpatch%fmean_intercepted_aw(ico) = cpatch%fmean_intercepted_aw(ico)      &
  1101)                                                    * frqsumi
  1102)                   cpatch%fmean_wshed_wg      (ico) = cpatch%fmean_wshed_wg      (ico)      &
  1103)                                                    * frqsumi
  1104)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1105) 
  1106) 
  1107) 
  1108)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1109)                   !     Find the vegetation temperature and liquid fraction.               !
  1110)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1111)                   !----- Leaf. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  1112)                   if (cpatch%fmean_leaf_hcap(ico) > 0.) then
  1113)                      call uextcm2tl( cpatch%fmean_leaf_energy(ico)                         &
  1114)                                    , cpatch%fmean_leaf_water (ico)                         &
  1115)                                    , cpatch%fmean_leaf_hcap  (ico)                         &
  1116)                                    , cpatch%fmean_leaf_temp  (ico)                         &
  1117)                                    , cpatch%fmean_leaf_fliq  (ico) )
  1118)                   else
  1119)                      cpatch%fmean_leaf_vpdef(ico) = csite%fmean_can_vpdef(ipa)
  1120)                      cpatch%fmean_leaf_temp (ico) = csite%fmean_can_temp (ipa)
  1121)                      if (csite%fmean_can_temp(ipa) > t00) then
  1122)                         cpatch%fmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 1.0
  1123)                      elseif (csite%fmean_can_temp(ipa) == t00) then
  1124)                         cpatch%fmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 0.5
  1125)                      else
  1126)                         cpatch%fmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 0.0
  1127)                      end if
  1128)                   end if
  1129)                   !----- Wood. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  1130)                   if (cpatch%fmean_wood_hcap(ico) > 0.) then
  1131)                      call uextcm2tl( cpatch%fmean_wood_energy(ico)                         &
  1132)                                    , cpatch%fmean_wood_water (ico)                         &
  1133)                                    , cpatch%fmean_wood_hcap  (ico)                         &
  1134)                                    , cpatch%fmean_wood_temp  (ico)                         &
  1135)                                    , cpatch%fmean_wood_fliq  (ico) )
  1136)                   else
  1137)                      cpatch%fmean_wood_temp(ico) = csite%fmean_can_temp(ipa)
  1138)                      if (csite%fmean_can_temp(ipa) > t00) then
  1139)                         cpatch%fmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 1.0
  1140)                      elseif (csite%fmean_can_temp(ipa) == t00) then
  1141)                         cpatch%fmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 0.5
  1142)                      else
  1143)                         cpatch%fmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 0.0
  1144)                      end if
  1145)                   end if
  1146)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1147) 
  1148) 
  1149) 
  1150) 
  1151)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1152)                   !      Integrate the total plant respiration and net primary             !
  1153)                   ! productivity.                                                          !
  1154)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1155)                   cpatch%fmean_plresp(ico) = cpatch%fmean_leaf_resp        (ico)           &
  1156)                                            + cpatch%fmean_root_resp        (ico)           &
  1157)                                            + cpatch%fmean_leaf_storage_resp(ico)           &
  1158)                                            + cpatch%fmean_root_storage_resp(ico)           &
  1159)                                            + cpatch%fmean_sapa_storage_resp(ico)           &
  1160)                                            + cpatch%fmean_sapb_storage_resp(ico)           &
  1161)                                            + cpatch%fmean_leaf_growth_resp (ico)           &
  1162)                                            + cpatch%fmean_root_growth_resp (ico)           &
  1163)                                            + cpatch%fmean_sapa_growth_resp (ico)           &
  1164)                                            + cpatch%fmean_sapb_growth_resp (ico)
  1165) 
  1166)                   cpatch%fmean_npp   (ico) = cpatch%fmean_gpp         (ico)                &
  1167)                                            - cpatch%fmean_plresp      (ico)
  1168)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1169) 
  1170) 
  1171) 
  1172)                   !----- Add LAI and extensive NPP to compute NEP. ------------------------!
  1173)                   pss_lai    = pss_lai    + cpatch%lai       (ico)
  1174)                   pss_npp    = pss_npp    + cpatch%fmean_npp (ico) * cpatch%nplant(ico)
  1175)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1176)                end do cohortloop
  1177)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1178) 
  1179) 
  1180) 
  1181)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1182)                !     Net Ecosystem Productivity found by combining the cohort-level terms  !
  1183)                ! (gross primary productivity and total plant respiration), with hetero-    !
  1184)                ! trophic respiration, a patch-level variable.                              !
  1185)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1186)                csite%fmean_nep(ipa) = pss_npp - csite%fmean_rh(ipa)
  1187)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1188) 
  1189) 
  1190) 
  1191) 
  1192)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1193)                !      Budget variables.  They contain integral values, so we must divide   !
  1194)                ! by the elapsed time to get them in flux units.                            !
  1195)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1196)                csite%co2budget_gpp        (ipa) = csite%co2budget_gpp        (ipa) * frqsumi
  1197)                csite%co2budget_plresp     (ipa) = csite%co2budget_plresp     (ipa) * frqsumi
  1198)                csite%co2budget_rh         (ipa) = csite%co2budget_rh         (ipa) * frqsumi
  1199)                csite%co2budget_loss2atm   (ipa) = csite%co2budget_loss2atm   (ipa) * frqsumi
  1200)                csite%co2budget_denseffect (ipa) = csite%co2budget_denseffect (ipa) * frqsumi
  1201)                csite%co2budget_residual   (ipa) = csite%co2budget_residual   (ipa) * frqsumi
  1202)                csite%ebudget_precipgain   (ipa) = csite%ebudget_precipgain   (ipa) * frqsumi
  1203)                csite%ebudget_netrad       (ipa) = csite%ebudget_netrad       (ipa) * frqsumi
  1204)                csite%ebudget_denseffect   (ipa) = csite%ebudget_denseffect   (ipa) * frqsumi
  1205)                csite%ebudget_prsseffect   (ipa) = csite%ebudget_prsseffect   (ipa) * frqsumi
  1206)                csite%ebudget_loss2atm     (ipa) = csite%ebudget_loss2atm     (ipa) * frqsumi
  1207)                csite%ebudget_loss2drainage(ipa) = csite%ebudget_loss2drainage(ipa) * frqsumi
  1208)                csite%ebudget_loss2runoff  (ipa) = csite%ebudget_loss2runoff  (ipa) * frqsumi
  1209)                csite%ebudget_residual     (ipa) = csite%ebudget_residual     (ipa) * frqsumi
  1210)                csite%wbudget_precipgain   (ipa) = csite%wbudget_precipgain   (ipa) * frqsumi
  1211)                csite%wbudget_loss2atm     (ipa) = csite%wbudget_loss2atm     (ipa) * frqsumi
  1212)                csite%wbudget_loss2drainage(ipa) = csite%wbudget_loss2drainage(ipa) * frqsumi
  1213)                csite%wbudget_loss2runoff  (ipa) = csite%wbudget_loss2runoff  (ipa) * frqsumi
  1214)                csite%wbudget_denseffect   (ipa) = csite%wbudget_denseffect   (ipa) * frqsumi
  1215)                csite%wbudget_residual     (ipa) = csite%wbudget_residual     (ipa) * frqsumi
  1216)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1217)             end do patchloop
  1218)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1219)          end do siteloop
  1220)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1221)       end do polyloop
  1222)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1223)       return
  1224)    end subroutine normalize_ed_fmean_vars
  1225)    !=======================================================================================!
  1226)    !=======================================================================================!
  1227) 
  1228) 
  1229) 
  1230) 
  1231) 
  1232) 
  1233)    !=======================================================================================!
  1234)    !=======================================================================================!
  1235)    subroutine zero_ed_fmean_vars(cgrid)
  1236) 
  1237)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype      & ! structure
  1238)                               , polygontype & ! structure
  1239)                               , sitetype    & ! structure
  1240)                               , patchtype   ! ! structure
  1241)       
  1242)       implicit none
  1243)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1244)       type(edtype)     , target  :: cgrid
  1245)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  1246)       type(polygontype), pointer :: cpoly
  1247)       type(sitetype)   , pointer :: csite
  1248)       type(patchtype)  , pointer :: cpatch
  1249)       integer                    :: ipy
  1250)       integer                    :: isi
  1251)       integer                    :: ipa
  1252)       integer                    :: ico
  1253)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1254) 
  1255)       polyloop: do ipy = 1,cgrid%npolygons
  1256)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  1257) 
  1258)          cgrid%fmean_gpp             (  ipy) = 0.0
  1259)          cgrid%fmean_npp             (  ipy) = 0.0
  1260)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_resp       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1261)          cgrid%fmean_root_resp       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1262)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_growth_resp(  ipy) = 0.0
  1263)          cgrid%fmean_root_growth_resp(  ipy) = 0.0
  1264)          cgrid%fmean_sapa_growth_resp(  ipy) = 0.0
  1265)          cgrid%fmean_sapb_growth_resp(  ipy) = 0.0
  1266)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_storage_resp(  ipy) = 0.0
  1267)          cgrid%fmean_root_storage_resp(  ipy) = 0.0
  1268)          cgrid%fmean_sapa_storage_resp(  ipy) = 0.0
  1269)          cgrid%fmean_sapb_storage_resp(  ipy) = 0.0
  1270)          cgrid%fmean_plresp          (  ipy) = 0.0
  1271)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_energy     (  ipy) = 0.0
  1272)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_water      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1273)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_hcap       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1274)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_vpdef      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1275)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_temp       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1276)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_fliq       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1277)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_gsw        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1278)          cgrid%fmean_leaf_gbw        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1279)          cgrid%fmean_wood_energy     (  ipy) = 0.0
  1280)          cgrid%fmean_wood_water      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1281)          cgrid%fmean_wood_hcap       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1282)          cgrid%fmean_wood_temp       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1283)          cgrid%fmean_wood_fliq       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1284)          cgrid%fmean_wood_gbw        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1285)          cgrid%fmean_fs_open         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1286)          cgrid%fmean_fsw             (  ipy) = 0.0
  1287)          cgrid%fmean_fsn             (  ipy) = 0.0
  1288)          cgrid%fmean_a_open          (  ipy) = 0.0
  1289)          cgrid%fmean_a_closed        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1290)          cgrid%fmean_a_net           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1291)          cgrid%fmean_a_light         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1292)          cgrid%fmean_a_rubp          (  ipy) = 0.0
  1293)          cgrid%fmean_a_co2           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1294)          cgrid%fmean_psi_open        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1295)          cgrid%fmean_psi_closed      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1296)          cgrid%fmean_water_supply    (  ipy) = 0.0
  1297)          cgrid%fmean_par_l           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1298)          cgrid%fmean_par_l_beam      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1299)          cgrid%fmean_par_l_diff      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1300)          cgrid%fmean_rshort_l        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1301)          cgrid%fmean_rlong_l         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1302)          cgrid%fmean_sensible_lc     (  ipy) = 0.0
  1303)          cgrid%fmean_vapor_lc        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1304)          cgrid%fmean_transp          (  ipy) = 0.0
  1305)          cgrid%fmean_intercepted_al  (  ipy) = 0.0
  1306)          cgrid%fmean_wshed_lg        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1307)          cgrid%fmean_rshort_w        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1308)          cgrid%fmean_rlong_w         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1309)          cgrid%fmean_sensible_wc     (  ipy) = 0.0
  1310)          cgrid%fmean_vapor_wc        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1311)          cgrid%fmean_intercepted_aw  (  ipy) = 0.0
  1312)          cgrid%fmean_wshed_wg        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1313)          cgrid%fmean_lai             (  ipy) = 0.0         
  1314)          cgrid%fmean_bdead           (  ipy) = 0.0         
  1315)          cgrid%fmean_rh              (  ipy) = 0.0
  1316)          cgrid%fmean_cwd_rh          (  ipy) = 0.0
  1317)          cgrid%fmean_nep             (  ipy) = 0.0
  1318)          cgrid%fmean_rk4step         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1319)          cgrid%fmean_available_water (  ipy) = 0.0
  1320)          cgrid%fmean_can_theiv       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1321)          cgrid%fmean_can_theta       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1322)          cgrid%fmean_can_vpdef       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1323)          cgrid%fmean_can_temp        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1324)          cgrid%fmean_can_shv         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1325)          cgrid%fmean_can_co2         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1326)          cgrid%fmean_can_rhos        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1327)          cgrid%fmean_can_prss        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1328)          cgrid%fmean_gnd_temp        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1329)          cgrid%fmean_gnd_shv         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1330)          cgrid%fmean_can_ggnd        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1331)          cgrid%fmean_sfcw_depth      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1332)          cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy     (  ipy) = 0.0
  1333)          cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1334)          cgrid%fmean_sfcw_temp       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1335)          cgrid%fmean_sfcw_fliq       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1336)          cgrid%fmean_soil_energy     (:,ipy) = 0.0
  1337)          cgrid%fmean_soil_mstpot     (:,ipy) = 0.0
  1338)          cgrid%fmean_soil_water      (:,ipy) = 0.0
  1339)          cgrid%fmean_soil_temp       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  1340)          cgrid%fmean_soil_fliq       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  1341)          cgrid%fmean_rshort_gnd      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1342)          cgrid%fmean_par_gnd         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1343)          cgrid%fmean_rlong_gnd       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1344)          cgrid%fmean_rlongup         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1345)          cgrid%fmean_parup           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1346)          cgrid%fmean_nirup           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1347)          cgrid%fmean_rshortup        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1348)          cgrid%fmean_rnet            (  ipy) = 0.0
  1349)          cgrid%fmean_albedo          (  ipy) = 0.0
  1350)          cgrid%fmean_albedo_par      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1351)          cgrid%fmean_albedo_nir      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1352)          cgrid%fmean_rlong_albedo    (  ipy) = 0.0
  1353)          cgrid%fmean_ustar           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1354)          cgrid%fmean_tstar           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1355)          cgrid%fmean_qstar           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1356)          cgrid%fmean_cstar           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1357)          cgrid%fmean_carbon_ac       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1358)          cgrid%fmean_carbon_st       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1359)          cgrid%fmean_vapor_gc        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1360)          cgrid%fmean_vapor_ac        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1361)          cgrid%fmean_smoist_gg       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  1362)          cgrid%fmean_throughfall     (  ipy) = 0.0
  1363)          cgrid%fmean_transloss       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  1364)          cgrid%fmean_runoff          (  ipy) = 0.0
  1365)          cgrid%fmean_drainage        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1366)          cgrid%fmean_sensible_gc     (  ipy) = 0.0
  1367)          cgrid%fmean_sensible_ac     (  ipy) = 0.0
  1368)          cgrid%fmean_sensible_gg     (:,ipy) = 0.0
  1369)          cgrid%fmean_qthroughfall    (  ipy) = 0.0
  1370)          cgrid%fmean_qrunoff         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1371)          cgrid%fmean_qdrainage       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1372)          cgrid%fmean_atm_theiv       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1373)          cgrid%fmean_atm_theta       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1374)          cgrid%fmean_atm_temp        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1375)          cgrid%fmean_atm_vpdef       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1376)          cgrid%fmean_atm_shv         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1377)          cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort      (  ipy) = 0.0
  1378)          cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort_diff (  ipy) = 0.0
  1379)          cgrid%fmean_atm_par         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1380)          cgrid%fmean_atm_par_diff    (  ipy) = 0.0
  1381)          cgrid%fmean_atm_rlong       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1382)          cgrid%fmean_atm_vels        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1383)          cgrid%fmean_atm_rhos        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1384)          cgrid%fmean_atm_prss        (  ipy) = 0.0
  1385)          cgrid%fmean_atm_co2         (  ipy) = 0.0
  1386)          cgrid%fmean_pcpg            (  ipy) = 0.0
  1387)          cgrid%fmean_qpcpg           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1388)          cgrid%fmean_dpcpg           (  ipy) = 0.0
  1389)          cgrid%fmean_soil_wetness    (  ipy) = 0.0
  1390)          cgrid%fmean_skin_temp       (  ipy) = 0.0
  1391) 
  1392)          siteloop: do isi = 1,cpoly%nsites
  1393)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  1394) 
  1395)             cpoly%fmean_atm_theiv      (isi) = 0.0
  1396)             cpoly%fmean_atm_theta      (isi) = 0.0
  1397)             cpoly%fmean_atm_temp       (isi) = 0.0
  1398)             cpoly%fmean_atm_vpdef      (isi) = 0.0
  1399)             cpoly%fmean_atm_shv        (isi) = 0.0
  1400)             cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort     (isi) = 0.0
  1401)             cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi) = 0.0
  1402)             cpoly%fmean_atm_par        (isi) = 0.0
  1403)             cpoly%fmean_atm_par_diff   (isi) = 0.0
  1404)             cpoly%fmean_atm_rlong      (isi) = 0.0
  1405)             cpoly%fmean_atm_vels       (isi) = 0.0
  1406)             cpoly%fmean_atm_rhos       (isi) = 0.0
  1407)             cpoly%fmean_atm_prss       (isi) = 0.0
  1408)             cpoly%fmean_atm_co2        (isi) = 0.0
  1409)             cpoly%fmean_pcpg           (isi) = 0.0
  1410)             cpoly%fmean_qpcpg          (isi) = 0.0
  1411)             cpoly%fmean_dpcpg          (isi) = 0.0
  1412) 
  1413)             patchloop: do ipa = 1,csite%npatches
  1414)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  1415) 
  1416)                !----- Budget variables. ---------------------------------------------------!
  1417)                csite%co2budget_gpp                 (ipa) = 0.0
  1418)                csite%co2budget_rh                  (ipa) = 0.0
  1419)                csite%co2budget_plresp              (ipa) = 0.0
  1420)                csite%co2budget_residual            (ipa) = 0.0
  1421)                csite%co2budget_loss2atm            (ipa) = 0.0
  1422)                csite%co2budget_denseffect          (ipa) = 0.0
  1423)                csite%wbudget_precipgain            (ipa) = 0.0
  1424)                csite%wbudget_loss2atm              (ipa) = 0.0
  1425)                csite%wbudget_loss2runoff           (ipa) = 0.0
  1426)                csite%wbudget_loss2drainage         (ipa) = 0.0
  1427)                csite%wbudget_denseffect            (ipa) = 0.0
  1428)                csite%wbudget_residual              (ipa) = 0.0
  1429)                csite%ebudget_precipgain            (ipa) = 0.0
  1430)                csite%ebudget_netrad                (ipa) = 0.0
  1431)                csite%ebudget_loss2atm              (ipa) = 0.0
  1432)                csite%ebudget_loss2runoff           (ipa) = 0.0
  1433)                csite%ebudget_loss2drainage         (ipa) = 0.0
  1434)                csite%ebudget_denseffect            (ipa) = 0.0
  1435)                csite%ebudget_prsseffect            (ipa) = 0.0
  1436)                csite%ebudget_residual              (ipa) = 0.0
  1437)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1438) 
  1439) 
  1440) 
  1441) 
  1442)                !----- Fast average variables. ---------------------------------------------!
  1443)                csite%fmean_rh             (  ipa) = 0.0
  1444)                csite%fmean_cwd_rh         (  ipa) = 0.0
  1445)                csite%fmean_nep            (  ipa) = 0.0
  1446)                csite%fmean_rk4step        (  ipa) = 0.0
  1447)                csite%fmean_available_water(  ipa) = 0.0
  1448)                csite%fmean_can_theiv      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1449)                csite%fmean_can_theta      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1450)                csite%fmean_can_vpdef      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1451)                csite%fmean_can_temp       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1452)                csite%fmean_can_shv        (  ipa) = 0.0
  1453)                csite%fmean_can_co2        (  ipa) = 0.0
  1454)                csite%fmean_can_rhos       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1455)                csite%fmean_can_prss       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1456)                csite%fmean_gnd_temp       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1457)                csite%fmean_gnd_shv        (  ipa) = 0.0
  1458)                csite%fmean_can_ggnd       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1459)                csite%fmean_sfcw_depth     (  ipa) = 0.0
  1460)                csite%fmean_sfcw_energy    (  ipa) = 0.0
  1461)                csite%fmean_sfcw_mass      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1462)                csite%fmean_sfcw_temp      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1463)                csite%fmean_sfcw_fliq      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1464)                csite%fmean_soil_energy    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  1465)                csite%fmean_soil_mstpot    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  1466)                csite%fmean_soil_water     (:,ipa) = 0.0
  1467)                csite%fmean_soil_temp      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  1468)                csite%fmean_soil_fliq      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  1469)                csite%fmean_rshort_gnd     (  ipa) = 0.0
  1470)                csite%fmean_par_gnd        (  ipa) = 0.0
  1471)                csite%fmean_rlong_gnd      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1472)                csite%fmean_rlongup        (  ipa) = 0.0
  1473)                csite%fmean_parup          (  ipa) = 0.0
  1474)                csite%fmean_nirup          (  ipa) = 0.0
  1475)                csite%fmean_rshortup       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1476)                csite%fmean_rnet           (  ipa) = 0.0
  1477)                csite%fmean_albedo         (  ipa) = 0.0
  1478)                csite%fmean_albedo_par     (  ipa) = 0.0
  1479)                csite%fmean_albedo_nir     (  ipa) = 0.0
  1480)                csite%fmean_rlong_albedo   (  ipa) = 0.0
  1481)                csite%fmean_ustar          (  ipa) = 0.0
  1482)                csite%fmean_tstar          (  ipa) = 0.0
  1483)                csite%fmean_qstar          (  ipa) = 0.0
  1484)                csite%fmean_cstar          (  ipa) = 0.0
  1485)                csite%fmean_carbon_ac      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1486)                csite%fmean_carbon_st      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1487)                csite%fmean_vapor_gc       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1488)                csite%fmean_vapor_ac       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1489)                csite%fmean_smoist_gg      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  1490)                csite%fmean_throughfall    (  ipa) = 0.0
  1491)                csite%fmean_transloss      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  1492)                csite%fmean_runoff         (  ipa) = 0.0
  1493)                csite%fmean_drainage       (  ipa) = 0.0
  1494)                csite%fmean_sensible_gc    (  ipa) = 0.0
  1495)                csite%fmean_sensible_ac    (  ipa) = 0.0
  1496)                csite%fmean_sensible_gg    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  1497)                csite%fmean_qthroughfall   (  ipa) = 0.0
  1498)                csite%fmean_qrunoff        (  ipa) = 0.0
  1499)                csite%fmean_qdrainage      (  ipa) = 0.0
  1500)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1501) 
  1502) 
  1503) 
  1504) 
  1505)                !----- Cohort level variables. ---------------------------------------------!
  1506)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  1507)                   cpatch%fmean_gpp               (ico) = 0.0
  1508)                   cpatch%fmean_npp               (ico) = 0.0
  1509)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_resp         (ico) = 0.0
  1510)                   cpatch%fmean_root_resp         (ico) = 0.0
  1511)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  1512)                   cpatch%fmean_root_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  1513)                   cpatch%fmean_sapa_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  1514)                   cpatch%fmean_sapb_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  1515)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  1516)                   cpatch%fmean_root_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  1517)                   cpatch%fmean_sapa_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  1518)                   cpatch%fmean_sapb_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  1519)                   cpatch%fmean_plresp            (ico) = 0.0
  1520)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_energy       (ico) = 0.0
  1521)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_water        (ico) = 0.0
  1522)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_hcap         (ico) = 0.0
  1523)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_vpdef        (ico) = 0.0
  1524)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_temp         (ico) = 0.0
  1525)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_fliq         (ico) = 0.0
  1526)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_gsw          (ico) = 0.0
  1527)                   cpatch%fmean_leaf_gbw          (ico) = 0.0
  1528)                   cpatch%fmean_wood_energy       (ico) = 0.0
  1529)                   cpatch%fmean_wood_water        (ico) = 0.0
  1530)                   cpatch%fmean_wood_hcap         (ico) = 0.0
  1531)                   cpatch%fmean_wood_temp         (ico) = 0.0
  1532)                   cpatch%fmean_wood_fliq         (ico) = 0.0
  1533)                   cpatch%fmean_wood_gbw          (ico) = 0.0
  1534)                   cpatch%fmean_fs_open           (ico) = 0.0
  1535)                   cpatch%fmean_fsw               (ico) = 0.0
  1536)                   cpatch%fmean_fsn               (ico) = 0.0
  1537)                   cpatch%fmean_a_open            (ico) = 0.0
  1538)                   cpatch%fmean_a_closed          (ico) = 0.0
  1539)                   cpatch%fmean_a_net             (ico) = 0.0
  1540)                   cpatch%fmean_a_light           (ico) = 0.0
  1541)                   cpatch%fmean_a_rubp            (ico) = 0.0
  1542)                   cpatch%fmean_a_co2             (ico) = 0.0
  1543)                   cpatch%fmean_psi_open          (ico) = 0.0
  1544)                   cpatch%fmean_psi_closed        (ico) = 0.0
  1545)                   cpatch%fmean_water_supply      (ico) = 0.0
  1546)                   cpatch%fmean_light_level       (ico) = 0.0
  1547)                   cpatch%fmean_light_level_beam  (ico) = 0.0
  1548)                   cpatch%fmean_light_level_diff  (ico) = 0.0
  1549) 
  1550)                   cpatch%fmean_par_level_beam    (ico) = 0.0                  
  1551)                   cpatch%fmean_par_level_diffd   (ico) = 0.0                  
  1552)                   cpatch%fmean_par_level_diffu   (ico) = 0.0
  1553) 
  1554)                   cpatch%fmean_par_l             (ico) = 0.0
  1555)                   cpatch%fmean_par_l_beam        (ico) = 0.0
  1556)                   cpatch%fmean_par_l_diff        (ico) = 0.0
  1557)                   cpatch%fmean_rshort_l          (ico) = 0.0
  1558)                   cpatch%fmean_rlong_l           (ico) = 0.0
  1559)                   cpatch%fmean_sensible_lc       (ico) = 0.0
  1560)                   cpatch%fmean_vapor_lc          (ico) = 0.0
  1561)                   cpatch%fmean_transp            (ico) = 0.0
  1562)                   cpatch%fmean_intercepted_al    (ico) = 0.0
  1563)                   cpatch%fmean_wshed_lg          (ico) = 0.0
  1564)                   cpatch%fmean_rshort_w          (ico) = 0.0
  1565)                   cpatch%fmean_rlong_w           (ico) = 0.0
  1566)                   cpatch%fmean_rad_profile     (:,ico) = 0.0
  1567)                   cpatch%fmean_sensible_wc       (ico) = 0.0
  1568)                   cpatch%fmean_vapor_wc          (ico) = 0.0
  1569)                   cpatch%fmean_intercepted_aw    (ico) = 0.0
  1570)                   cpatch%fmean_wshed_wg          (ico) = 0.0
  1571)                   cpatch%fmean_lai               (ico) = 0.0
  1572)                   cpatch%fmean_bdead             (ico) = 0.0
  1573)                end do cohortloop
  1574)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1575)             end do patchloop
  1576)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1577)          end do siteloop
  1578)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1579)       end do polyloop
  1580)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1581) 
  1582) 
  1583)       return
  1584)    end subroutine zero_ed_fmean_vars
  1585)    !=======================================================================================!
  1586)    !=======================================================================================!
  1587)    !=======================================================================================!
  1588)    !=======================================================================================!
  1589)    !=======================================================================================!
  1590)    !=======================================================================================!
  1591) 
  1592) 
  1593) 
  1594) 
  1595) 
  1596) 
  1597) 
  1598) 
  1599) 
  1600) 
  1601)    !=======================================================================================!
  1602)    !=======================================================================================!
  1603)    !=======================================================================================!
  1604)    !=======================================================================================!
  1605)    !=======================================================================================!
  1606)    !=======================================================================================!
  1607)    !                             |-------------------------------|                         !
  1608)    !                             |** DAILY AVERAGE SUBROUTINES **|                         !
  1609)    !                             |-------------------------------|                         !
  1610)    !=======================================================================================!
  1611)    !=======================================================================================!
  1612)    !=======================================================================================!
  1613)    !=======================================================================================!
  1614)    !=======================================================================================!
  1615)    !=======================================================================================!
  1616) 
  1617) 
  1618) 
  1619) 
  1620) 
  1621) 
  1622)    !=======================================================================================!
  1623)    !=======================================================================================!
  1624)    !    This subroutine integrates most of the daily averages.  This is called after the   !
  1625)    ! "fmean" variables are normalised, so we take advantage of these "fmean" variables.    !
  1626)    !                                                                                       !
  1627)    !    A few variables are _NOT_ integrated here:                                         !
  1628)    ! 1. Variables that should be integrated only during daylight hours                     !
  1629)    ! 2. The NPP breakdown variables are integrated in a separate routine                   !
  1630)    ! 3. Variables such as temperature and liquid fraction, which are found after the daily !
  1631)    !    means are normalised.                                                              !
  1632)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1633)    subroutine integrate_ed_dmean_vars(cgrid)
  1634)       use ed_state_vars        , only : edtype              & ! structure
  1635)                                       , polygontype         & ! structure
  1636)                                       , sitetype            & ! structure
  1637)                                       , patchtype           ! ! structure
  1638)       use ed_misc_coms         , only : frqsum              ! ! intent(in)
  1639)       use consts_coms          , only : day_sec             ! ! intent(in)
  1640)       implicit none
  1641) 
  1642)       !----- Argument ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1643)       type(edtype)      , target  :: cgrid
  1644)       !----- Local variables --------------------------------------------------------------!
  1645)       type(polygontype) , pointer :: cpoly
  1646)       type(sitetype)    , pointer :: csite
  1647)       type(patchtype)   , pointer :: cpatch
  1648)       integer                     :: ipy
  1649)       integer                     :: isi
  1650)       integer                     :: ipa
  1651)       integer                     :: ico
  1652)       !----- Locally saved variables. -----------------------------------------------------!
  1653)       logical                            , save       :: find_factors    = .true.
  1654)       real                               , save       :: frqsum_o_daysec = 1.e34
  1655)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1656) 
  1657) 
  1658)       !----- Compute the normalisation factors. This is done only once. -------------------!
  1659)       if (find_factors) then
  1660)          frqsum_o_daysec = frqsum / day_sec
  1661)          find_factors    = .false.
  1662)       end if
  1663)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1664) 
  1665) 
  1666)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1667)       !      Use the variables that have been already aggregated.                          !
  1668)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1669)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  1670)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  1671) 
  1672)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1673)          !    Integrate polygon-level variables.                                           !
  1674)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  1675)          cgrid%dmean_gpp            (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_gpp            (ipy)               &
  1676)                                           + cgrid%fmean_gpp            (ipy)               &
  1677)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1678)          cgrid%dmean_npp            (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_npp            (ipy)               &
  1679)                                           + cgrid%fmean_npp            (ipy)               &
  1680)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1681)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_resp      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_leaf_resp      (ipy)               &
  1682)                                           + cgrid%fmean_leaf_resp      (ipy)               &
  1683)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1684)          cgrid%dmean_root_resp      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_root_resp      (ipy)               &
  1685)                                           + cgrid%fmean_root_resp      (ipy)               &
  1686)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1687)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_growth_resp(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_leaf_growth_resp(ipy)             &
  1688)                                            + cgrid%fmean_leaf_growth_resp(ipy)             &
  1689)                                            * frqsum_o_daysec
  1690)          cgrid%dmean_root_growth_resp(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_root_growth_resp(ipy)             &
  1691)                                            + cgrid%fmean_root_growth_resp(ipy)             &
  1692)                                            * frqsum_o_daysec
  1693)          cgrid%dmean_sapa_growth_resp(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sapa_growth_resp(ipy)             &
  1694)                                            + cgrid%fmean_sapa_growth_resp(ipy)             &
  1695)                                            * frqsum_o_daysec
  1696)          cgrid%dmean_sapb_growth_resp(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sapb_growth_resp(ipy)             &
  1697)                                            + cgrid%fmean_sapb_growth_resp(ipy)             &
  1698)                                            * frqsum_o_daysec
  1699)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_storage_resp(ipy)= cgrid%dmean_leaf_storage_resp(ipy)            &
  1700)                                            + cgrid%fmean_leaf_storage_resp(ipy)            &
  1701)                                            * frqsum_o_daysec
  1702)          cgrid%dmean_root_storage_resp(ipy)= cgrid%dmean_root_storage_resp(ipy)            &
  1703)                                            + cgrid%fmean_root_storage_resp(ipy)            &
  1704)                                            * frqsum_o_daysec
  1705)          cgrid%dmean_sapa_storage_resp(ipy)= cgrid%dmean_sapa_storage_resp(ipy)            &
  1706)                                            + cgrid%fmean_sapa_storage_resp(ipy)            &
  1707)                                            * frqsum_o_daysec
  1708)          cgrid%dmean_sapb_storage_resp(ipy)= cgrid%dmean_sapb_storage_resp(ipy)            &
  1709)                                            + cgrid%fmean_sapb_storage_resp(ipy)            &
  1710)                                            * frqsum_o_daysec
  1711)          cgrid%dmean_plresp         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_plresp         (ipy)               &
  1712)                                           + cgrid%fmean_plresp         (ipy)               &
  1713)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1714)          cgrid%dmean_a_open         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_a_open         (ipy)               &
  1715)                                           + cgrid%fmean_a_open         (ipy)               &
  1716)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1717)          cgrid%dmean_a_closed       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_a_closed       (ipy)               &
  1718)                                           + cgrid%fmean_a_closed       (ipy)               &
  1719)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1720)          cgrid%dmean_a_net          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_a_net          (ipy)               &
  1721)                                           + cgrid%fmean_a_net          (ipy)               &
  1722)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1723)          cgrid%dmean_a_light        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_a_light        (ipy)               &
  1724)                                           + cgrid%fmean_a_light        (ipy)               &
  1725)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1726)          cgrid%dmean_a_rubp         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_a_rubp         (ipy)               &
  1727)                                           + cgrid%fmean_a_rubp         (ipy)               &
  1728)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1729)          cgrid%dmean_a_co2          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_a_co2          (ipy)               &
  1730)                                           + cgrid%fmean_a_co2          (ipy)               &
  1731)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1732)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_energy    (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_leaf_energy    (ipy)               &
  1733)                                           + cgrid%fmean_leaf_energy    (ipy)               &
  1734)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1735)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_water     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_leaf_water     (ipy)               &
  1736)                                           + cgrid%fmean_leaf_water     (ipy)               &
  1737)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1738)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_hcap      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_leaf_hcap      (ipy)               &
  1739)                                           + cgrid%fmean_leaf_hcap      (ipy)               &
  1740)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1741)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_vpdef     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_leaf_vpdef     (ipy)               &
  1742)                                           + cgrid%fmean_leaf_vpdef     (ipy)               &
  1743)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1744)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_gsw       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_leaf_gsw       (ipy)               &
  1745)                                           + cgrid%fmean_leaf_gsw       (ipy)               &
  1746)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1747)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_gbw       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_leaf_gbw       (ipy)               &
  1748)                                           + cgrid%fmean_leaf_gbw       (ipy)               &
  1749)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1750)          cgrid%dmean_wood_energy    (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_wood_energy    (ipy)               &
  1751)                                           + cgrid%fmean_wood_energy    (ipy)               &
  1752)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1753)          cgrid%dmean_wood_water     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_wood_water     (ipy)               &
  1754)                                           + cgrid%fmean_wood_water     (ipy)               &
  1755)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1756)          cgrid%dmean_wood_hcap      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_wood_hcap      (ipy)               &
  1757)                                           + cgrid%fmean_wood_hcap      (ipy)               &
  1758)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1759)          cgrid%dmean_wood_gbw       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_wood_gbw       (ipy)               &
  1760)                                           + cgrid%fmean_wood_gbw       (ipy)               &
  1761)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1762)          cgrid%dmean_psi_open       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_psi_open       (ipy)               &
  1763)                                           + cgrid%fmean_psi_open       (ipy)               &
  1764)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1765)          cgrid%dmean_psi_closed     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_psi_closed     (ipy)               &
  1766)                                           + cgrid%fmean_psi_closed     (ipy)               &
  1767)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1768)          cgrid%dmean_water_supply   (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_water_supply   (ipy)               &
  1769)                                           + cgrid%fmean_water_supply   (ipy)               &
  1770)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1771)          cgrid%dmean_par_l          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_par_l          (ipy)               &
  1772)                                           + cgrid%fmean_par_l          (ipy)               &
  1773)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1774)          cgrid%dmean_par_l_beam     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_par_l_beam     (ipy)               &
  1775)                                           + cgrid%fmean_par_l_beam     (ipy)               &
  1776)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1777)          cgrid%dmean_par_l_diff     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_par_l_diff     (ipy)               &
  1778)                                           + cgrid%fmean_par_l_diff     (ipy)               &
  1779)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1780)          cgrid%dmean_rshort_l       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rshort_l       (ipy)               &
  1781)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rshort_l       (ipy)               &
  1782)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1783)          cgrid%dmean_rlong_l        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rlong_l        (ipy)               &
  1784)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rlong_l        (ipy)               &
  1785)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1786)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_lc    (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sensible_lc    (ipy)               &
  1787)                                           + cgrid%fmean_sensible_lc    (ipy)               &
  1788)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1789)          cgrid%dmean_vapor_lc       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_vapor_lc       (ipy)               &
  1790)                                           + cgrid%fmean_vapor_lc       (ipy)               &
  1791)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1792)          cgrid%dmean_transp         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_transp         (ipy)               &
  1793)                                           + cgrid%fmean_transp         (ipy)               &
  1794)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1795)          cgrid%dmean_intercepted_al (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_intercepted_al (ipy)               &
  1796)                                           + cgrid%fmean_intercepted_al (ipy)               &
  1797)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1798)          cgrid%dmean_wshed_lg       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_wshed_lg       (ipy)               &
  1799)                                           + cgrid%fmean_wshed_lg       (ipy)               &
  1800)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1801)          cgrid%dmean_rshort_w       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rshort_w       (ipy)               &
  1802)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rshort_w       (ipy)               &
  1803)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1804)          cgrid%dmean_rlong_w        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rlong_w        (ipy)               &
  1805)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rlong_w        (ipy)               &
  1806)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1807)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_wc    (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sensible_wc    (ipy)               &
  1808)                                           + cgrid%fmean_sensible_wc    (ipy)               &
  1809)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1810)          cgrid%dmean_vapor_wc       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_vapor_wc       (ipy)               &
  1811)                                           + cgrid%fmean_vapor_wc       (ipy)               &
  1812)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1813)          cgrid%dmean_intercepted_aw (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_intercepted_aw (ipy)               &
  1814)                                           + cgrid%fmean_intercepted_aw (ipy)               &
  1815)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1816)          cgrid%dmean_wshed_wg       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_wshed_wg       (ipy)               &
  1817)                                           + cgrid%fmean_wshed_wg       (ipy)               &
  1818)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1819)          cgrid%dmean_rh             (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rh             (ipy)               &
  1820)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rh             (ipy)               &
  1821)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1822)          cgrid%dmean_cwd_rh         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_cwd_rh         (ipy)               &
  1823)                                           + cgrid%fmean_cwd_rh         (ipy)               &
  1824)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1825)          cgrid%dmean_nep            (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nep            (ipy)               &
  1826)                                           + cgrid%fmean_nep            (ipy)               &
  1827)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1828)          cgrid%dmean_rk4step        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rk4step        (ipy)               &
  1829)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rk4step        (ipy)               &
  1830)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1831)          cgrid%dmean_available_water(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_available_water(ipy)               &
  1832)                                           + cgrid%fmean_available_water(ipy)               &
  1833)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1834)          cgrid%dmean_can_theiv      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_theiv      (ipy)               &
  1835)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_theiv      (ipy)               &
  1836)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1837)          cgrid%dmean_can_theta      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_theta      (ipy)               &
  1838)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_theta      (ipy)               &
  1839)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1840)          cgrid%dmean_can_vpdef      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_vpdef      (ipy)               &
  1841)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_vpdef      (ipy)               &
  1842)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1843)          cgrid%dmean_can_temp       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_temp       (ipy)               &
  1844)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_temp       (ipy)               &
  1845)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1846)          cgrid%dmean_can_shv        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_shv        (ipy)               &
  1847)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_shv        (ipy)               &
  1848)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1849)          cgrid%dmean_can_co2        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_co2        (ipy)               &
  1850)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_co2        (ipy)               &
  1851)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1852)          cgrid%dmean_can_rhos       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_rhos       (ipy)               &
  1853)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_rhos       (ipy)               &
  1854)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1855)          cgrid%dmean_can_prss       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_prss       (ipy)               &
  1856)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_prss       (ipy)               &
  1857)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1858)          cgrid%dmean_gnd_temp       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_gnd_temp       (ipy)               &
  1859)                                           + cgrid%fmean_gnd_temp       (ipy)               &
  1860)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1861)          cgrid%dmean_gnd_shv        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_gnd_shv        (ipy)               &
  1862)                                           + cgrid%fmean_gnd_shv        (ipy)               &
  1863)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1864)          cgrid%dmean_can_ggnd       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_ggnd       (ipy)               &
  1865)                                           + cgrid%fmean_can_ggnd       (ipy)               &
  1866)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1867)          cgrid%dmean_sfcw_depth     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sfcw_depth     (ipy)               &
  1868)                                           + cgrid%fmean_sfcw_depth     (ipy)               &
  1869)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1870)          !------ Integrate the extensive version of temporary surface water energy. -------!
  1871)          cgrid%dmean_sfcw_energy    (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sfcw_energy    (ipy)               &
  1872)                                           + cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy    (ipy)               &
  1873)                                           * cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass      (ipy)               &
  1874)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1875)          cgrid%dmean_sfcw_mass      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sfcw_mass      (ipy)               &
  1876)                                           + cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass      (ipy)               &
  1877)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1878)          cgrid%dmean_rshort_gnd     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rshort_gnd     (ipy)               &
  1879)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rshort_gnd     (ipy)               &
  1880)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1881)          cgrid%dmean_par_gnd        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_par_gnd        (ipy)               &
  1882)                                           + cgrid%fmean_par_gnd        (ipy)               &
  1883)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1884)          cgrid%dmean_rlong_gnd      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rlong_gnd      (ipy)               &
  1885)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rlong_gnd      (ipy)               &
  1886)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1887)          cgrid%dmean_rlongup        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rlongup        (ipy)               &
  1888)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rlongup        (ipy)               &
  1889)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1890)          cgrid%dmean_parup          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_parup          (ipy)               &
  1891)                                           + cgrid%fmean_parup          (ipy)               &
  1892)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1893)          cgrid%dmean_nirup          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nirup          (ipy)               &
  1894)                                           + cgrid%fmean_nirup          (ipy)               &
  1895)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1896)          cgrid%dmean_rshortup       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rshortup       (ipy)               &
  1897)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rshortup       (ipy)               &
  1898)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1899)          cgrid%dmean_rnet           (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rnet           (ipy)               &
  1900)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rnet           (ipy)               &
  1901)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1902)          cgrid%dmean_rlong_albedo   (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_rlong_albedo   (ipy)               &
  1903)                                           + cgrid%fmean_rlong_albedo   (ipy)               &
  1904)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1905)          cgrid%dmean_ustar          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_ustar          (ipy)               &
  1906)                                           + cgrid%fmean_ustar          (ipy)               &
  1907)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1908)          cgrid%dmean_tstar          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_tstar          (ipy)               &
  1909)                                           + cgrid%fmean_tstar          (ipy)               &
  1910)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1911)          cgrid%dmean_qstar          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_qstar          (ipy)               &
  1912)                                           + cgrid%fmean_qstar          (ipy)               &
  1913)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1914)          cgrid%dmean_cstar          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_cstar          (ipy)               &
  1915)                                           + cgrid%fmean_cstar          (ipy)               &
  1916)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1917)          cgrid%dmean_carbon_ac      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_carbon_ac      (ipy)               &
  1918)                                           + cgrid%fmean_carbon_ac      (ipy)               &
  1919)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1920)          cgrid%dmean_carbon_st      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_carbon_st      (ipy)               &
  1921)                                           + cgrid%fmean_carbon_st      (ipy)               &
  1922)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1923)          cgrid%dmean_vapor_gc       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_vapor_gc       (ipy)               &
  1924)                                           + cgrid%fmean_vapor_gc       (ipy)               &
  1925)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1926)          cgrid%dmean_vapor_ac       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_vapor_ac       (ipy)               &
  1927)                                           + cgrid%fmean_vapor_ac       (ipy)               &
  1928)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1929)          cgrid%dmean_throughfall    (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_throughfall    (ipy)               &
  1930)                                           + cgrid%fmean_throughfall    (ipy)               &
  1931)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1932)          cgrid%dmean_runoff         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_runoff         (ipy)               &
  1933)                                           + cgrid%fmean_runoff         (ipy)               &
  1934)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1935)          cgrid%dmean_drainage       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_drainage       (ipy)               &
  1936)                                           + cgrid%fmean_drainage       (ipy)               &
  1937)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1938)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_gc    (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sensible_gc    (ipy)               &
  1939)                                           + cgrid%fmean_sensible_gc    (ipy)               &
  1940)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1941)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_ac    (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sensible_ac    (ipy)               &
  1942)                                           + cgrid%fmean_sensible_ac    (ipy)               &
  1943)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1944)          cgrid%dmean_qthroughfall   (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_qthroughfall   (ipy)               &
  1945)                                           + cgrid%fmean_qthroughfall   (ipy)               &
  1946)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1947)          cgrid%dmean_qrunoff        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_qrunoff        (ipy)               &
  1948)                                           + cgrid%fmean_qrunoff        (ipy)               &
  1949)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1950)          cgrid%dmean_qdrainage      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_qdrainage      (ipy)               &
  1951)                                           + cgrid%fmean_qdrainage      (ipy)               &
  1952)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1953)          cgrid%dmean_atm_theiv      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_theiv      (ipy)               &
  1954)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_theiv      (ipy)               &
  1955)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1956)          cgrid%dmean_atm_theta      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_theta      (ipy)               &
  1957)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_theta      (ipy)               &
  1958)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1959)          cgrid%dmean_atm_vpdef      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_vpdef      (ipy)               &
  1960)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_vpdef      (ipy)               &
  1961)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1962)          cgrid%dmean_atm_shv        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_shv        (ipy)               &
  1963)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_shv        (ipy)               &
  1964)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1965)          cgrid%dmean_atm_rshort     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_rshort     (ipy)               &
  1966)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort     (ipy)               &
  1967)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1968)          cgrid%dmean_atm_rshort_diff(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_rshort_diff(ipy)               &
  1969)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort_diff(ipy)               &
  1970)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1971)          cgrid%dmean_atm_par        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_par        (ipy)               &
  1972)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_par        (ipy)               &
  1973)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1974)          cgrid%dmean_atm_par_diff   (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_par_diff   (ipy)               &
  1975)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_par_diff   (ipy)               &
  1976)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1977)          cgrid%dmean_atm_rlong      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_rlong      (ipy)               &
  1978)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_rlong      (ipy)               &
  1979)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1980)          cgrid%dmean_atm_vels       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_vels       (ipy)               &
  1981)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_vels       (ipy)               &
  1982)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1983)          cgrid%dmean_atm_prss       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_prss       (ipy)               &
  1984)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_prss       (ipy)               &
  1985)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1986)          cgrid%dmean_atm_co2        (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_atm_co2        (ipy)               &
  1987)                                           + cgrid%fmean_atm_co2        (ipy)               &
  1988)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1989)          cgrid%dmean_pcpg           (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_pcpg           (ipy)               &
  1990)                                           + cgrid%fmean_pcpg           (ipy)               &
  1991)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1992)          cgrid%dmean_qpcpg          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_qpcpg          (ipy)               &
  1993)                                           + cgrid%fmean_qpcpg          (ipy)               &
  1994)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1995)          cgrid%dmean_dpcpg          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_dpcpg          (ipy)               &
  1996)                                           + cgrid%fmean_dpcpg          (ipy)               &
  1997)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  1998)          cgrid%dmean_soil_energy  (:,ipy) = cgrid%dmean_soil_energy  (:,ipy)               &
  1999)                                           + cgrid%fmean_soil_energy  (:,ipy)               &
  2000)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  2001)          cgrid%dmean_soil_mstpot  (:,ipy) = cgrid%dmean_soil_mstpot  (:,ipy)               &
  2002)                                           + cgrid%fmean_soil_mstpot  (:,ipy)               &
  2003)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  2004)          cgrid%dmean_soil_water   (:,ipy) = cgrid%dmean_soil_water   (:,ipy)               &
  2005)                                           + cgrid%fmean_soil_water   (:,ipy)               &
  2006)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  2007)          cgrid%dmean_smoist_gg    (:,ipy) = cgrid%dmean_smoist_gg    (:,ipy)               &
  2008)                                           + cgrid%fmean_smoist_gg    (:,ipy)               &
  2009)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  2010)          cgrid%dmean_transloss    (:,ipy) = cgrid%dmean_transloss    (:,ipy)               &
  2011)                                           + cgrid%fmean_transloss    (:,ipy)               &
  2012)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  2013)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_gg  (:,ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sensible_gg  (:,ipy)               &
  2014)                                           + cgrid%fmean_sensible_gg  (:,ipy)               &
  2015)                                           * frqsum_o_daysec
  2016)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2017) 
  2018) 
  2019) 
  2020) 
  2021)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2022)          !      Site loop.                                                                 !
  2023)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2024)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  2025)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  2026) 
  2027) 
  2028)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2029)             !    Integrate site-level variables.                                           !
  2030)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2031)             cpoly%dmean_atm_theiv      (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_theiv      (isi)            &
  2032)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_theiv      (isi)            &
  2033)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2034)             cpoly%dmean_atm_theta      (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_theta      (isi)            &
  2035)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_theta      (isi)            &
  2036)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2037)             cpoly%dmean_atm_temp       (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_temp       (isi)            &
  2038)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_temp       (isi)            &
  2039)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2040)             cpoly%dmean_atm_vpdef      (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_vpdef      (isi)            &
  2041)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_vpdef      (isi)            &
  2042)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2043)             cpoly%dmean_atm_shv        (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_shv        (isi)            &
  2044)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_shv        (isi)            &
  2045)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2046)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rshort     (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_rshort     (isi)            &
  2047)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort     (isi)            &
  2048)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2049)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi)            &
  2050)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi)            &
  2051)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2052)             cpoly%dmean_atm_par        (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_par        (isi)            &
  2053)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_par        (isi)            &
  2054)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2055)             cpoly%dmean_atm_par_diff   (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_par_diff   (isi)            &
  2056)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_par_diff   (isi)            &
  2057)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2058)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rlong      (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_rlong      (isi)            &
  2059)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_rlong      (isi)            &
  2060)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2061)             cpoly%dmean_atm_vels       (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_vels       (isi)            &
  2062)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_vels       (isi)            &
  2063)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2064)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rhos       (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_rhos       (isi)            &
  2065)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_rhos       (isi)            &
  2066)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2067)             cpoly%dmean_atm_prss       (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_prss       (isi)            &
  2068)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_prss       (isi)            &
  2069)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2070)             cpoly%dmean_atm_co2        (isi) = cpoly%dmean_atm_co2        (isi)            &
  2071)                                              + cpoly%fmean_atm_co2        (isi)            &
  2072)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2073)             cpoly%dmean_pcpg           (isi) = cpoly%dmean_pcpg           (isi)            &
  2074)                                              + cpoly%fmean_pcpg           (isi)            &
  2075)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2076)             cpoly%dmean_qpcpg          (isi) = cpoly%dmean_qpcpg          (isi)            &
  2077)                                              + cpoly%fmean_qpcpg          (isi)            &
  2078)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2079)             cpoly%dmean_dpcpg          (isi) = cpoly%dmean_dpcpg          (isi)            &
  2080)                                              + cpoly%fmean_dpcpg          (isi)            &
  2081)                                              * frqsum_o_daysec
  2082)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2083) 
  2084) 
  2085) 
  2086)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2087)             !      Patch loop.                                                             !
  2088)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2089)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  2090)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa) 
  2091) 
  2092) 
  2093)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2094)                !      Integrate patch-level variables.                                     !
  2095)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2096)                csite%dmean_co2_residual      (ipa) = csite%dmean_co2_residual      (ipa)   &
  2097)                                                    + csite%co2budget_residual      (ipa)   &
  2098)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2099)                csite%dmean_energy_residual   (ipa) = csite%dmean_energy_residual   (ipa)   &
  2100)                                                    + csite%ebudget_residual        (ipa)   &
  2101)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2102)                csite%dmean_water_residual    (ipa) = csite%dmean_water_residual    (ipa)   &
  2103)                                                    + csite%wbudget_residual        (ipa)   &
  2104)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2105)                csite%dmean_rh                (ipa) = csite%dmean_rh                (ipa)   &
