  2106)                                                    + csite%fmean_rh                (ipa)   &
  2107)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2108)                csite%dmean_cwd_rh            (ipa) = csite%dmean_cwd_rh            (ipa)   &
  2109)                                                    + csite%fmean_cwd_rh            (ipa)   &
  2110)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2111)                csite%dmean_nep               (ipa) = csite%dmean_nep               (ipa)   &
  2112)                                                    + csite%fmean_nep               (ipa)   &
  2113)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2114)                csite%dmean_rk4step           (ipa) = csite%dmean_rk4step           (ipa)   &
  2115)                                                    + csite%fmean_rk4step           (ipa)   &
  2116)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2117)                csite%dmean_available_water   (ipa) = csite%dmean_available_water   (ipa)   &
  2118)                                                    + csite%fmean_available_water   (ipa)   &
  2119)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2120)                csite%dmean_can_theiv         (ipa) = csite%dmean_can_theiv         (ipa)   &
  2121)                                                    + csite%fmean_can_theiv         (ipa)   &
  2122)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2123)                csite%dmean_can_theta         (ipa) = csite%dmean_can_theta         (ipa)   &
  2124)                                                    + csite%fmean_can_theta         (ipa)   &
  2125)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2126)                csite%dmean_can_vpdef         (ipa) = csite%dmean_can_vpdef         (ipa)   &
  2127)                                                    + csite%fmean_can_vpdef         (ipa)   &
  2128)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2129)                csite%dmean_can_shv           (ipa) = csite%dmean_can_shv           (ipa)   &
  2130)                                                    + csite%fmean_can_shv           (ipa)   &
  2131)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2132)                csite%dmean_can_co2           (ipa) = csite%dmean_can_co2           (ipa)   &
  2133)                                                    + csite%fmean_can_co2           (ipa)   &
  2134)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2135)                csite%dmean_can_prss          (ipa) = csite%dmean_can_prss          (ipa)   &
  2136)                                                    + csite%fmean_can_prss          (ipa)   &
  2137)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2138)                csite%dmean_gnd_temp          (ipa) = csite%dmean_gnd_temp          (ipa)   &
  2139)                                                    + csite%fmean_gnd_temp          (ipa)   &
  2140)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2141)                csite%dmean_gnd_shv           (ipa) = csite%dmean_gnd_shv           (ipa)   &
  2142)                                                    + csite%fmean_gnd_shv           (ipa)   &
  2143)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2144)                csite%dmean_can_ggnd          (ipa) = csite%dmean_can_ggnd          (ipa)   &
  2145)                                                    + csite%fmean_can_ggnd          (ipa)   &
  2146)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2147)                csite%dmean_sfcw_depth        (ipa) = csite%dmean_sfcw_depth        (ipa)   &
  2148)                                                    + csite%fmean_sfcw_depth        (ipa)   &
  2149)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2150)                !----- Temporarily make the pounding internal energy extensive [J/m2]. -----!
  2151)                csite%dmean_sfcw_energy       (ipa) = csite%dmean_sfcw_energy       (ipa)   &
  2152)                                                    + csite%fmean_sfcw_energy       (ipa)   &
  2153)                                                    * csite%fmean_sfcw_mass         (ipa)   &
  2154)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2155)                csite%dmean_sfcw_mass         (ipa) = csite%dmean_sfcw_mass         (ipa)   &
  2156)                                                    + csite%fmean_sfcw_mass         (ipa)   &
  2157)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2158)                csite%dmean_rshort_gnd        (ipa) = csite%dmean_rshort_gnd        (ipa)   &
  2159)                                                    + csite%fmean_rshort_gnd        (ipa)   &
  2160)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2161)                csite%dmean_par_gnd           (ipa) = csite%dmean_par_gnd           (ipa)   &
  2162)                                                    + csite%fmean_par_gnd           (ipa)   &
  2163)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2164)                csite%dmean_rlong_gnd         (ipa) = csite%dmean_rlong_gnd         (ipa)   &
  2165)                                                    + csite%fmean_rlong_gnd         (ipa)   &
  2166)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2167)                csite%dmean_rlongup           (ipa) = csite%dmean_rlongup           (ipa)   &
  2168)                                                    + csite%fmean_rlongup           (ipa)   &
  2169)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2170)                csite%dmean_parup             (ipa) = csite%dmean_parup             (ipa)   &
  2171)                                                    + csite%fmean_parup             (ipa)   &
  2172)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2173)                csite%dmean_nirup             (ipa) = csite%dmean_nirup             (ipa)   &
  2174)                                                    + csite%fmean_nirup             (ipa)   &
  2175)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2176)                csite%dmean_rshortup          (ipa) = csite%dmean_rshortup          (ipa)   &
  2177)                                                    + csite%fmean_rshortup          (ipa)   &
  2178)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2179)                csite%dmean_rnet              (ipa) = csite%dmean_rnet              (ipa)   &
  2180)                                                    + csite%fmean_rnet              (ipa)   &
  2181)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2182)                csite%dmean_rlong_albedo      (ipa) = csite%dmean_rlong_albedo      (ipa)   &
  2183)                                                    + csite%fmean_rlong_albedo      (ipa)   &
  2184)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2185)                csite%dmean_ustar             (ipa) = csite%dmean_ustar             (ipa)   &
  2186)                                                    + csite%fmean_ustar             (ipa)   &
  2187)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2188)                csite%dmean_tstar             (ipa) = csite%dmean_tstar             (ipa)   &
  2189)                                                    + csite%fmean_tstar             (ipa)   &
  2190)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2191)                csite%dmean_qstar             (ipa) = csite%dmean_qstar             (ipa)   &
  2192)                                                    + csite%fmean_qstar             (ipa)   &
  2193)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2194)                csite%dmean_cstar             (ipa) = csite%dmean_cstar             (ipa)   &
  2195)                                                    + csite%fmean_cstar             (ipa)   &
  2196)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2197)                csite%dmean_carbon_ac         (ipa) = csite%dmean_carbon_ac         (ipa)   &
  2198)                                                    + csite%fmean_carbon_ac         (ipa)   &
  2199)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2200)                csite%dmean_carbon_st         (ipa) = csite%dmean_carbon_st         (ipa)   &
  2201)                                                    + csite%fmean_carbon_st         (ipa)   &
  2202)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2203)                csite%dmean_vapor_gc          (ipa) = csite%dmean_vapor_gc          (ipa)   &
  2204)                                                    + csite%fmean_vapor_gc          (ipa)   &
  2205)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2206)                csite%dmean_vapor_ac          (ipa) = csite%dmean_vapor_ac          (ipa)   &
  2207)                                                    + csite%fmean_vapor_ac          (ipa)   &
  2208)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2209)                csite%dmean_throughfall       (ipa) = csite%dmean_throughfall       (ipa)   &
  2210)                                                    + csite%fmean_throughfall       (ipa)   &
  2211)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2212)                csite%dmean_runoff            (ipa) = csite%dmean_runoff            (ipa)   &
  2213)                                                    + csite%fmean_runoff            (ipa)   &
  2214)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2215)                csite%dmean_drainage          (ipa) = csite%dmean_drainage          (ipa)   &
  2216)                                                    + csite%fmean_drainage          (ipa)   &
  2217)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2218)                csite%dmean_sensible_gc       (ipa) = csite%dmean_sensible_gc       (ipa)   &
  2219)                                                    + csite%fmean_sensible_gc       (ipa)   &
  2220)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2221)                csite%dmean_sensible_ac       (ipa) = csite%dmean_sensible_ac       (ipa)   &
  2222)                                                    + csite%fmean_sensible_ac       (ipa)   &
  2223)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2224)                csite%dmean_sensible_gg     (:,ipa) = csite%dmean_sensible_gg     (:,ipa)   &
  2225)                                                    + csite%fmean_sensible_gg     (:,ipa)   &
  2226)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2227)                csite%dmean_qthroughfall      (ipa) = csite%dmean_qthroughfall      (ipa)   &
  2228)                                                    + csite%fmean_qthroughfall      (ipa)   &
  2229)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2230)                csite%dmean_qrunoff           (ipa) = csite%dmean_qrunoff           (ipa)   &
  2231)                                                    + csite%fmean_qrunoff           (ipa)   &
  2232)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2233)                csite%dmean_qdrainage         (ipa) = csite%dmean_qdrainage         (ipa)   &
  2234)                                                    + csite%fmean_qdrainage         (ipa)   &
  2235)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2236)                csite%dmean_soil_energy     (:,ipa) = csite%dmean_soil_energy     (:,ipa)   &
  2237)                                                    + csite%fmean_soil_energy     (:,ipa)   &
  2238)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2239)                csite%dmean_soil_mstpot     (:,ipa) = csite%dmean_soil_mstpot     (:,ipa)   &
  2240)                                                    + csite%fmean_soil_mstpot     (:,ipa)   &
  2241)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2242)                csite%dmean_soil_water      (:,ipa) = csite%dmean_soil_water      (:,ipa)   &
  2243)                                                    + csite%fmean_soil_water      (:,ipa)   &
  2244)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2245)                csite%dmean_smoist_gg       (:,ipa) = csite%dmean_smoist_gg       (:,ipa)   &
  2246)                                                    + csite%fmean_smoist_gg       (:,ipa)   &
  2247)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2248)                csite%dmean_transloss       (:,ipa) = csite%dmean_transloss       (:,ipa)   &
  2249)                                                    + csite%fmean_transloss       (:,ipa)   &
  2250)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2251)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2252) 
  2253) 
  2254) 
  2255)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2256)                !      Patch loop.                                                          !
  2257)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2258)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  2259)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2260)                   !      Integrate cohort-level variables.                                 !
  2261)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2262)                   cpatch%dmean_gpp           (ico) = cpatch%dmean_gpp           (ico)      &
  2263)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_gpp           (ico)      &
  2264)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2265)                   cpatch%dmean_npp           (ico) = cpatch%dmean_npp           (ico)      &
  2266)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_npp           (ico)      &
  2267)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2268)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_resp     (ico) = cpatch%dmean_leaf_resp     (ico)      &
  2269)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_leaf_resp     (ico)      &
  2270)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2271)                   cpatch%dmean_root_resp     (ico) = cpatch%dmean_root_resp     (ico)      &
  2272)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_root_resp     (ico)      &
  2273)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2274)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_growth_resp(ico) = cpatch%dmean_leaf_growth_resp (ico) &
  2275)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_growth_resp (ico) &
  2276)                                                      * frqsum_o_daysec
  2277)                   cpatch%dmean_root_growth_resp(ico) = cpatch%dmean_root_growth_resp (ico) &
  2278)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_root_growth_resp (ico) &
  2279)                                                      * frqsum_o_daysec
  2280)                   cpatch%dmean_sapa_growth_resp(ico) = cpatch%dmean_sapa_growth_resp (ico) &
  2281)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_sapa_growth_resp (ico) &
  2282)                                                      * frqsum_o_daysec
  2283)                   cpatch%dmean_sapb_growth_resp(ico) = cpatch%dmean_sapb_growth_resp (ico) &
  2284)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_sapb_growth_resp (ico) &
  2285)                                                      * frqsum_o_daysec
  2286)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_storage_resp(ico)= cpatch%dmean_leaf_storage_resp(ico) &
  2287)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_storage_resp(ico) &
  2288)                                                      * frqsum_o_daysec
  2289)                   cpatch%dmean_root_storage_resp(ico)= cpatch%dmean_root_storage_resp(ico) &
  2290)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_root_storage_resp(ico) &
  2291)                                                      * frqsum_o_daysec
  2292)                   cpatch%dmean_sapa_storage_resp(ico)= cpatch%dmean_sapa_storage_resp(ico) &
  2293)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_sapa_storage_resp(ico) &
  2294)                                                      * frqsum_o_daysec
  2295)                   cpatch%dmean_sapb_storage_resp(ico)= cpatch%dmean_sapb_storage_resp(ico) &
  2296)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_sapb_storage_resp(ico) &
  2297)                                                      * frqsum_o_daysec
  2298)                   cpatch%dmean_plresp        (ico) = cpatch%dmean_plresp        (ico)      &
  2299)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_plresp        (ico)      &
  2300)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2301)                   cpatch%dmean_a_open        (ico) = cpatch%dmean_a_open        (ico)      &
  2302)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_a_open        (ico)      &
  2303)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2304)                   cpatch%dmean_a_closed      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_a_closed      (ico)      &
  2305)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_a_closed      (ico)      &
  2306)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2307)                   cpatch%dmean_a_net         (ico) = cpatch%dmean_a_net         (ico)      &
  2308)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_a_net         (ico)      &
  2309)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2310)                   cpatch%dmean_a_light       (ico) = cpatch%dmean_a_light       (ico)      &
  2311)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_a_light       (ico)      &
  2312)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2313)                   cpatch%dmean_a_rubp        (ico) = cpatch%dmean_a_rubp        (ico)      &
  2314)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_a_rubp        (ico)      &
  2315)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2316)                   cpatch%dmean_a_co2         (ico) = cpatch%dmean_a_co2         (ico)      &
  2317)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_a_co2         (ico)      &
  2318)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2319)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_energy   (ico) = cpatch%dmean_leaf_energy   (ico)      &
  2320)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_leaf_energy   (ico)      &
  2321)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2322)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_water    (ico) = cpatch%dmean_leaf_water    (ico)      &
  2323)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_leaf_water    (ico)      &
  2324)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2325)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_hcap     (ico) = cpatch%dmean_leaf_hcap     (ico)      &
  2326)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_leaf_hcap     (ico)      &
  2327)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2328)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_vpdef    (ico) = cpatch%dmean_leaf_vpdef    (ico)      &
  2329)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_leaf_vpdef    (ico)      &
  2330)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2331)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_gsw      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_leaf_gsw      (ico)      &
  2332)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_leaf_gsw      (ico)      &
  2333)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2334)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_gbw      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_leaf_gbw      (ico)      &
  2335)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_leaf_gbw      (ico)      &
  2336)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2337)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_energy   (ico) = cpatch%dmean_wood_energy   (ico)      &
  2338)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_wood_energy   (ico)      &
  2339)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2340)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_water    (ico) = cpatch%dmean_wood_water    (ico)      &
  2341)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_wood_water    (ico)      &
  2342)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2343)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_hcap     (ico) = cpatch%dmean_wood_hcap     (ico)      &
  2344)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_wood_hcap     (ico)      &
  2345)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2346)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_gbw      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_wood_gbw      (ico)      &
  2347)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_wood_gbw      (ico)      &
  2348)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2349)                   cpatch%dmean_psi_open      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_psi_open      (ico)      &
  2350)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_psi_open      (ico)      &
  2351)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2352)                   cpatch%dmean_psi_closed    (ico) = cpatch%dmean_psi_closed    (ico)      &
  2353)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_psi_closed    (ico)      &
  2354)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2355)                   cpatch%dmean_water_supply  (ico) = cpatch%dmean_water_supply  (ico)      &
  2356)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_water_supply  (ico)      &
  2357)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2358)                   cpatch%dmean_par_l         (ico) = cpatch%dmean_par_l         (ico)      &
  2359)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_par_l         (ico)      &
  2360)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2361)                   cpatch%dmean_par_l_beam    (ico) = cpatch%dmean_par_l_beam    (ico)      &
  2362)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_par_l_beam    (ico)      &
  2363)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2364)                   cpatch%dmean_par_l_diff    (ico) = cpatch%dmean_par_l_diff    (ico)      &
  2365)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_par_l_diff    (ico)      &
  2366)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2367) 
  2368)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_beam(ico) = cpatch%dmean_par_level_beam(ico)      &
  2369)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_par_level_beam(ico)      &
  2370)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2371)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffd(ico)= cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffd(ico)     &
  2372)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_par_level_diffd(ico)     &
  2373)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2374)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffu(ico) = cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffu(ico)    &
  2375)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_par_level_diffu(ico)     &
  2376)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2377) 
  2378)                   cpatch%dmean_rshort_l      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_rshort_l      (ico)      &
  2379)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_rshort_l      (ico)      &
  2380)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2381)                   cpatch%dmean_rlong_l       (ico) = cpatch%dmean_rlong_l       (ico)      &
  2382)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_rlong_l       (ico)      &
  2383)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2384)                   cpatch%dmean_sensible_lc   (ico) = cpatch%dmean_sensible_lc   (ico)      &
  2385)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_sensible_lc   (ico)      &
  2386)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2387)                   cpatch%dmean_vapor_lc      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_vapor_lc      (ico)      &
  2388)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_vapor_lc      (ico)      &
  2389)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2390)                   cpatch%dmean_transp        (ico) = cpatch%dmean_transp        (ico)      &
  2391)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_transp        (ico)      &
  2392)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2393)                   cpatch%dmean_intercepted_al(ico) = cpatch%dmean_intercepted_al(ico)      &
  2394)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_intercepted_al(ico)      &
  2395)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2396)                   cpatch%dmean_wshed_lg      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_wshed_lg      (ico)      &
  2397)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_wshed_lg      (ico)      &
  2398)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2399)                   cpatch%dmean_rshort_w      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_rshort_w      (ico)      &
  2400)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_rshort_w      (ico)      &
  2401)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2402)                   cpatch%dmean_rlong_w       (ico) = cpatch%dmean_rlong_w       (ico)      &
  2403)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_rlong_w       (ico)      &
  2404)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2405)                   cpatch%dmean_rad_profile (:,ico) = cpatch%dmean_rad_profile (:,ico)      &
  2406)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_rad_profile (:,ico)      &
  2407)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2408)                   cpatch%dmean_sensible_wc   (ico) = cpatch%dmean_sensible_wc   (ico)      &
  2409)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_sensible_wc   (ico)      &
  2410)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2411)                   cpatch%dmean_vapor_wc      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_vapor_wc      (ico)      &
  2412)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_vapor_wc      (ico)      &
  2413)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2414)                   cpatch%dmean_intercepted_aw(ico) = cpatch%dmean_intercepted_aw(ico)      &
  2415)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_intercepted_aw(ico)      &
  2416)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2417)                   cpatch%dmean_wshed_wg      (ico) = cpatch%dmean_wshed_wg      (ico)      &
  2418)                                                    + cpatch%fmean_wshed_wg      (ico)      &
  2419)                                                    * frqsum_o_daysec
  2420)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2421)                end do cohortloop
  2422)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2423)             end do patchloop
  2424)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2425)          end do siteloop
  2426)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2427)       end do polyloop
  2428)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2429)       return
  2430)    end subroutine integrate_ed_dmean_vars
  2431)    !=======================================================================================!
  2432)    !=======================================================================================!
  2433)    !=======================================================================================!
  2434)    !=======================================================================================!
  2435)    !=======================================================================================!
  2436)    !=======================================================================================!
  2437) 
  2438) 
  2439) 
  2440) 
  2441) 
  2442) 
  2443)    !=======================================================================================!
  2444)    !=======================================================================================!
  2445)    !     This subroutine will scale the daily averages of GPP and some respiration vari-   !
  2446)    ! ables to normal units.  These variables are not for output, so they are done          !
  2447)    ! separatedly.  There are also some output variables here, because these depend on the  !
  2448)    ! average of the gpp, and leaf and root respiration and would need to be calculated     !
  2449)    ! again otherwise.                                                                      !
  2450)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2451)    subroutine normalize_ed_today_vars(cgrid)
  2452)       use ed_state_vars , only : edtype        & ! structure
  2453)                                , polygontype   & ! structure
  2454)                                , sitetype      & ! structure
  2455)                                , patchtype     ! ! structure
  2456)       use ed_max_dims   , only : n_pft         & ! intent(in)
  2457)                                , n_age         & ! intent(in)
  2458)                                , n_dbh         ! ! intent(in)
  2459)       use ed_misc_coms  , only : writing_long  & ! intent(in)
  2460)                                , dtlsm         ! ! intent(in)
  2461)       use consts_coms   , only : umols_2_kgCyr & ! intent(in)
  2462)                                , day_sec       ! ! intent(in)
  2463)       implicit none
  2464)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2465)       type(edtype)     , target     :: cgrid
  2466)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  2467)       type(polygontype), pointer    :: cpoly
  2468)       type(sitetype)   , pointer    :: csite
  2469)       type(patchtype)  , pointer    :: cpatch
  2470)       integer                       :: ipy
  2471)       integer                       :: isi
  2472)       integer                       :: ipa
  2473)       integer                       :: ico
  2474)       real                          :: dtlsm_o_daysec
  2475)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2476) 
  2477) 
  2478)       !----- Find the time scale factor. --------------------------------------------------!
  2479)       dtlsm_o_daysec = dtlsm / day_sec
  2480)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2481) 
  2482) 
  2483)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  2484)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  2485)          !----- This part is done only if arrays are sought. ------------------------------!
  2486)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  2487)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  2488) 
  2489)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  2490) 
  2491)                csite%today_A_decomp (ipa) = csite%today_A_decomp(ipa)  * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2492)                csite%today_Af_decomp(ipa) = csite%today_Af_decomp(ipa) * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2493) 
  2494)                !----- Copy the decomposition terms to the daily mean if they are sought. --!
  2495)                if (writing_long) then
  2496)                   csite%dmean_A_decomp(ipa)  = csite%today_A_decomp(ipa)
  2497)                   csite%dmean_Af_decomp(ipa) = csite%today_Af_decomp(ipa)
  2498)                end if
  2499) 
  2500)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  2501)                
  2502)                !----- Included a loop so it won't crash with empty cohorts... -------------!
  2503)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  2504)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2505)                   !     Normalise the variables used to compute carbon balance.            !
  2506)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2507)                   cpatch%today_gpp          (ico) = cpatch%today_gpp          (ico)        &
  2508)                                                   * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2509)                   cpatch%today_gpp_pot      (ico) = cpatch%today_gpp_pot      (ico)        &
  2510)                                                   * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2511)                   cpatch%today_gpp_lightmax (ico) = cpatch%today_gpp_lightmax (ico)        &
  2512)                                                   * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2513)                   cpatch%today_gpp_moistmax (ico) = cpatch%today_gpp_moistmax (ico)        &
  2514)                                                   * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2515)                   cpatch%today_gpp_mlmax    (ico) = cpatch%today_gpp_mlmax (ico)           &
  2516)                                                   * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2517)                   cpatch%today_leaf_resp    (ico) = cpatch%today_leaf_resp    (ico)        &
  2518)                                                   * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2519)                   cpatch%today_root_resp    (ico) = cpatch%today_root_resp    (ico)        &
  2520)                                                   * dtlsm_o_daysec
  2521)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2522)                end do cohortloop
  2523)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2524)             end do patchloop
  2525)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2526)          end do siteloop
  2527)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2528)       end do polyloop
  2529)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2530) 
  2531)       return
  2532)    end subroutine normalize_ed_today_vars
  2533)    !=======================================================================================!
  2534)    !=======================================================================================!
  2535) 
  2536) 
  2537) 
  2538) 
  2539) 
  2540) 
  2541)    !=======================================================================================!
  2542)    !=======================================================================================!
  2543)    !     This subroutine will scale the daily NPP allocation terms                         !
  2544)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2545)    subroutine normalize_ed_todayNPP_vars(cgrid)
  2546)       use ed_state_vars , only : edtype        & ! structure
  2547)                                , polygontype   & ! structure
  2548)                                , sitetype      & ! structure
  2549)                                , patchtype     ! ! structure
  2550)       use ed_misc_coms  , only : writing_long  ! ! intent(in)
  2551)       use consts_coms   , only : yr_day ! ! intent(in)
  2552)       implicit none
  2553)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2554)       type(edtype)                                  , target     :: cgrid
  2555)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  2556)       type(polygontype)                             , pointer    :: cpoly
  2557)       type(sitetype)                                , pointer    :: csite
  2558)       type(patchtype)                               , pointer    :: cpatch
  2559)       integer                                                    :: ipy
  2560)       integer                                                    :: isi
  2561)       integer                                                    :: ipa
  2562)       integer                                                    :: ico
  2563) 
  2564)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  2565)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  2566)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  2567)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  2568)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  2569) 
  2570)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  2571)                
  2572)                !----- Included a loop so it won't crash with empty cohorts... -------------!
  2573)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  2574) 
  2575)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2576)                   !    We now update the daily means of NPP allocation terms               !
  2577)                   ! and we convert them to kgC/plant/yr                                    !
  2578)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2579)                   if (writing_long) then
  2580)                      cpatch%dmean_nppleaf   (ico) = cpatch%today_nppleaf   (ico)           &
  2581)                                                   * yr_day / cpatch%nplant (ico)
  2582)                      cpatch%dmean_nppfroot  (ico) = cpatch%today_nppfroot  (ico)           &
  2583)                                                   * yr_day / cpatch%nplant (ico)
  2584)                      cpatch%dmean_nppsapwood(ico) = cpatch%today_nppsapwood(ico)           &
  2585)                                                   * yr_day / cpatch%nplant (ico)
  2586)                      cpatch%dmean_nppcroot  (ico) = cpatch%today_nppcroot  (ico)           &
  2587)                                                   * yr_day / cpatch%nplant (ico)
  2588)                      cpatch%dmean_nppseeds  (ico) = cpatch%today_nppseeds  (ico)           &
  2589)                                                   * yr_day / cpatch%nplant (ico)
  2590)                      cpatch%dmean_nppwood   (ico) = cpatch%today_nppwood   (ico)           &
  2591)                                                   * yr_day / cpatch%nplant (ico)
  2592)                      cpatch%dmean_nppdaily  (ico) = cpatch%today_nppdaily  (ico)           &
  2593)                                                   * yr_day / cpatch%nplant (ico)
  2594)                   end if
  2595)                end do cohortloop
  2596)             end do patchloop
  2597)          end do siteloop
  2598)       end do polyloop
  2599) 
  2600)       return
  2601)    end subroutine normalize_ed_todayNPP_vars
  2602)    !=======================================================================================!
  2603)    !=======================================================================================!
  2604) 
  2605) 
  2606) 
  2607) 
  2608) 
  2609) 
  2610)    !=======================================================================================!
  2611)    !=======================================================================================!
  2612)    !    This subroutine normalises the daily mean variables of those variables that could  !
  2613)    ! not be integrated directly.  This includes temperatures, polygon-level budget vari-   !
  2614)    ! ables, and variables that are defined during daytime only.                            !
  2615)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2616)    subroutine normalize_ed_dmean_vars(cgrid)
  2617)       use ed_state_vars        , only : edtype             & ! structure
  2618)                                       , polygontype        & ! structure
  2619)                                       , sitetype           & ! structure
  2620)                                       , patchtype          ! ! structure
  2621)       use grid_coms            , only : nzg                ! ! intent(in)
  2622)       use ed_misc_coms         , only : dtlsm              ! ! intent(in)
  2623)       use therm_lib            , only : press2exner        & ! function
  2624)                                       , extheta2temp       & ! function
  2625)                                       , uextcm2tl          & ! subroutine
  2626)                                       , uint2tl            & ! subroutine
  2627)                                       , idealdenssh        ! ! function
  2628)       use soil_coms            , only : tiny_sfcwater_mass & ! intent(in)
  2629)                                       , soil               ! ! intent(in)
  2630)       use consts_coms          , only : t00                & ! intent(in)
  2631)                                       , wdns               ! ! intent(in)
  2632)       implicit none
  2633)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2634)       type(edtype)                       , target     :: cgrid
  2635)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  2636)       type(polygontype)                  , pointer    :: cpoly
  2637)       type(sitetype)                     , pointer    :: csite
  2638)       type(patchtype)                    , pointer    :: cpatch
  2639)       real             , dimension(nzg)               :: cgrid_dmean_soil_hcap
  2640)       integer                                         :: ipy
  2641)       integer                                         :: isi
  2642)       integer                                         :: ipa
  2643)       integer                                         :: ico
  2644)       integer                                         :: k
  2645)       integer                                         :: nsoil
  2646)       real                                            :: poly_lai
  2647)       real                                            :: poly_wai
  2648)       real                                            :: poly_nplant
  2649)       real                                            :: can_exner
  2650)       real                                            :: atm_exner
  2651)       real                                            :: daylight_i
  2652)       real                                            :: site_area_i
  2653)       real                                            :: poly_area_i
  2654)       real                                            :: site_wgt
  2655)       real                                            :: patch_wgt
  2656)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2657) 
  2658) 
  2659)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2660)       !     Loop over polygons.                                                            !
  2661)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2662)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  2663)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  2664) 
  2665) 
  2666)          !----- Inverse of this polygon area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
  2667)          poly_area_i = 1./sum(cpoly%area)
  2668)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2669) 
  2670) 
  2671)          !----- Re-set some support variables. --------------------------------------------!
  2672)          poly_lai                 = 0.0
  2673)          poly_wai                 = 0.0
  2674)          poly_nplant              = 0.0
  2675)          cgrid_dmean_soil_hcap(:) = 0.0
  2676)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2677) 
  2678) 
  2679) 
  2680)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2681)          !     Loop over sites.                                                            !
  2682)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2683)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  2684)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  2685) 
  2686)             !----- Inverse of this site area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
  2687)             site_area_i = 1./sum(csite%area)
  2688)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2689) 
  2690) 
  2691)             !----- Site weight. -----------------------------------------------------------!
  2692)             site_wgt = cpoly%area(isi) * poly_area_i
  2693)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2694) 
  2695) 
  2696) 
  2697) 
  2698)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2699)             !     Find the average day length.  In case of polar night, we set the factor  !
  2700)             ! to zero so it won't become a singularity.                                    !
  2701)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2702)             if (cpoly%daylight(isi) >= dtlsm) then
  2703)                daylight_i = 1. / cpoly%daylight(isi)
  2704)             else
  2705)                daylight_i = 0.
  2706)             end if
  2707)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2708) 
  2709) 
  2710) 
  2711)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2712)             !      Find the derived properties for the air above canopy.                   !
  2713)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2714)             atm_exner                 = press2exner (cpoly%dmean_atm_prss(isi))
  2715)             cpoly%dmean_atm_temp(isi) = extheta2temp(atm_exner,cpoly%dmean_atm_theta(isi))
  2716)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rhos(isi) = idealdenssh ( cpoly%dmean_atm_prss  (isi)          &
  2717)                                                     , cpoly%dmean_atm_temp  (isi)          &
  2718)                                                     , cpoly%dmean_atm_shv   (isi) )
  2719)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2720) 
  2721) 
  2722)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2723)             !     Loop over patches.                                                       !
  2724)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2725)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  2726)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  2727) 
  2728) 
  2729)                !----- Site weight. --------------------------------------------------------!
  2730)                patch_wgt = csite%area(ipa) * site_area_i * site_wgt
  2731)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2732) 
  2733) 
  2734) 
  2735) 
  2736)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2737)                !      Normalise daytime only variables.                                    !
  2738)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2739)                csite%dmean_albedo     (ipa)  = csite%dmean_albedo     (ipa) * daylight_i
  2740)                csite%dmean_albedo_par (ipa)  = csite%dmean_albedo_par (ipa) * daylight_i
  2741)                csite%dmean_albedo_nir (ipa)  = csite%dmean_albedo_nir (ipa) * daylight_i
  2742)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2743) 
  2744) 
  2745) 
  2746) 
  2747)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2748)                !      Now we find the derived properties for the canopy air space.         !
  2749)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2750)                can_exner                 = press2exner ( csite%dmean_can_prss  (ipa) )
  2751)                csite%dmean_can_temp(ipa) = extheta2temp( can_exner                         &
  2752)                                                        , csite%dmean_can_theta (ipa) )
  2753)                csite%dmean_can_rhos(ipa) = idealdenssh ( csite%dmean_can_prss  (ipa)       &
  2754)                                                        , csite%dmean_can_temp  (ipa)       &
  2755)                                                        , csite%dmean_can_shv   (ipa)       )
  2756)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2757) 
  2758) 
  2759) 
  2760) 
  2761)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2762)                !      Aggregate the polygon-level variables of those variables that were   !
  2763)                ! not integrated during the day.                                            !
  2764)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2765)                cgrid%dmean_co2_residual   (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_co2_residual   (ipy)         &
  2766)                                                 + csite%dmean_co2_residual   (ipa)         &
  2767)                                                 * patch_wgt
  2768)                cgrid%dmean_energy_residual(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_energy_residual(ipy)         &
  2769)                                                 + csite%dmean_energy_residual(ipa)         &
  2770)                                                 * patch_wgt
  2771)                cgrid%dmean_water_residual (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_water_residual (ipy)         &
  2772)                                                 + csite%dmean_water_residual (ipa)         &
  2773)                                                 * patch_wgt
  2774)                cgrid%dmean_albedo         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_albedo         (ipy)         &
  2775)                                                 + csite%dmean_albedo         (ipa)         &
  2776)                                                 * patch_wgt
  2777)                cgrid%dmean_albedo_par     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_albedo_par     (ipy)         &
  2778)                                                 + csite%dmean_albedo_par     (ipa)         &
  2779)                                                 * patch_wgt
  2780)                cgrid%dmean_albedo_nir     (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_albedo_nir     (ipy)         &
  2781)                                                 + csite%dmean_albedo_nir     (ipa)         &
  2782)                                                 * patch_wgt
  2783)                cgrid%dmean_A_decomp       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_A_decomp       (ipy)         &
  2784)                                                 + csite%dmean_A_decomp       (ipa)         &
  2785)                                                 * patch_wgt
  2786)                cgrid%dmean_Af_decomp      (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_Af_decomp      (ipy)         &
  2787)                                                 + csite%dmean_Af_decomp      (ipa)         &
  2788)                                                 * patch_wgt
  2789)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2790) 
  2791) 
  2792) 
  2793) 
  2794)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2795)                !     Soil matric potential, temperature, and liquid water.                 !
  2796)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2797)                do k=1,nzg
  2798)                   nsoil = cpoly%ntext_soil(k,isi)
  2799)                   call uextcm2tl( csite%dmean_soil_energy(k,ipa)                           &
  2800)                                 , csite%dmean_soil_water (k,ipa) * wdns                    &
  2801)                                 , soil(nsoil)%slcpd                                        &
  2802)                                 , csite%dmean_soil_temp  (k,ipa)                           &
  2803)                                 , csite%dmean_soil_fliq  (k,ipa))
  2804)                   cgrid_dmean_soil_hcap   (k)     = cgrid_dmean_soil_hcap(k)               &
  2805)                                                   + soil(nsoil)%slcpd * patch_wgt
  2806)                end do
  2807)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2808) 
  2809) 
  2810) 
  2811) 
  2812)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2813)                !   If the patch had some temporary snow/pounding layer, convert the mean   !
  2814)                ! energy to J/kg, then find the mean temperature and liquid fraction.       !
  2815)                ! Otherwise, set them to either zero or default values.                     !
  2816)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2817)                if (csite%dmean_sfcw_mass(ipa) > tiny_sfcwater_mass) then
  2818)                   csite%dmean_sfcw_energy(ipa) = csite%dmean_sfcw_energy(ipa)              &
  2819)                                                / csite%dmean_sfcw_mass  (ipa)
  2820)                   call uint2tl( csite%dmean_sfcw_energy(ipa), csite%dmean_sfcw_temp(ipa)   &
  2821)                               , csite%dmean_sfcw_fliq  (ipa))
  2822)                else
  2823)                   csite%dmean_sfcw_mass  (ipa)  = 0.
  2824)                   csite%dmean_sfcw_depth (ipa)  = 0.
  2825)                   csite%dmean_sfcw_energy(ipa)  = 0.
  2826)                   csite%dmean_sfcw_temp  (ipa)  = csite%dmean_soil_temp(nzg,ipa)
  2827)                   csite%dmean_sfcw_fliq  (ipa)  = csite%dmean_soil_fliq(nzg,ipa)
  2828)                end if
  2829)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2830) 
  2831) 
  2832) 
  2833)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2834)                !      Loop over the cohorts.                                               !
  2835)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2836)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  2837)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2838)                   !     Aggregate AIs and density, they may be used to normalise averages. !
  2839)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2840)                   poly_nplant = poly_nplant + cpatch%nplant(ico) * patch_wgt
  2841)                   poly_lai    = poly_lai    + cpatch%lai   (ico) * patch_wgt
  2842)                   poly_wai    = poly_wai    + cpatch%wai   (ico) * patch_wgt
  2843)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2844) 
  2845) 
  2846) 
  2847)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2848)                   !      Normalise daytime only variables.                                 !
  2849)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2850)                   cpatch%dmean_light_level     (ico) = cpatch%dmean_light_level     (ico)  &
  2851)                                                      * daylight_i
  2852)                   cpatch%dmean_light_level_beam(ico) = cpatch%dmean_light_level_beam(ico)  &
  2853)                                                      * daylight_i
  2854)                   cpatch%dmean_light_level_diff(ico) = cpatch%dmean_light_level_diff(ico)  &
  2855)                                                      * daylight_i
  2856) 
  2857)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_beam(ico)   = cpatch%dmean_par_level_beam  (ico)  &
  2858)                                                      * daylight_i
  2859)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffu(ico)   = cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffu  (ico)  &
  2860)                                                      * daylight_i
  2861)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffd(ico)   = cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffd  (ico)  &
  2862)                                                      * daylight_i
  2863) 
  2864)                   cpatch%dmean_fs_open         (ico) = cpatch%dmean_fs_open         (ico)  &
  2865)                                                      * daylight_i
  2866)                   cpatch%dmean_fsw             (ico) = cpatch%dmean_fsw             (ico)  &
  2867)                                                      * daylight_i
  2868)                   cpatch%dmean_fsn             (ico) = cpatch%dmean_fsn             (ico)  &
  2869)                                                      * daylight_i
  2870)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2871) 
  2872) 
  2873) 
  2874)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2875)                   !      Aggregate the polygon-level variables of the variables that have  !
  2876)                   ! not been aggregated during the previous day.                           !
  2877)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2878)                   cgrid%dmean_fs_open          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_fs_open          (ipy)  &
  2879)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_fs_open         (ico)  &
  2880)                                                      * cpatch%lai                   (ico)  &
  2881)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2882)                   cgrid%dmean_fsw              (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_fsw              (ipy)  &
  2883)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_fsw             (ico)  &
  2884)                                                      * cpatch%lai                   (ico)  &
  2885)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2886)                   cgrid%dmean_fsn              (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_fsn              (ipy)  &
  2887)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_fsn             (ico)  &
  2888)                                                      * cpatch%lai                   (ico)  &
  2889)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2890)                   cgrid%dmean_nppleaf          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nppleaf          (ipy)  &
  2891)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppleaf         (ico)  &
  2892)                                                      * cpatch%nplant                (ico)  &
  2893)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2894)                   cgrid%dmean_nppfroot         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nppfroot         (ipy)  &
  2895)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppfroot        (ico)  &
  2896)                                                      * cpatch%nplant                (ico)  &
  2897)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2898)                   cgrid%dmean_nppsapwood       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nppsapwood       (ipy)  &
  2899)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppsapwood      (ico)  &
  2900)                                                      * cpatch%nplant                (ico)  &
  2901)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2902)                   cgrid%dmean_nppcroot         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nppcroot         (ipy)  &
  2903)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppcroot        (ico)  &
  2904)                                                      * cpatch%nplant                (ico)  &
  2905)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2906)                   cgrid%dmean_nppseeds         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nppseeds         (ipy)  &
  2907)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppseeds        (ico)  &
  2908)                                                      * cpatch%nplant                (ico)  &
  2909)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2910)                   cgrid%dmean_nppwood          (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nppwood          (ipy)  &
  2911)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppwood         (ico)  &
  2912)                                                      * cpatch%nplant                (ico)  &
  2913)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2914)                   cgrid%dmean_nppdaily         (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_nppdaily         (ipy)  &
  2915)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppdaily        (ico)  &
  2916)                                                      * cpatch%nplant                (ico)  &
  2917)                                                      * patch_wgt
  2918)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2919) 
  2920) 
  2921) 
  2922)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2923)                   !     Find the vegetation temperature and liquid fraction.               !
  2924)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2925)                   !----- Leaf. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  2926)                   if (cpatch%dmean_leaf_hcap(ico) > 0.) then
  2927)                      call uextcm2tl( cpatch%dmean_leaf_energy(ico)                         &
  2928)                                    , cpatch%dmean_leaf_water (ico)                         &
  2929)                                    , cpatch%dmean_leaf_hcap  (ico)                         &
  2930)                                    , cpatch%dmean_leaf_temp  (ico)                         &
  2931)                                    , cpatch%dmean_leaf_fliq  (ico) )
  2932)                   else
  2933)                      cpatch%dmean_leaf_vpdef(ico) = csite%dmean_can_vpdef(ipa)
  2934)                      cpatch%dmean_leaf_temp (ico) = csite%dmean_can_temp (ipa)
  2935)                      if (csite%dmean_can_temp(ipa) > t00) then
  2936)                         cpatch%dmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 1.0
  2937)                      elseif (csite%dmean_can_temp(ipa) == t00) then
  2938)                         cpatch%dmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 0.5
  2939)                      else
  2940)                         cpatch%dmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 0.0
  2941)                      end if
  2942)                   end if
  2943)                   !----- Wood. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  2944)                   if (cpatch%dmean_wood_hcap(ico) > 0.) then
  2945)                      call uextcm2tl( cpatch%dmean_wood_energy(ico)                         &
  2946)                                    , cpatch%dmean_wood_water (ico)                         &
  2947)                                    , cpatch%dmean_wood_hcap  (ico)                         &
  2948)                                    , cpatch%dmean_wood_temp  (ico)                         &
  2949)                                    , cpatch%dmean_wood_fliq  (ico) )
  2950)                   else
  2951)                      cpatch%dmean_wood_temp(ico) = csite%dmean_can_temp(ipa)
  2952)                      if (csite%dmean_can_temp(ipa) > t00) then
  2953)                         cpatch%dmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 1.0
  2954)                      elseif (csite%dmean_can_temp(ipa) == t00) then
  2955)                         cpatch%dmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 0.5
  2956)                      else
  2957)                         cpatch%dmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 0.0
  2958)                      end if
  2959)                   end if
  2960)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2961)                end do cohortloop
  2962)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2963)             end do patchloop
  2964)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2965)          end do siteloop
  2966)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2967) 
  2968) 
  2969) 
  2970) 
  2971) 
  2972) 
  2973)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2974)          !      Find the derived properties for the air above canopy.                      !
  2975)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2976)          atm_exner                 = press2exner (cgrid%dmean_atm_prss(ipy))
  2977)          cgrid%dmean_atm_temp(ipy) = extheta2temp(atm_exner,cgrid%dmean_atm_theta(ipy))
  2978)          cgrid%dmean_atm_rhos(ipy) = idealdenssh ( cgrid%dmean_atm_prss  (ipy)             &
  2979)                                                  , cgrid%dmean_atm_temp  (ipy)             &
  2980)                                                  , cgrid%dmean_atm_shv   (ipy) )
  2981)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2982) 
  2983) 
  2984) 
  2985) 
  2986)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2987)          !      Find the derived properties for the canopy air space.                      !
  2988)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2989)          can_exner                 = press2exner (cgrid%dmean_can_prss(ipy))
  2990)          cgrid%dmean_can_temp(ipy) = extheta2temp(can_exner,cgrid%dmean_can_theta(ipy))
  2991)          cgrid%dmean_can_rhos(ipy) = idealdenssh ( cgrid%dmean_can_prss  (ipy)             &
  2992)                                                  , cgrid%dmean_can_temp  (ipy)             &
  2993)                                                  , cgrid%dmean_can_shv   (ipy) )
  2994)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  2995) 
  2996) 
  2997) 
  2998) 
  2999)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3000)          !   If the patch had some temporary snow/pounding layer, convert the mean energy  !
  3001)          ! to J/kg, then find the mean temperature and liquid fraction.  Otherwise, set    !
  3002)          ! them to either zero or default values.                                          !
  3003)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3004)          if (cgrid%dmean_sfcw_mass(ipy) > tiny_sfcwater_mass) then
  3005)             cgrid%dmean_sfcw_energy(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_sfcw_energy(ipy)                    &
  3006)                                          / cgrid%dmean_sfcw_mass(ipy)
  3007)             call uint2tl(cgrid%dmean_sfcw_energy(ipy),cgrid%dmean_sfcw_temp(ipy)           &
  3008)                         ,cgrid%dmean_sfcw_fliq(ipy))
  3009)          else
  3010)             cgrid%dmean_sfcw_mass  (ipy)  = 0.
  3011)             cgrid%dmean_sfcw_depth (ipy)  = 0.
  3012)             cgrid%dmean_sfcw_energy(ipy)  = 0.
  3013)             cgrid%dmean_sfcw_temp  (ipy)  = cgrid%dmean_soil_temp(nzg,ipy)
  3014)             cgrid%dmean_sfcw_fliq  (ipy)  = cgrid%dmean_soil_fliq(nzg,ipy)
  3015)          end if
  3016)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3017) 
  3018) 
  3019) 
  3020) 
  3021)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3022)          !     Find the temperature and the fraction of liquid water.                      !
  3023)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3024)          do k=1,nzg
  3025)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%dmean_soil_energy(k,ipy)                                 &
  3026)                           , cgrid%dmean_soil_water (k,ipy) * wdns                          &
  3027)                           , cgrid_dmean_soil_hcap  (k)                                     &
  3028)                           , cgrid%dmean_soil_temp  (k,ipy)                                 &
  3029)                           , cgrid%dmean_soil_fliq  (k,ipy))
  3030)          end do
  3031)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3032) 
  3033) 
  3034) 
  3035)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3036)          !     Find the vegetation temperature and liquid fraction.                        !
  3037)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3038)          !----- Leaf. ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3039)          if (cgrid%dmean_leaf_hcap(ipy) > 0.) then
  3040)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%dmean_leaf_energy(ipy), cgrid%dmean_leaf_water (ipy)     &
  3041)                           , cgrid%dmean_leaf_hcap  (ipy), cgrid%dmean_leaf_temp  (ipy)     &
  3042)                           , cgrid%dmean_leaf_fliq  (ipy) )
  3043)          else
  3044)             cgrid%dmean_leaf_temp (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_temp (ipy)
  3045)             if (cgrid%dmean_can_temp(ipy) > t00) then
  3046)                cgrid%dmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 1.0
  3047)             elseif (cgrid%dmean_can_temp(ipy) == t00) then
  3048)                cgrid%dmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 0.5
  3049)             else
  3050)                cgrid%dmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 0.0
  3051)             end if
  3052)          end if
  3053)          !----- Wood. ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3054)          if (cgrid%dmean_wood_hcap(ipy) > 0.) then
  3055)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%dmean_wood_energy(ipy)                                   &
  3056)                           , cgrid%dmean_wood_water (ipy)                                   &
  3057)                           , cgrid%dmean_wood_hcap  (ipy)                                   &
  3058)                           , cgrid%dmean_wood_temp  (ipy)                                   &
  3059)                           , cgrid%dmean_wood_fliq  (ipy) )
  3060)          else
  3061)             cgrid%dmean_wood_temp(ipy) = cgrid%dmean_can_temp(ipy)
  3062)             if (cgrid%dmean_can_temp(ipy) > t00) then
  3063)                cgrid%dmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 1.0
  3064)             elseif (cgrid%dmean_can_temp(ipy) == t00) then
  3065)                cgrid%dmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 0.5
  3066)             else
  3067)                cgrid%dmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 0.0
  3068)             end if
  3069)          end if
  3070)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3071) 
  3072) 
  3073) 
  3074) 
  3075)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3076)          !    Normalise the "intensive" properties.  The weight was either the LAI, WAI,   !
  3077)          ! or plant density.  In case none of the cohorts qualified to contribute, then we !
  3078)          ! assign either the canopy air space property, or a default number.               !
  3079)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3080)          if (poly_lai > 0.) then
  3081)             cgrid%dmean_fs_open   (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_fs_open    (ipy) / poly_lai
  3082)             cgrid%dmean_fsw       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_fsw        (ipy) / poly_lai
  3083)             cgrid%dmean_fsn       (ipy) = cgrid%dmean_fsn        (ipy) / poly_lai
  3084)          else
  3085)             cgrid%dmean_fs_open   (ipy) = 0.5
  3086)             cgrid%dmean_fsw       (ipy) = 0.5
  3087)             cgrid%dmean_fsn       (ipy) = 0.5
  3088)          end if
  3089)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3090)       end do polyloop
  3091)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3092) 
  3093)       return
  3094)     end subroutine normalize_ed_dmean_vars
  3095)    !=======================================================================================!
  3096)    !=======================================================================================!
  3097) 
  3098) 
  3099) 
  3100) 
  3101) 
  3102) 
  3103)    !=======================================================================================!
  3104)    !=======================================================================================!
  3105)    !    This subroutine resets the daily_averages for variables actually used in the       !
  3106)    ! integration.                                                                          !
  3107)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3108)    subroutine zero_ed_today_vars(cgrid)
  3109)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype       & ! structure
  3110)                               , polygontype  & ! structure
  3111)                               , sitetype     & ! structure
  3112)                               , patchtype    ! ! structure
  3113)       implicit none
  3114)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3115)       type(edtype)     , target  :: cgrid
  3116)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  3117)       type(polygontype), pointer :: cpoly
  3118)       type(sitetype)   , pointer :: csite
  3119)       type(patchtype)  , pointer :: cpatch
  3120)       integer                    :: ipy
  3121)       integer                    :: isi
  3122)       integer                    :: ipa
  3123)       integer                    :: ico
  3124)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3125)       do ipy = 1,cgrid%npolygons
  3126)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  3127)                
  3128)          do isi = 1,cpoly%nsites
  3129)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  3130) 
  3131)             do ipa = 1,csite%npatches
  3132)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  3133)                
  3134)                !----- Reset variables stored in sitetype. ---------------------------------!
  3135)                csite%today_A_decomp(ipa)  = 0.0
  3136)                csite%today_Af_decomp(ipa) = 0.0
  3137)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3138) 
  3139) 
  3140)                !----- Reset variables stored in patchtype. --------------------------------!
  3141)                do ico = 1, cpatch%ncohorts
  3142)                   cpatch%today_gpp          (ico) = 0.0
  3143)                   cpatch%today_nppleaf      (ico) = 0.0
  3144)                   cpatch%today_nppfroot     (ico) = 0.0
  3145)                   cpatch%today_nppsapwood   (ico) = 0.0
  3146)                   cpatch%today_nppcroot     (ico) = 0.0
  3147)                   cpatch%today_nppseeds     (ico) = 0.0
  3148)                   cpatch%today_nppwood      (ico) = 0.0
  3149)                   cpatch%today_nppdaily     (ico) = 0.0
  3150)                   cpatch%today_gpp_pot      (ico) = 0.0
  3151)                   cpatch%today_gpp_lightmax (ico) = 0.0
  3152)                   cpatch%today_gpp_moistmax (ico) = 0.0
  3153)                   cpatch%today_gpp_mlmax (ico) = 0.0
  3154)                   cpatch%today_leaf_resp    (ico) = 0.0
  3155)                   cpatch%today_root_resp    (ico) = 0.0
  3156)                end do
  3157)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3158)             end do
  3159)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3160)          end do
  3161)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3162)       end do
  3163)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3164)       return
  3165)    end subroutine zero_ed_today_vars
  3166)    !=======================================================================================!
  3167)    !=======================================================================================!
  3168) 
  3169) 
  3170) 
  3171) 
  3172) 
  3173) 
  3174)    !=======================================================================================!
  3175)    !=======================================================================================!
  3176)    !    This subroutine resets the daily averages once the daily average file has been     !
