  3177)    ! written and used to compute the monthly mean (in case the latter was requested).      !
  3178)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3179)    subroutine zero_ed_dmean_vars(cgrid)
  3180)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype        & ! structure
  3181)                               , polygontype   & ! structure
  3182)                               , sitetype      & ! structure
  3183)                               , patchtype     ! ! structure
  3184)       implicit none
  3185)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3186)       type(edtype)     , target  :: cgrid
  3187)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  3188)       type(polygontype), pointer :: cpoly
  3189)       type(sitetype)   , pointer :: csite
  3190)       type(patchtype)  , pointer :: cpatch
  3191)       integer                    :: ipy
  3192)       integer                    :: isi
  3193)       integer                    :: ipa
  3194)       integer                    :: ico
  3195)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3196) 
  3197) 
  3198)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3199)       !       Loop over polygons.                                                          !
  3200)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3201)       polyloop: do ipy = 1,cgrid%npolygons
  3202)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  3203)          
  3204)          !----- Variables stored in edtype. -----------------------------------------------!
  3205)          cgrid%dmean_nppleaf            (ipy) = 0.0
  3206)          cgrid%dmean_nppfroot           (ipy) = 0.0
  3207)          cgrid%dmean_nppsapwood         (ipy) = 0.0
  3208)          cgrid%dmean_nppcroot           (ipy) = 0.0
  3209)          cgrid%dmean_nppseeds           (ipy) = 0.0
  3210)          cgrid%dmean_nppwood            (ipy) = 0.0
  3211)          cgrid%dmean_nppdaily           (ipy) = 0.0
  3212)          cgrid%dmean_A_decomp           (ipy) = 0.0
  3213)          cgrid%dmean_Af_decomp          (ipy) = 0.0
  3214)          cgrid%dmean_co2_residual       (ipy) = 0.0
  3215)          cgrid%dmean_energy_residual    (ipy) = 0.0
  3216)          cgrid%dmean_water_residual     (ipy) = 0.0
  3217)          cgrid%dmean_gpp                (ipy) = 0.0
  3218)          cgrid%dmean_npp                (ipy) = 0.0
  3219)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_resp          (ipy) = 0.0
  3220)          cgrid%dmean_root_resp          (ipy) = 0.0
  3221)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_growth_resp   (ipy) = 0.0
  3222)          cgrid%dmean_root_growth_resp   (ipy) = 0.0
  3223)          cgrid%dmean_sapa_growth_resp   (ipy) = 0.0
  3224)          cgrid%dmean_sapb_growth_resp   (ipy) = 0.0
  3225)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_storage_resp  (ipy) = 0.0
  3226)          cgrid%dmean_root_storage_resp  (ipy) = 0.0
  3227)          cgrid%dmean_sapa_storage_resp  (ipy) = 0.0
  3228)          cgrid%dmean_sapb_storage_resp  (ipy) = 0.0
  3229)          cgrid%dmean_plresp             (ipy) = 0.0
  3230)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_energy        (ipy) = 0.0
  3231)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_water         (ipy) = 0.0
  3232)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_hcap          (ipy) = 0.0
  3233)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_vpdef         (ipy) = 0.0
  3234)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_temp          (ipy) = 0.0
  3235)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_fliq          (ipy) = 0.0
  3236)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_gsw           (ipy) = 0.0
  3237)          cgrid%dmean_leaf_gbw           (ipy) = 0.0
  3238)          cgrid%dmean_wood_energy        (ipy) = 0.0
  3239)          cgrid%dmean_wood_water         (ipy) = 0.0
  3240)          cgrid%dmean_wood_hcap          (ipy) = 0.0
  3241)          cgrid%dmean_wood_temp          (ipy) = 0.0
  3242)          cgrid%dmean_wood_fliq          (ipy) = 0.0
  3243)          cgrid%dmean_wood_gbw           (ipy) = 0.0
  3244)          cgrid%dmean_fs_open            (ipy) = 0.0
  3245)          cgrid%dmean_fsw                (ipy) = 0.0
  3246)          cgrid%dmean_fsn                (ipy) = 0.0
  3247)          cgrid%dmean_a_open             (ipy) = 0.0
  3248)          cgrid%dmean_a_closed           (ipy) = 0.0
  3249)          cgrid%dmean_a_net              (ipy) = 0.0
  3250)          cgrid%dmean_a_light            (ipy) = 0.0
  3251)          cgrid%dmean_a_rubp             (ipy) = 0.0
  3252)          cgrid%dmean_a_co2              (ipy) = 0.0
  3253)          cgrid%dmean_psi_open           (ipy) = 0.0
  3254)          cgrid%dmean_psi_closed         (ipy) = 0.0
  3255)          cgrid%dmean_water_supply       (ipy) = 0.0
  3256)          cgrid%dmean_par_l              (ipy) = 0.0
  3257)          cgrid%dmean_par_l_beam         (ipy) = 0.0
  3258)          cgrid%dmean_par_l_diff         (ipy) = 0.0
  3259)          cgrid%dmean_rshort_l           (ipy) = 0.0
  3260)          cgrid%dmean_rlong_l            (ipy) = 0.0
  3261)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_lc        (ipy) = 0.0
  3262)          cgrid%dmean_vapor_lc           (ipy) = 0.0
  3263)          cgrid%dmean_transp             (ipy) = 0.0
  3264)          cgrid%dmean_intercepted_al     (ipy) = 0.0
  3265)          cgrid%dmean_wshed_lg           (ipy) = 0.0
  3266)          cgrid%dmean_rshort_w           (ipy) = 0.0
  3267)          cgrid%dmean_rlong_w            (ipy) = 0.0
  3268)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_wc        (ipy) = 0.0
  3269)          cgrid%dmean_vapor_wc           (ipy) = 0.0
  3270)          cgrid%dmean_intercepted_aw     (ipy) = 0.0
  3271)          cgrid%dmean_wshed_wg           (ipy) = 0.0
  3272)          cgrid%dmean_rh                 (ipy) = 0.0
  3273)          cgrid%dmean_cwd_rh             (ipy) = 0.0
  3274)          cgrid%dmean_nep                (ipy) = 0.0
  3275)          cgrid%dmean_rk4step            (ipy) = 0.0
  3276)          cgrid%dmean_available_water    (ipy) = 0.0
  3277)          cgrid%dmean_can_theiv          (ipy) = 0.0
  3278)          cgrid%dmean_can_theta          (ipy) = 0.0
  3279)          cgrid%dmean_can_vpdef          (ipy) = 0.0
  3280)          cgrid%dmean_can_temp           (ipy) = 0.0
  3281)          cgrid%dmean_can_shv            (ipy) = 0.0
  3282)          cgrid%dmean_can_co2            (ipy) = 0.0
  3283)          cgrid%dmean_can_rhos           (ipy) = 0.0
  3284)          cgrid%dmean_can_prss           (ipy) = 0.0
  3285)          cgrid%dmean_gnd_temp           (ipy) = 0.0
  3286)          cgrid%dmean_gnd_shv            (ipy) = 0.0
  3287)          cgrid%dmean_can_ggnd           (ipy) = 0.0
  3288)          cgrid%dmean_sfcw_depth         (ipy) = 0.0
  3289)          cgrid%dmean_sfcw_energy        (ipy) = 0.0
  3290)          cgrid%dmean_sfcw_mass          (ipy) = 0.0
  3291)          cgrid%dmean_sfcw_temp          (ipy) = 0.0
  3292)          cgrid%dmean_sfcw_fliq          (ipy) = 0.0
  3293)          cgrid%dmean_soil_energy      (:,ipy) = 0.0
  3294)          cgrid%dmean_soil_mstpot      (:,ipy) = 0.0
  3295)          cgrid%dmean_soil_water       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  3296)          cgrid%dmean_soil_temp        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  3297)          cgrid%dmean_soil_fliq        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  3298)          cgrid%dmean_rshort_gnd         (ipy) = 0.0
  3299)          cgrid%dmean_par_gnd            (ipy) = 0.0
  3300)          cgrid%dmean_rlong_gnd          (ipy) = 0.0
  3301)          cgrid%dmean_rlongup            (ipy) = 0.0
  3302)          cgrid%dmean_parup              (ipy) = 0.0
  3303)          cgrid%dmean_nirup              (ipy) = 0.0
  3304)          cgrid%dmean_rshortup           (ipy) = 0.0
  3305)          cgrid%dmean_rnet               (ipy) = 0.0
  3306)          cgrid%dmean_albedo             (ipy) = 0.0
  3307)          cgrid%dmean_albedo_par         (ipy) = 0.0
  3308)          cgrid%dmean_albedo_nir         (ipy) = 0.0
  3309)          cgrid%dmean_rlong_albedo       (ipy) = 0.0
  3310)          cgrid%dmean_ustar              (ipy) = 0.0
  3311)          cgrid%dmean_tstar              (ipy) = 0.0
  3312)          cgrid%dmean_qstar              (ipy) = 0.0
  3313)          cgrid%dmean_cstar              (ipy) = 0.0
  3314)          cgrid%dmean_carbon_ac          (ipy) = 0.0
  3315)          cgrid%dmean_carbon_st          (ipy) = 0.0
  3316)          cgrid%dmean_vapor_gc           (ipy) = 0.0
  3317)          cgrid%dmean_vapor_ac           (ipy) = 0.0
  3318)          cgrid%dmean_smoist_gg        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  3319)          cgrid%dmean_throughfall        (ipy) = 0.0
  3320)          cgrid%dmean_transloss        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  3321)          cgrid%dmean_runoff             (ipy) = 0.0
  3322)          cgrid%dmean_drainage           (ipy) = 0.0
  3323)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_gc        (ipy) = 0.0
  3324)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_ac        (ipy) = 0.0
  3325)          cgrid%dmean_sensible_gg      (:,ipy) = 0.0
  3326)          cgrid%dmean_qthroughfall       (ipy) = 0.0
  3327)          cgrid%dmean_qrunoff            (ipy) = 0.0
  3328)          cgrid%dmean_qdrainage          (ipy) = 0.0
  3329)          cgrid%dmean_atm_theiv          (ipy) = 0.0
  3330)          cgrid%dmean_atm_theta          (ipy) = 0.0
  3331)          cgrid%dmean_atm_temp           (ipy) = 0.0
  3332)          cgrid%dmean_atm_vpdef          (ipy) = 0.0
  3333)          cgrid%dmean_atm_shv            (ipy) = 0.0
  3334)          cgrid%dmean_atm_rshort         (ipy) = 0.0
  3335)          cgrid%dmean_atm_rshort_diff    (ipy) = 0.0
  3336)          cgrid%dmean_atm_par            (ipy) = 0.0
  3337)          cgrid%dmean_atm_par_diff       (ipy) = 0.0
  3338)          cgrid%dmean_atm_rlong          (ipy) = 0.0
  3339)          cgrid%dmean_atm_vels           (ipy) = 0.0
  3340)          cgrid%dmean_atm_rhos           (ipy) = 0.0
  3341)          cgrid%dmean_atm_prss           (ipy) = 0.0
  3342)          cgrid%dmean_atm_co2            (ipy) = 0.0
  3343)          cgrid%dmean_pcpg               (ipy) = 0.0
  3344)          cgrid%dmean_qpcpg              (ipy) = 0.0
  3345)          cgrid%dmean_dpcpg              (ipy) = 0.0
  3346) 
  3347)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3348)          !       Loop over sites.                                                          !
  3349)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3350)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  3351)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  3352) 
  3353)             cpoly%daylight             (isi) = 0.0
  3354)             cpoly%dmean_atm_theiv      (isi) = 0.0
  3355)             cpoly%dmean_atm_theta      (isi) = 0.0
  3356)             cpoly%dmean_atm_temp       (isi) = 0.0
  3357)             cpoly%dmean_atm_vpdef      (isi) = 0.0
  3358)             cpoly%dmean_atm_shv        (isi) = 0.0
  3359)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rshort     (isi) = 0.0
  3360)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi) = 0.0
  3361)             cpoly%dmean_atm_par        (isi) = 0.0
  3362)             cpoly%dmean_atm_par_diff   (isi) = 0.0
  3363)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rlong      (isi) = 0.0
  3364)             cpoly%dmean_atm_vels       (isi) = 0.0
  3365)             cpoly%dmean_atm_rhos       (isi) = 0.0
  3366)             cpoly%dmean_atm_prss       (isi) = 0.0
  3367)             cpoly%dmean_atm_co2        (isi) = 0.0
  3368)             cpoly%dmean_pcpg           (isi) = 0.0
  3369)             cpoly%dmean_qpcpg          (isi) = 0.0
  3370)             cpoly%dmean_dpcpg          (isi) = 0.0
  3371) 
  3372)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3373)             !       Loop over sites.                                                       !
  3374)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3375)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  3376)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  3377) 
  3378)                csite%dmean_A_decomp         (ipa) = 0.0
  3379)                csite%dmean_Af_decomp        (ipa) = 0.0
  3380)                csite%dmean_co2_residual     (ipa) = 0.0
  3381)                csite%dmean_energy_residual  (ipa) = 0.0
  3382)                csite%dmean_water_residual   (ipa) = 0.0
  3383)                csite%dmean_rh               (ipa) = 0.0
  3384)                csite%dmean_cwd_rh           (ipa) = 0.0
  3385)                csite%dmean_nep              (ipa) = 0.0
  3386)                csite%dmean_rk4step          (ipa) = 0.0
  3387)                csite%dmean_available_water  (ipa) = 0.0
  3388)                csite%dmean_can_theiv        (ipa) = 0.0
  3389)                csite%dmean_can_theta        (ipa) = 0.0
  3390)                csite%dmean_can_vpdef        (ipa) = 0.0
  3391)                csite%dmean_can_temp         (ipa) = 0.0
  3392)                csite%dmean_can_shv          (ipa) = 0.0
  3393)                csite%dmean_can_co2          (ipa) = 0.0
  3394)                csite%dmean_can_rhos         (ipa) = 0.0
  3395)                csite%dmean_can_prss         (ipa) = 0.0
  3396)                csite%dmean_gnd_temp         (ipa) = 0.0
  3397)                csite%dmean_gnd_shv          (ipa) = 0.0
  3398)                csite%dmean_can_ggnd         (ipa) = 0.0
  3399)                csite%dmean_sfcw_depth       (ipa) = 0.0
  3400)                csite%dmean_sfcw_energy      (ipa) = 0.0
  3401)                csite%dmean_sfcw_mass        (ipa) = 0.0
  3402)                csite%dmean_sfcw_temp        (ipa) = 0.0
  3403)                csite%dmean_sfcw_fliq        (ipa) = 0.0
  3404)                csite%dmean_soil_energy    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  3405)                csite%dmean_soil_mstpot    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  3406)                csite%dmean_soil_water     (:,ipa) = 0.0
  3407)                csite%dmean_soil_temp      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  3408)                csite%dmean_soil_fliq      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  3409)                csite%dmean_rshort_gnd       (ipa) = 0.0
  3410)                csite%dmean_par_gnd          (ipa) = 0.0
  3411)                csite%dmean_rlong_gnd        (ipa) = 0.0
  3412)                csite%dmean_rlongup          (ipa) = 0.0
  3413)                csite%dmean_parup            (ipa) = 0.0
  3414)                csite%dmean_nirup            (ipa) = 0.0
  3415)                csite%dmean_rshortup         (ipa) = 0.0
  3416)                csite%dmean_rnet             (ipa) = 0.0
  3417)                csite%dmean_albedo           (ipa) = 0.0
  3418)                csite%dmean_albedo_par       (ipa) = 0.0
  3419)                csite%dmean_albedo_nir       (ipa) = 0.0
  3420)                csite%dmean_rlong_albedo     (ipa) = 0.0
  3421)                csite%dmean_ustar            (ipa) = 0.0
  3422)                csite%dmean_tstar            (ipa) = 0.0
  3423)                csite%dmean_qstar            (ipa) = 0.0
  3424)                csite%dmean_cstar            (ipa) = 0.0
  3425)                csite%dmean_carbon_ac        (ipa) = 0.0
  3426)                csite%dmean_carbon_st        (ipa) = 0.0
  3427)                csite%dmean_vapor_gc         (ipa) = 0.0
  3428)                csite%dmean_vapor_ac         (ipa) = 0.0
  3429)                csite%dmean_smoist_gg      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  3430)                csite%dmean_throughfall      (ipa) = 0.0
  3431)                csite%dmean_transloss      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  3432)                csite%dmean_runoff           (ipa) = 0.0
  3433)                csite%dmean_drainage         (ipa) = 0.0
  3434)                csite%dmean_sensible_gc      (ipa) = 0.0
  3435)                csite%dmean_sensible_ac      (ipa) = 0.0
  3436)                csite%dmean_sensible_gg    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  3437)                csite%dmean_qthroughfall     (ipa) = 0.0
  3438)                csite%dmean_qrunoff          (ipa) = 0.0
  3439)                csite%dmean_qdrainage        (ipa) = 0.0
  3440) 
  3441) 
  3442) 
  3443)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3444)                !       Loop over cohorts.                                                  !
  3445)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3446)                cohortloop: do ico=1, cpatch%ncohorts
  3447)                   cpatch%dmean_nppleaf           (ico) = 0.0
  3448)                   cpatch%dmean_nppfroot          (ico) = 0.0
  3449)                   cpatch%dmean_nppsapwood        (ico) = 0.0
  3450)                   cpatch%dmean_nppcroot          (ico) = 0.0
  3451)                   cpatch%dmean_nppseeds          (ico) = 0.0
  3452)                   cpatch%dmean_nppwood           (ico) = 0.0
  3453)                   cpatch%dmean_nppdaily          (ico) = 0.0
  3454)                   cpatch%dmean_gpp               (ico) = 0.0
  3455)                   cpatch%dmean_npp               (ico) = 0.0
  3456)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_resp         (ico) = 0.0
  3457)                   cpatch%dmean_root_resp         (ico) = 0.0
  3458)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  3459)                   cpatch%dmean_root_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  3460)                   cpatch%dmean_sapa_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  3461)                   cpatch%dmean_sapb_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  3462)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  3463)                   cpatch%dmean_root_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  3464)                   cpatch%dmean_sapa_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  3465)                   cpatch%dmean_sapb_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  3466)                   cpatch%dmean_plresp            (ico) = 0.0
  3467)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_energy       (ico) = 0.0
  3468)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_water        (ico) = 0.0
  3469)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_hcap         (ico) = 0.0
  3470)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_vpdef        (ico) = 0.0
  3471)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_temp         (ico) = 0.0
  3472)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_fliq         (ico) = 0.0
  3473)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_gsw          (ico) = 0.0
  3474)                   cpatch%dmean_leaf_gbw          (ico) = 0.0
  3475)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_energy       (ico) = 0.0
  3476)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_water        (ico) = 0.0
  3477)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_hcap         (ico) = 0.0
  3478)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_temp         (ico) = 0.0
  3479)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_fliq         (ico) = 0.0
  3480)                   cpatch%dmean_wood_gbw          (ico) = 0.0
  3481)                   cpatch%dmean_fs_open           (ico) = 0.0
  3482)                   cpatch%dmean_fsw               (ico) = 0.0
  3483)                   cpatch%dmean_fsn               (ico) = 0.0
  3484)                   cpatch%dmean_a_open            (ico) = 0.0
  3485)                   cpatch%dmean_a_closed          (ico) = 0.0
  3486)                   cpatch%dmean_a_net             (ico) = 0.0
  3487)                   cpatch%dmean_a_light           (ico) = 0.0
  3488)                   cpatch%dmean_a_rubp            (ico) = 0.0
  3489)                   cpatch%dmean_a_co2             (ico) = 0.0
  3490)                   cpatch%dmean_psi_open          (ico) = 0.0
  3491)                   cpatch%dmean_psi_closed        (ico) = 0.0
  3492)                   cpatch%dmean_water_supply      (ico) = 0.0
  3493)                   cpatch%dmean_light_level       (ico) = 0.0
  3494)                   cpatch%dmean_light_level_beam  (ico) = 0.0
  3495)                   cpatch%dmean_light_level_diff  (ico) = 0.0
  3496) 
  3497)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_beam    (ico) = 0.0
  3498)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffd   (ico) = 0.0
  3499)                   cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffu   (ico) = 0.0
  3500) 
  3501)                   cpatch%dmean_par_l             (ico) = 0.0
  3502)                   cpatch%dmean_par_l_beam        (ico) = 0.0
  3503)                   cpatch%dmean_par_l_diff        (ico) = 0.0
  3504)                   cpatch%dmean_rshort_l          (ico) = 0.0
  3505)                   cpatch%dmean_rlong_l           (ico) = 0.0
  3506)                   cpatch%dmean_sensible_lc       (ico) = 0.0
  3507)                   cpatch%dmean_vapor_lc          (ico) = 0.0
  3508)                   cpatch%dmean_transp            (ico) = 0.0
  3509)                   cpatch%dmean_intercepted_al    (ico) = 0.0
  3510)                   cpatch%dmean_wshed_lg          (ico) = 0.0
  3511)                   cpatch%dmean_rshort_w          (ico) = 0.0
  3512)                   cpatch%dmean_rlong_w           (ico) = 0.0
  3513)                   cpatch%dmean_rad_profile     (:,ico) = 0.0
  3514)                   cpatch%dmean_sensible_wc       (ico) = 0.0
  3515)                   cpatch%dmean_vapor_wc          (ico) = 0.0
  3516)                   cpatch%dmean_intercepted_aw    (ico) = 0.0
  3517)                   cpatch%dmean_wshed_wg          (ico) = 0.0
  3518)                end do cohortloop
  3519)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3520)             end do patchloop
  3521)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3522)          end do siteloop
  3523)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3524)       end do polyloop
  3525)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3526) 
  3527)       return
  3528)    end subroutine zero_ed_dmean_vars
  3529)    !=======================================================================================!
  3530)    !=======================================================================================!
  3531)    !=======================================================================================!
  3532)    !=======================================================================================!
  3533)    !=======================================================================================!
  3534)    !=======================================================================================!
  3535)    !=======================================================================================!
  3536)    !=======================================================================================!
  3537) 
  3538) 
  3539) 
  3540) 
  3541) 
  3542) 
  3543)    !=======================================================================================!
  3544)    !=======================================================================================!
  3545)    !=======================================================================================!
  3546)    !=======================================================================================!
  3547)    !=======================================================================================!
  3548)    !=======================================================================================!
  3549)    !                            |---------------------------------|                        !
  3550)    !                            |** MONTHLY AVERAGE SUBROUTINES **|                        !
  3551)    !                            |---------------------------------|                        !
  3552)    !=======================================================================================!
  3553)    !=======================================================================================!
  3554)    !=======================================================================================!
  3555)    !=======================================================================================!
  3556)    !=======================================================================================!
  3557)    !=======================================================================================!
  3558) 
  3559) 
  3560) 
  3561) 
  3562) 
  3563) 
  3564)    !=======================================================================================!
  3565)    !=======================================================================================!
  3566)    !    This subroutine integrates most of the monthly mean variables.  This sub-routine   !
  3567)    ! is called after the dmean variables have been normalised, so we can take advantage of !
  3568)    ! their values.                                                                         !
  3569)    !    A few variables are _NOT_ integrated here: quantities such as temperature and      !
  3570)    ! liquid fraction are found after the monthly mean of the extensive quantities have     !
  3571)    ! been normalised. Also, polygon-level variables that were not integrated to the daily  !
  3572)    ! means are not integrated here, they are found after the monthly mean at the native    !
  3573)    ! level has been found.                                                                 !
  3574)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3575)    subroutine integrate_ed_mmean_vars(cgrid)
  3576)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype        & ! structure
  3577)                               , polygontype   & ! structure
  3578)                               , sitetype      & ! structure
  3579)                               , patchtype     ! ! structure
  3580)       use ed_max_dims  , only : n_dbh         & ! intent(in)
  3581)                               , n_pft         ! ! intent(in)
  3582)       use consts_coms  , only : yr_day        ! ! intent(in)
  3583)       use ed_misc_coms , only : current_time  & ! intent(in)
  3584)                               , simtime       ! ! structure
  3585)       implicit none
  3586)       !----- Argument. --------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3587)       type(edtype)      , target    :: cgrid
  3588)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  3589)       type(polygontype) , pointer   :: cpoly
  3590)       type(sitetype)    , pointer   :: csite
  3591)       type(patchtype)   , pointer   :: cpatch
  3592)       type(simtime)                 :: daybefore
  3593)       integer                       :: ipy
  3594)       integer                       :: isi
  3595)       integer                       :: ipa
  3596)       integer                       :: ico
  3597)       real                          :: ndaysi
  3598)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3599) 
  3600) 
  3601) 
  3602)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3603)       !     Find which day we have just integrated, we will use it to determine the right  !
  3604)       ! scaling factor.                                                                    !
  3605)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3606)       call yesterday_info(current_time,daybefore,ndaysi)
  3607)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3608) 
  3609) 
  3610)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3611)       !      Loop over polygons.                                                           !
  3612)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3613)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  3614)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  3615) 
  3616)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3617)          !    The following variables don't have daily means, but the instantaneous value  !
  3618)          ! is fine because they are updated only once a day.                               !
  3619)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3620)          cgrid%mmean_lai             (:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_lai              (:,:,ipy)    &
  3621)                                                + cgrid%lai                    (:,:,ipy)    &
  3622)                                                * ndaysi
  3623)          cgrid%mmean_bleaf           (:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_bleaf            (:,:,ipy)    &
  3624)                                                + cgrid%bleaf                  (:,:,ipy)    &
  3625)                                                * ndaysi
  3626)          cgrid%mmean_broot           (:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_broot            (:,:,ipy)    &
  3627)                                                + cgrid%broot                  (:,:,ipy)    &
  3628)                                                * ndaysi
  3629)          cgrid%mmean_bstorage        (:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_bstorage         (:,:,ipy)    &
  3630)                                                + cgrid%bstorage               (:,:,ipy)    &
  3631)                                                * ndaysi
  3632)          cgrid%mmean_bleaf_n         (:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_bleaf_n          (:,:,ipy)    &
  3633)                                                + cgrid%bleaf_n                (:,:,ipy)    &
  3634)                                                * ndaysi
  3635)          cgrid%mmean_broot_n         (:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_broot_n          (:,:,ipy)    &
  3636)                                                + cgrid%broot_n                (:,:,ipy)    &
  3637)                                                * ndaysi
  3638)          cgrid%mmean_bstorage_n      (:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_bstorage_n       (:,:,ipy)    &
  3639)                                                + cgrid%bstorage_n             (:,:,ipy)    &
  3640)                                                * ndaysi
  3641)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_maintenance(:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_maintenance (:,:,ipy)    &
  3642)                                                + cgrid%leaf_maintenance       (:,:,ipy)    &
  3643)                                                * ndaysi
  3644)          cgrid%mmean_root_maintenance(:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_root_maintenance (:,:,ipy)    &
  3645)                                                + cgrid%root_maintenance       (:,:,ipy)    &
  3646)                                                * ndaysi
  3647)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_drop       (:,:,ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_drop        (:,:,ipy)    &
  3648)                                                + cgrid%leaf_drop              (:,:,ipy)    &
  3649)                                                * ndaysi
  3650)          cgrid%mmean_fast_soil_c         (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_fast_soil_c          (ipy)    &
  3651)                                                + cgrid%fast_soil_c                (ipy)    &
  3652)                                                * ndaysi
  3653)          cgrid%mmean_slow_soil_c         (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_slow_soil_c          (ipy)    &
  3654)                                                + cgrid%slow_soil_c                (ipy)    &
  3655)                                                * ndaysi
  3656)          cgrid%mmean_struct_soil_c       (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_struct_soil_c        (ipy)    &
  3657)                                                + cgrid%struct_soil_c              (ipy)    &
  3658)                                                * ndaysi
  3659)          cgrid%mmean_struct_soil_l       (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_struct_soil_l        (ipy)    &
  3660)                                                + cgrid%struct_soil_l              (ipy)    &
  3661)                                                * ndaysi
  3662)          cgrid%mmean_cwd_c               (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_cwd_c                (ipy)    &
  3663)                                                + cgrid%cwd_c                      (ipy)    &
  3664)                                                * ndaysi
  3665)          cgrid%mmean_fast_soil_n         (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_fast_soil_n          (ipy)    &
  3666)                                                + cgrid%fast_soil_n                (ipy)    &
  3667)                                                * ndaysi
  3668)          cgrid%mmean_mineral_soil_n      (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_mineral_soil_n       (ipy)    &
  3669)                                                + cgrid%mineral_soil_n             (ipy)    &
  3670)                                                * ndaysi
  3671)          cgrid%mmean_cwd_n               (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_cwd_n                (ipy)    &
  3672)                                                + cgrid%cwd_n                      (ipy)    &
  3673)                                                * ndaysi
  3674)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3675) 
  3676) 
  3677)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3678)          !    Integrate the other polygon-level variables.                                 !
  3679)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  3680)          cgrid%mmean_gpp              (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_gpp              (ipy)           &
  3681)                                             + cgrid%dmean_gpp              (ipy)           &
  3682)                                             * ndaysi
  3683)          cgrid%mmean_npp              (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_npp              (ipy)           &
  3684)                                             + cgrid%dmean_npp              (ipy)           &
  3685)                                             * ndaysi
  3686)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_resp        (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_resp        (ipy)           &
  3687)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_resp        (ipy)           &
  3688)                                             * ndaysi
  3689)          cgrid%mmean_root_resp        (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_root_resp        (ipy)           &
  3690)                                             + cgrid%dmean_root_resp        (ipy)           &
  3691)                                             * ndaysi
  3692)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_growth_resp (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_growth_resp (ipy)           &
  3693)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_growth_resp (ipy)           &
  3694)                                             * ndaysi
  3695)          cgrid%mmean_root_growth_resp (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_root_growth_resp (ipy)           &
  3696)                                             + cgrid%dmean_root_growth_resp (ipy)           &
  3697)                                             * ndaysi
  3698)          cgrid%mmean_sapa_growth_resp (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_sapa_growth_resp (ipy)           &
  3699)                                             + cgrid%dmean_sapa_growth_resp (ipy)           &
  3700)                                             * ndaysi
  3701)          cgrid%mmean_sapb_growth_resp (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_sapb_growth_resp (ipy)           &
  3702)                                             + cgrid%dmean_sapb_growth_resp (ipy)           &
  3703)                                             * ndaysi
  3704)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_storage_resp(ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_storage_resp(ipy)           &
  3705)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_storage_resp(ipy)           &
  3706)                                             * ndaysi
  3707)          cgrid%mmean_root_storage_resp(ipy) = cgrid%mmean_root_storage_resp(ipy)           &
  3708)                                             + cgrid%dmean_root_storage_resp(ipy)           &
  3709)                                             * ndaysi
  3710)          cgrid%mmean_sapa_storage_resp(ipy) = cgrid%mmean_sapa_storage_resp(ipy)           &
  3711)                                             + cgrid%dmean_sapa_storage_resp(ipy)           &
  3712)                                             * ndaysi
  3713)          cgrid%mmean_sapb_storage_resp(ipy) = cgrid%mmean_sapb_storage_resp(ipy)           &
  3714)                                             + cgrid%dmean_sapb_storage_resp(ipy)           &
  3715)                                             * ndaysi
  3716)          cgrid%mmean_plresp           (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_plresp           (ipy)           &
  3717)                                             + cgrid%dmean_plresp           (ipy)           &
  3718)                                             * ndaysi
  3719)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_energy      (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_energy      (ipy)           &
  3720)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_energy      (ipy)           &
  3721)                                             * ndaysi
  3722)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_water       (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_water       (ipy)           &
  3723)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_water       (ipy)           &
  3724)                                             * ndaysi
  3725)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_hcap        (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_hcap        (ipy)           &
  3726)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_hcap        (ipy)           &
  3727)                                             * ndaysi
  3728)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_vpdef       (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_vpdef       (ipy)           &
  3729)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_vpdef       (ipy)           &
  3730)                                             * ndaysi
  3731)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_gsw         (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_gsw         (ipy)           &
  3732)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_gsw         (ipy)           &
  3733)                                             * ndaysi
  3734)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_gbw         (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_leaf_gbw         (ipy)           &
  3735)                                             + cgrid%dmean_leaf_gbw         (ipy)           &
  3736)                                             * ndaysi
  3737)          cgrid%mmean_wood_energy      (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_wood_energy      (ipy)           &
  3738)                                             + cgrid%dmean_wood_energy      (ipy)           &
  3739)                                             * ndaysi
  3740)          cgrid%mmean_wood_water       (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_wood_water       (ipy)           &
  3741)                                             + cgrid%dmean_wood_water       (ipy)           &
  3742)                                             * ndaysi
  3743)          cgrid%mmean_wood_hcap        (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_wood_hcap        (ipy)           &
  3744)                                             + cgrid%dmean_wood_hcap        (ipy)           &
  3745)                                             * ndaysi
  3746)          cgrid%mmean_wood_gbw         (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_wood_gbw         (ipy)           &
  3747)                                             + cgrid%dmean_wood_gbw         (ipy)           &
  3748)                                             * ndaysi
  3749)          cgrid%mmean_fs_open          (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_fs_open          (ipy)           &
  3750)                                             + cgrid%dmean_fs_open          (ipy)           &
  3751)                                             * ndaysi
  3752)          cgrid%mmean_fsw              (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_fsw              (ipy)           &
  3753)                                             + cgrid%dmean_fsw              (ipy)           &
  3754)                                             * ndaysi
  3755)          cgrid%mmean_fsn              (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_fsn              (ipy)           &
  3756)                                             + cgrid%dmean_fsn              (ipy)           &
  3757)                                             * ndaysi
  3758)          cgrid%mmean_a_open           (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_a_open           (ipy)           &
  3759)                                             + cgrid%dmean_a_open           (ipy)           &
  3760)                                             * ndaysi
  3761)          cgrid%mmean_a_closed         (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_a_closed         (ipy)           &
  3762)                                             + cgrid%dmean_a_closed         (ipy)           &
  3763)                                             * ndaysi
  3764)          cgrid%mmean_a_net            (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_a_net            (ipy)           &
  3765)                                             + cgrid%dmean_a_net            (ipy)           &
  3766)                                             * ndaysi

  4079)                                             + cgrid%dmean_atm_co2          (ipy)           &
  4080)                                             * ndaysi
  4081)          cgrid%mmean_pcpg             (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_pcpg             (ipy)           &
  4082)                                             + cgrid%dmean_pcpg             (ipy)           &
  4083)                                             * ndaysi
  4084)          cgrid%mmean_qpcpg            (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_qpcpg            (ipy)           &
  4085)                                             + cgrid%dmean_qpcpg            (ipy)           &
  4086)                                             * ndaysi
  4087)          cgrid%mmean_dpcpg            (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_dpcpg            (ipy)           &
  4088)                                             + cgrid%dmean_dpcpg            (ipy)           &
  4089)                                             * ndaysi
  4090)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4091)          !     Mean sum of squares.  Use double precision to integrating term, then        !
  4092)          ! convert the term back to single precision.  This step is needed to avoid under- !
  4093)          ! flows.                                                                          !
  4094)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4095)          cgrid%mmsqu_gpp              (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_gpp                 (ipy)        &
  4096)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_gpp        (ipy))       &
  4097)                                             * ndaysi
  4098)          cgrid%mmsqu_npp              (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_npp                 (ipy)        &
  4099)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_npp        (ipy))       &
  4100)                                             * ndaysi
  4101)          cgrid%mmsqu_plresp           (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_plresp              (ipy)        &
  4102)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_plresp     (ipy))       &
  4103)                                             * ndaysi
  4104)          cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_lc      (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_lc         (ipy)        &
  4105)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_sensible_lc(ipy))       &
  4106)                                             * ndaysi
  4107)          cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_lc         (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_lc            (ipy)        &
  4108)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_vapor_lc   (ipy))       &
  4109)                                             * ndaysi
  4110)          cgrid%mmsqu_transp           (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_transp              (ipy)        &
  4111)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_transp     (ipy))       &
  4112)                                             * ndaysi
  4113)          cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_wc      (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_wc         (ipy)        &
  4114)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_sensible_wc(ipy))       &
  4115)                                             * ndaysi
  4116)          cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_wc         (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_wc            (ipy)        &
  4117)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_vapor_wc   (ipy))       &
  4118)                                             * ndaysi
  4119)          cgrid%mmsqu_rh               (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_rh                  (ipy)        &
  4120)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_rh         (ipy))       &
  4121)                                             * ndaysi
  4122)          cgrid%mmsqu_cwd_rh           (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_cwd_rh              (ipy)        &
  4123)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_cwd_rh     (ipy))       &
  4124)                                             * ndaysi
  4125)          cgrid%mmsqu_nep              (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_nep                 (ipy)        &
  4126)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_nep        (ipy))       &
  4127)                                             * ndaysi
  4128)          cgrid%mmsqu_rlongup          (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_rlongup             (ipy)        &
  4129)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_rlongup    (ipy))       &
  4130)                                             * ndaysi
  4131)          cgrid%mmsqu_parup            (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_parup               (ipy)        &
  4132)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_parup      (ipy))       &
  4133)                                             * ndaysi
  4134)          cgrid%mmsqu_nirup            (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_nirup               (ipy)        &
  4135)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_nirup      (ipy))       &
  4136)                                             * ndaysi
  4137)          cgrid%mmsqu_rshortup         (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_rshortup            (ipy)        &
  4138)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_rshortup   (ipy))       &
  4139)                                             * ndaysi
  4140)          cgrid%mmsqu_rnet             (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_rnet                (ipy)        &
  4141)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_rnet       (ipy))       &
  4142)                                             * ndaysi
  4143)          cgrid%mmsqu_albedo           (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_albedo              (ipy)        &
  4144)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_albedo     (ipy))       &
  4145)                                             * ndaysi
  4146)          cgrid%mmsqu_ustar            (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_ustar               (ipy)        &
  4147)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_ustar      (ipy))       &
  4148)                                             * ndaysi
  4149)          cgrid%mmsqu_carbon_ac        (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_carbon_ac           (ipy)        &
  4150)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_carbon_ac  (ipy))       &
  4151)                                             * ndaysi
  4152)          cgrid%mmsqu_carbon_st        (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_carbon_st           (ipy)        &
  4153)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_carbon_st  (ipy))       &
  4154)                                             * ndaysi
  4155)          cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_gc         (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_gc            (ipy)        &
  4156)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_vapor_gc   (ipy))       &
  4157)                                             * ndaysi
  4158)          cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_ac         (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_ac            (ipy)        &
  4159)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_vapor_ac   (ipy))       &
  4160)                                             * ndaysi
  4161)          cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_gc      (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_gc         (ipy)        &
  4162)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_sensible_gc(ipy))       &
  4163)                                             * ndaysi
  4164)          cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_ac      (ipy) = cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_ac         (ipy)        &
  4165)                                             + isqu_ftz(cgrid%dmean_sensible_ac(ipy))       &
  4166)                                             * ndaysi
  4167)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4168) 
  4169) 
  4170) 
  4171)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4172)          !      Site loop.                                                                 !
  4173)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4174)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  4175)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  4176) 
  4177)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4178)             !    Integrate site-level variables.                                           !
  4179)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4180)             cpoly%mmean_atm_theiv      (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_theiv      (isi)            &
  4181)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_theiv      (isi)            &
  4182)                                              * ndaysi
  4183)             cpoly%mmean_atm_theta      (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_theta      (isi)            &
  4184)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_theta      (isi)            &
  4185)                                              * ndaysi
  4186)             cpoly%mmean_atm_vpdef      (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_vpdef      (isi)            &
  4187)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_vpdef      (isi)            &
  4188)                                              * ndaysi
  4189)             cpoly%mmean_atm_shv        (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_shv        (isi)            &
  4190)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_shv        (isi)            &
  4191)                                              * ndaysi
  4192)             cpoly%mmean_atm_rshort     (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_rshort     (isi)            &
  4193)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_rshort     (isi)            &
  4194)                                              * ndaysi
  4195)             cpoly%mmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi)            &
  4196)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi)            &
  4197)                                              * ndaysi
  4198)             cpoly%mmean_atm_par        (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_par        (isi)            &
  4199)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_par        (isi)            &
  4200)                                              * ndaysi
  4201)             cpoly%mmean_atm_par_diff   (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_par_diff   (isi)            &
  4202)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_par_diff   (isi)            &
  4203)                                              * ndaysi
  4204)             cpoly%mmean_atm_rlong      (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_rlong      (isi)            &
  4205)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_rlong      (isi)            &
  4206)                                              * ndaysi
  4207)             cpoly%mmean_atm_vels       (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_vels       (isi)            &
  4208)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_vels       (isi)            &
  4209)                                              * ndaysi
  4210)             cpoly%mmean_atm_prss       (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_prss       (isi)            &
  4211)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_prss       (isi)            &
  4212)                                              * ndaysi
  4213)             cpoly%mmean_atm_co2        (isi) = cpoly%mmean_atm_co2        (isi)            &
  4214)                                              + cpoly%dmean_atm_co2        (isi)            &
  4215)                                              * ndaysi
  4216)             cpoly%mmean_pcpg           (isi) = cpoly%mmean_pcpg           (isi)            &
  4217)                                              + cpoly%dmean_pcpg           (isi)            &
  4218)                                              * ndaysi
  4219)             cpoly%mmean_qpcpg          (isi) = cpoly%mmean_qpcpg          (isi)            &
  4220)                                              + cpoly%dmean_qpcpg          (isi)            &
  4221)                                              * ndaysi
  4222)             cpoly%mmean_dpcpg          (isi) = cpoly%mmean_dpcpg          (isi)            &
  4223)                                              + cpoly%dmean_dpcpg          (isi)            &
  4224)                                              * ndaysi
  4225)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4226) 
  4227) 
  4228) 
  4229)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4230)             !      Patch loop.                                                             !
  4231)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4232)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  4233)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  4234) 
  4235)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4236)                !      Integrate the variables that don't have daily means because their    !
  4237)                ! time step is one day.                                                     !
  4238)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4239)                csite%mmean_fast_soil_c      (ipa) = csite%mmean_fast_soil_c      (ipa)     &
  4240)                                                   + csite%fast_soil_c            (ipa)     &
  4241)                                                   * ndaysi
  4242)                csite%mmean_slow_soil_c      (ipa) = csite%mmean_slow_soil_c      (ipa)     &
  4243)                                                   + csite%slow_soil_c            (ipa)     &
  4244)                                                   * ndaysi
  4245)                csite%mmean_struct_soil_c    (ipa) = csite%mmean_struct_soil_c    (ipa)     &
  4246)                                                   + csite%structural_soil_c      (ipa)     &
  4247)                                                   * ndaysi
  4248)                csite%mmean_struct_soil_l    (ipa) = csite%mmean_struct_soil_l    (ipa)     &
  4249)                                                   + csite%structural_soil_l      (ipa)     &
  4250)                                                   * ndaysi
  4251)                csite%mmean_fast_soil_n      (ipa) = csite%mmean_fast_soil_n      (ipa)     &
  4252)                                                   + csite%fast_soil_n            (ipa)     &
  4253)                                                   * ndaysi
  4254)                csite%mmean_mineral_soil_n   (ipa) = csite%mmean_mineral_soil_n   (ipa)     &
  4255)                                                   + csite%mineralized_soil_n     (ipa)     &
  4256)                                                   * ndaysi
  4257)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4258) 
  4259) 
  4260) 
  4261) 
  4262)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4263)                !      Integrate patch-level variables.                                     !
  4264)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4265)                csite%mmean_co2_residual     (ipa) = csite%mmean_co2_residual     (ipa)     &
  4266)                                                   + csite%dmean_co2_residual     (ipa)     &
  4267)                                                   * ndaysi
  4268)                csite%mmean_energy_residual  (ipa) = csite%mmean_energy_residual  (ipa)     &
  4269)                                                   + csite%dmean_energy_residual  (ipa)     &
  4270)                                                   * ndaysi
  4271)                csite%mmean_water_residual   (ipa) = csite%mmean_water_residual   (ipa)     &
  4272)                                                   + csite%dmean_water_residual   (ipa)     &
  4273)                                                   * ndaysi
  4274)                csite%mmean_rh               (ipa) = csite%mmean_rh               (ipa)     &
  4275)                                                   + csite%dmean_rh               (ipa)     &
  4276)                                                   * ndaysi
  4277)                csite%mmean_cwd_rh           (ipa) = csite%mmean_cwd_rh           (ipa)     &
  4278)                                                   + csite%dmean_cwd_rh           (ipa)     &
  4279)                                                   * ndaysi
  4280)                csite%mmean_nep              (ipa) = csite%mmean_nep              (ipa)     &
  4281)                                                   + csite%dmean_nep              (ipa)     &
  4282)                                                   * ndaysi
  4283)                csite%mmean_A_decomp         (ipa) = csite%mmean_A_decomp         (ipa)     &
  4284)                                                   + csite%dmean_A_decomp         (ipa)     &
  4285)                                                   * ndaysi
  4286)                csite%mmean_Af_decomp        (ipa) = csite%mmean_Af_decomp        (ipa)     &
  4287)                                                   + csite%dmean_Af_decomp        (ipa)     &
  4288)                                                   * ndaysi
  4289)                csite%mmean_rk4step          (ipa) = csite%mmean_rk4step          (ipa)     &
  4290)                                                   + csite%dmean_rk4step          (ipa)     &
  4291)                                                   * ndaysi
  4292)                csite%mmean_available_water  (ipa) = csite%mmean_available_water  (ipa)     &
  4293)                                                   + csite%dmean_available_water  (ipa)     &
  4294)                                                   * ndaysi
  4295)                csite%mmean_can_theiv        (ipa) = csite%mmean_can_theiv        (ipa)     &
  4296)                                                   + csite%dmean_can_theiv        (ipa)     &
  4297)                                                   * ndaysi
  4298)                csite%mmean_can_theta        (ipa) = csite%mmean_can_theta        (ipa)     &
  4299)                                                   + csite%dmean_can_theta        (ipa)     &
  4300)                                                   * ndaysi
  4301)                csite%mmean_can_vpdef        (ipa) = csite%mmean_can_vpdef        (ipa)     &
  4302)                                                   + csite%dmean_can_vpdef        (ipa)     &
  4303)                                                   * ndaysi
  4304)                csite%mmean_can_shv          (ipa) = csite%mmean_can_shv          (ipa)     &
  4305)                                                   + csite%dmean_can_shv          (ipa)     &
  4306)                                                   * ndaysi
  4307)                csite%mmean_can_co2          (ipa) = csite%mmean_can_co2          (ipa)     &
  4308)                                                   + csite%dmean_can_co2          (ipa)     &
  4309)                                                   * ndaysi
  4310)                csite%mmean_can_prss         (ipa) = csite%mmean_can_prss         (ipa)     &
  4311)                                                   + csite%dmean_can_prss         (ipa)     &
  4312)                                                   * ndaysi
  4313)                csite%mmean_gnd_temp         (ipa) = csite%mmean_gnd_temp         (ipa)     &
  4314)                                                   + csite%dmean_gnd_temp         (ipa)     &
  4315)                                                   * ndaysi
  4316)                csite%mmean_gnd_shv          (ipa) = csite%mmean_gnd_shv          (ipa)     &
  4317)                                                   + csite%dmean_gnd_shv          (ipa)     &
  4318)                                                   * ndaysi
  4319)                csite%mmean_can_ggnd         (ipa) = csite%mmean_can_ggnd         (ipa)     &
  4320)                                                   + csite%dmean_can_ggnd         (ipa)     &
  4321)                                                   * ndaysi
  4322)                csite%mmean_sfcw_depth       (ipa) = csite%mmean_sfcw_depth       (ipa)     &
  4323)                                                   + csite%dmean_sfcw_depth       (ipa)     &
  4324)                                                   * ndaysi
  4325)                !----- Temporarily make pounding energy extensive [J/m2]. ------------------!
  4326)                csite%mmean_sfcw_energy      (ipa) = csite%mmean_sfcw_energy      (ipa)     &
  4327)                                                   + csite%dmean_sfcw_energy      (ipa)     &
  4328)                                                   * csite%dmean_sfcw_mass        (ipa)     &
  4329)                                                   * ndaysi
  4330)                csite%mmean_sfcw_mass        (ipa) = csite%mmean_sfcw_mass        (ipa)     &
  4331)                                                   + csite%dmean_sfcw_mass        (ipa)     &
  4332)                                                   * ndaysi
  4333)                csite%mmean_soil_energy    (:,ipa) = csite%mmean_soil_energy    (:,ipa)     &
  4334)                                                   + csite%dmean_soil_energy    (:,ipa)     &
  4335)                                                   * ndaysi
  4336)                csite%mmean_soil_mstpot    (:,ipa) = csite%mmean_soil_mstpot    (:,ipa)     &
  4337)                                                   + csite%dmean_soil_mstpot    (:,ipa)     &
  4338)                                                   * ndaysi
  4339)                csite%mmean_soil_water     (:,ipa) = csite%mmean_soil_water     (:,ipa)     &
  4340)                                                   + csite%dmean_soil_water     (:,ipa)     &
  4341)                                                   * ndaysi
  4342)                csite%mmean_rshort_gnd       (ipa) = csite%mmean_rshort_gnd       (ipa)     &
  4343)                                                   + csite%dmean_rshort_gnd       (ipa)     &
  4344)                                                   * ndaysi
  4345)                csite%mmean_par_gnd          (ipa) = csite%mmean_par_gnd          (ipa)     &
  4346)                                                   + csite%dmean_par_gnd          (ipa)     &
  4347)                                                   * ndaysi
  4348)                csite%mmean_rlong_gnd        (ipa) = csite%mmean_rlong_gnd        (ipa)     &
  4349)                                                   + csite%dmean_rlong_gnd        (ipa)     &
  4350)                                                   * ndaysi
  4351)                csite%mmean_rlongup          (ipa) = csite%mmean_rlongup          (ipa)     &
  4352)                                                   + csite%dmean_rlongup          (ipa)     &
  4353)                                                   * ndaysi
  4354)                csite%mmean_parup            (ipa) = csite%mmean_parup            (ipa)     &
  4355)                                                   + csite%dmean_parup            (ipa)     &
  4356)                                                   * ndaysi
  4357)                csite%mmean_nirup            (ipa) = csite%mmean_nirup            (ipa)     &
  4358)                                                   + csite%dmean_nirup            (ipa)     &
  4359)                                                   * ndaysi
  4360)                csite%mmean_rshortup         (ipa) = csite%mmean_rshortup         (ipa)     &
  4361)                                                   + csite%dmean_rshortup         (ipa)     &
  4362)                                                   * ndaysi
  4363)                csite%mmean_rnet             (ipa) = csite%mmean_rnet             (ipa)     &
  4364)                                                   + csite%dmean_rnet             (ipa)     &
  4365)                                                   * ndaysi
  4366)                csite%mmean_albedo           (ipa) = csite%mmean_albedo           (ipa)     &
  4367)                                                   + csite%dmean_albedo           (ipa)     &
  4368)                                                   * ndaysi
  4369)                csite%mmean_albedo_par       (ipa) = csite%mmean_albedo_par       (ipa)     &
  4370)                                                   + csite%dmean_albedo_par       (ipa)     &
  4371)                                                   * ndaysi
  4372)                csite%mmean_albedo_nir       (ipa) = csite%mmean_albedo_nir       (ipa)     &
  4373)                                                   + csite%dmean_albedo_nir       (ipa)     &
  4374)                                                   * ndaysi
  4375)                csite%mmean_rlong_albedo     (ipa) = csite%mmean_rlong_albedo     (ipa)     &
  4376)                                                   + csite%dmean_rlong_albedo     (ipa)     &
  4377)                                                   * ndaysi
  4378)                csite%mmean_ustar            (ipa) = csite%mmean_ustar            (ipa)     &
  4379)                                                   + csite%dmean_ustar            (ipa)     &
  4380)                                                   * ndaysi
  4381)                csite%mmean_tstar            (ipa) = csite%mmean_tstar            (ipa)     &
  4382)                                                   + csite%dmean_tstar            (ipa)     &
  4383)                                                   * ndaysi
  4384)                csite%mmean_qstar            (ipa) = csite%mmean_qstar            (ipa)     &
  4385)                                                   + csite%dmean_qstar            (ipa)     &
  4386)                                                   * ndaysi
  4387)                csite%mmean_cstar            (ipa) = csite%mmean_cstar            (ipa)     &
  4388)                                                   + csite%dmean_cstar            (ipa)     &
  4389)                                                   * ndaysi
  4390)                csite%mmean_carbon_ac        (ipa) = csite%mmean_carbon_ac        (ipa)     &
  4391)                                                   + csite%dmean_carbon_ac        (ipa)     &
  4392)                                                   * ndaysi
  4393)                csite%mmean_carbon_st        (ipa) = csite%mmean_carbon_st        (ipa)     &
  4394)                                                   + csite%dmean_carbon_st        (ipa)     &
  4395)                                                   * ndaysi
  4396)                csite%mmean_vapor_gc         (ipa) = csite%mmean_vapor_gc         (ipa)     &
  4397)                                                   + csite%dmean_vapor_gc         (ipa)     &
  4398)                                                   * ndaysi
  4399)                csite%mmean_vapor_ac         (ipa) = csite%mmean_vapor_ac         (ipa)     &
  4400)                                                   + csite%dmean_vapor_ac         (ipa)     &
  4401)                                                   * ndaysi
  4402)                csite%mmean_smoist_gg      (:,ipa) = csite%mmean_smoist_gg      (:,ipa)     &
  4403)                                                   + csite%dmean_smoist_gg      (:,ipa)     &
  4404)                                                   * ndaysi
  4405)                csite%mmean_throughfall      (ipa) = csite%mmean_throughfall      (ipa)     &
  4406)                                                   + csite%dmean_throughfall      (ipa)     &
  4407)                                                   * ndaysi
  4408)                csite%mmean_transloss      (:,ipa) = csite%mmean_transloss      (:,ipa)     &
  4409)                                                   + csite%dmean_transloss      (:,ipa)     &
  4410)                                                   * ndaysi
  4411)                csite%mmean_runoff           (ipa) = csite%mmean_runoff           (ipa)     &
  4412)                                                   + csite%dmean_runoff           (ipa)     &
  4413)                                                   * ndaysi
  4414)                csite%mmean_drainage         (ipa) = csite%mmean_drainage         (ipa)     &
  4415)                                                   + csite%dmean_drainage         (ipa)     &
  4416)                                                   * ndaysi
  4417)                csite%mmean_sensible_gc      (ipa) = csite%mmean_sensible_gc      (ipa)     &
  4418)                                                   + csite%dmean_sensible_gc      (ipa)     &
  4419)                                                   * ndaysi
  4420)                csite%mmean_sensible_ac      (ipa) = csite%mmean_sensible_ac      (ipa)     &
  4421)                                                   + csite%dmean_sensible_ac      (ipa)     &
  4422)                                                   * ndaysi
  4423)                csite%mmean_sensible_gg    (:,ipa) = csite%mmean_sensible_gg    (:,ipa)     &
  4424)                                                   + csite%dmean_sensible_gg    (:,ipa)     &
  4425)                                                   * ndaysi
  4426)                csite%mmean_qthroughfall     (ipa) = csite%mmean_qthroughfall     (ipa)     &
  4427)                                                   + csite%dmean_qthroughfall     (ipa)     &
  4428)                                                   * ndaysi
  4429)                csite%mmean_qrunoff          (ipa) = csite%mmean_qrunoff          (ipa)     &
  4430)                                                   + csite%dmean_qrunoff          (ipa)     &
  4431)                                                   * ndaysi
  4432)                csite%mmean_qdrainage        (ipa) = csite%mmean_qdrainage        (ipa)     &
  4433)                                                   + csite%dmean_qdrainage        (ipa)     &
  4434)                                                   * ndaysi
  4435)                csite%mmean_A_decomp         (ipa) = csite%mmean_A_decomp         (ipa)     &
  4436)                                                   + csite%dmean_A_decomp         (ipa)     &
  4437)                                                   * ndaysi
  4438)                csite%mmean_Af_decomp        (ipa) = csite%mmean_Af_decomp        (ipa)     &
  4439)                                                   + csite%dmean_Af_decomp        (ipa)     &
  4440)                                                   * ndaysi
  4441)                csite%mmean_co2_residual     (ipa) = csite%mmean_co2_residual     (ipa)     &
  4442)                                                   + csite%dmean_co2_residual     (ipa)     &
  4443)                                                   * ndaysi
  4444)                csite%mmean_energy_residual  (ipa) = csite%mmean_energy_residual  (ipa)     &
  4445)                                                   + csite%dmean_energy_residual  (ipa)     &
  4446)                                                   * ndaysi
  4447)                csite%mmean_water_residual   (ipa) = csite%mmean_water_residual   (ipa)     &
  4448)                                                   + csite%dmean_water_residual   (ipa)     &
  4449)                                                   * ndaysi
  4450)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4451)                !     Integrate the sum of squares.                                         !
  4452)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4453)                csite%mmsqu_rh               (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_rh                  (ipa)  &
  4454)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_rh         (ipa)) &
  4455)                                                   * ndaysi
  4456)                csite%mmsqu_cwd_rh           (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_cwd_rh              (ipa)  &
  4457)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_cwd_rh     (ipa)) &
  4458)                                                   * ndaysi
  4459)                csite%mmsqu_nep              (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_nep                 (ipa)  &
  4460)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_nep        (ipa)) &
  4461)                                                   * ndaysi
  4462)                csite%mmsqu_rlongup          (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_rlongup             (ipa)  &
  4463)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_rlongup    (ipa)) &
  4464)                                                   * ndaysi
  4465)                csite%mmsqu_parup            (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_parup               (ipa)  &
  4466)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_parup      (ipa)) &
  4467)                                                   * ndaysi
  4468)                csite%mmsqu_nirup            (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_nirup               (ipa)  &
  4469)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_nirup      (ipa)) &
  4470)                                                   * ndaysi
  4471)                csite%mmsqu_rshortup         (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_rshortup            (ipa)  &
  4472)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_rshortup   (ipa)) &
  4473)                                                   * ndaysi
  4474)                csite%mmsqu_rnet             (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_rnet                (ipa)  &
  4475)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_rnet       (ipa)  &
  4476)                                                   * csite%dmean_rnet                (ipa)) &
  4477)                                                   * ndaysi
  4478)                csite%mmsqu_albedo           (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_albedo              (ipa)  &
  4479)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_albedo     (ipa)  &
  4480)                                                   * csite%dmean_albedo              (ipa)) &
  4481)                                                   * ndaysi
  4482)                csite%mmsqu_ustar            (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_ustar               (ipa)  &
  4483)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_ustar      (ipa)  &
  4484)                                                   * csite%dmean_ustar               (ipa)) &
  4485)                                                   * ndaysi
  4486)                csite%mmsqu_carbon_ac        (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_carbon_ac           (ipa)  &
  4487)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_carbon_ac  (ipa)) &
  4488)                                                   * ndaysi
  4489)                csite%mmsqu_carbon_st        (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_carbon_st           (ipa)  &
  4490)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_carbon_st  (ipa)) &
  4491)                                                   * ndaysi
  4492)                csite%mmsqu_vapor_gc         (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_vapor_gc            (ipa)  &
  4493)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_vapor_gc   (ipa)) &
  4494)                                                   * ndaysi
  4495)                csite%mmsqu_vapor_ac         (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_vapor_ac            (ipa)  &
  4496)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_vapor_ac   (ipa)) &
  4497)                                                   * ndaysi
  4498)                csite%mmsqu_sensible_gc      (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_sensible_gc         (ipa)  &
  4499)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_sensible_gc(ipa)) &
  4500)                                                   * ndaysi
  4501)                csite%mmsqu_sensible_ac      (ipa) = csite%mmsqu_sensible_ac         (ipa)  &
  4502)                                                   + isqu_ftz(csite%dmean_sensible_ac(ipa)) &
  4503)                                                   * ndaysi
  4504)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4505) 
  4506) 
  4507) 
  4508)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4509)                !      Patch loop.                                                          !
  4510)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4511)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  4512)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4513)                   !      Integrate the cohort-level variables that have no daily means     !
  4514)                   ! because their time step is one day.                                    !
  4515)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4516)                   cpatch%mmean_lai             (ico) = cpatch%mmean_lai             (ico)  &
  4517)                                                      + cpatch%lai                   (ico)  &
  4518)                                                      * ndaysi
  4519)                   cpatch%mmean_bleaf           (ico) = cpatch%mmean_bleaf           (ico)  &
  4520)                                                      + cpatch%bleaf                 (ico)  &
  4521)                                                      * ndaysi
  4522)                   cpatch%mmean_broot           (ico) = cpatch%mmean_broot           (ico)  &
  4523)                                                      + cpatch%broot                 (ico)  &
