  4524)                                                      * ndaysi
  4525)                   cpatch%mmean_bstorage        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_bstorage        (ico)  &
  4526)                                                      + cpatch%bstorage              (ico)  &
  4527)                                                      * ndaysi
  4528)                   cpatch%mmean_mort_rate     (:,ico) = cpatch%mmean_mort_rate     (:,ico)  &
  4529)                                                      + cpatch%mort_rate           (:,ico)  &
  4530)                                                      * ndaysi
  4531)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_maintenance(ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_maintenance(ico)  &
  4532)                                                      + cpatch%leaf_maintenance      (ico)  &
  4533)                                                      * ndaysi
  4534)                   cpatch%mmean_root_maintenance(ico) = cpatch%mmean_root_maintenance(ico)  &
  4535)                                                      + cpatch%root_maintenance      (ico)  &
  4536)                                                      * ndaysi
  4537)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_drop       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_drop       (ico)  &
  4538)                                                      + cpatch%leaf_drop             (ico)  &
  4539)                                                      * ndaysi
  4540)                   cpatch%mmean_cb              (ico) = cpatch%mmean_cb              (ico)  &
  4541)                                                      + ( cpatch%dmean_gpp           (ico)  &
  4542)                                                        - cpatch%dmean_plresp        (ico)  &
  4543)                                                        - cpatch%leaf_maintenance    (ico)  &
  4544)                                                        - cpatch%root_maintenance    (ico)  &
  4545)                                                        - cpatch%leaf_drop           (ico)  &
  4546)                                                        ) / yr_day * ndaysi
  4547)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4548) 
  4549) 
  4550) 
  4551)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4552)                   !      Integrate the other cohort-level variables.                       !
  4553)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4554)                   cpatch%mmean_gpp             (ico) = cpatch%mmean_gpp             (ico)  &
  4555)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_gpp             (ico)  &
  4556)                                                      * ndaysi
  4557)                   cpatch%mmean_npp             (ico) = cpatch%mmean_npp             (ico)  &
  4558)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_npp             (ico)  &
  4559)                                                      * ndaysi
  4560)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_resp       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_resp       (ico)  &
  4561)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_resp       (ico)  &
  4562)                                                      * ndaysi
  4563)                   cpatch%mmean_root_resp       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_root_resp       (ico)  &
  4564)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_root_resp       (ico)  &
  4565)                                                      * ndaysi
  4566)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_growth_resp(ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_growth_resp(ico)  &
  4567)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_growth_resp(ico)  &
  4568)                                                      * ndaysi
  4569)                   cpatch%mmean_root_growth_resp(ico) = cpatch%mmean_root_growth_resp(ico)  &
  4570)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_root_growth_resp(ico)  &
  4571)                                                      * ndaysi
  4572)                   cpatch%mmean_sapa_growth_resp(ico) = cpatch%mmean_sapa_growth_resp(ico)  &
  4573)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_sapa_growth_resp(ico)  &
  4574)                                                      * ndaysi
  4575)                   cpatch%mmean_sapb_growth_resp(ico) = cpatch%mmean_sapb_growth_resp(ico)  &
  4576)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_sapb_growth_resp(ico)  &
  4577)                                                      * ndaysi
  4578)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_storage_resp(ico)= cpatch%mmean_leaf_storage_resp(ico) &
  4579)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_storage_resp(ico) &
  4580)                                                      * ndaysi
  4581)                   cpatch%mmean_root_storage_resp(ico)= cpatch%mmean_root_storage_resp(ico) &
  4582)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_root_storage_resp(ico) &
  4583)                                                      * ndaysi
  4584)                   cpatch%mmean_sapa_storage_resp(ico)= cpatch%mmean_sapa_storage_resp(ico) &
  4585)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_sapa_storage_resp(ico) &
  4586)                                                      * ndaysi
  4587)                   cpatch%mmean_sapb_storage_resp(ico)= cpatch%mmean_sapb_storage_resp(ico) &
  4588)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_sapb_storage_resp(ico) &
  4589)                                                      * ndaysi
  4590)                   cpatch%mmean_plresp          (ico) = cpatch%mmean_plresp          (ico)  &
  4591)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_plresp          (ico)  &
  4592)                                                      * ndaysi
  4593)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_energy     (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_energy     (ico)  &
  4594)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_energy     (ico)  &
  4595)                                                      * ndaysi
  4596)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_water      (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_water      (ico)  &
  4597)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_water      (ico)  &
  4598)                                                      * ndaysi
  4599)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_hcap       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_hcap       (ico)  &
  4600)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_hcap       (ico)  &
  4601)                                                      * ndaysi
  4602)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_vpdef      (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_vpdef      (ico)  &
  4603)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_vpdef      (ico)  &
  4604)                                                      * ndaysi
  4605)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_temp       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_temp       (ico)  &
  4606)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_temp       (ico)  &
  4607)                                                      * ndaysi
  4608)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_fliq       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_fliq       (ico)  &
  4609)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_fliq       (ico)  &
  4610)                                                      * ndaysi
  4611)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_gsw        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_gsw        (ico)  &
  4612)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_gsw        (ico)  &
  4613)                                                      * ndaysi
  4614)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_gbw        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_leaf_gbw        (ico)  &
  4615)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_leaf_gbw        (ico)  &
  4616)                                                      * ndaysi
  4617)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_energy     (ico) = cpatch%mmean_wood_energy     (ico)  &
  4618)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_wood_energy     (ico)  &
  4619)                                                      * ndaysi
  4620)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_water      (ico) = cpatch%mmean_wood_water      (ico)  &
  4621)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_wood_water      (ico)  &
  4622)                                                      * ndaysi
  4623)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_hcap       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_wood_hcap       (ico)  &
  4624)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_wood_hcap       (ico)  &
  4625)                                                      * ndaysi
  4626)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_temp       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_wood_temp       (ico)  &
  4627)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_wood_temp       (ico)  &
  4628)                                                      * ndaysi
  4629)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_fliq       (ico) = cpatch%mmean_wood_fliq       (ico)  &
  4630)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_wood_fliq       (ico)  &
  4631)                                                      * ndaysi
  4632)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_gbw        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_wood_gbw        (ico)  &
  4633)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_wood_gbw        (ico)  &
  4634)                                                      * ndaysi
  4635)                   cpatch%mmean_fs_open         (ico) = cpatch%mmean_fs_open         (ico)  &
  4636)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_fs_open         (ico)  &
  4637)                                                      * ndaysi
  4638)                   cpatch%mmean_fsw             (ico) = cpatch%mmean_fsw             (ico)  &
  4639)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_fsw             (ico)  &
  4640)                                                      * ndaysi
  4641)                   cpatch%mmean_fsn             (ico) = cpatch%mmean_fsn             (ico)  &
  4642)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_fsn             (ico)  &
  4643)                                                      * ndaysi
  4644)                   cpatch%mmean_a_open          (ico) = cpatch%mmean_a_open          (ico)  &
  4645)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_a_open          (ico)  &
  4646)                                                      * ndaysi
  4647)                   cpatch%mmean_a_closed        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_a_closed        (ico)  &
  4648)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_a_closed        (ico)  &
  4649)                                                      * ndaysi
  4650)                   cpatch%mmean_a_net           (ico) = cpatch%mmean_a_net           (ico)  &
  4651)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_a_net           (ico)  &
  4652)                                                      * ndaysi
  4653)                   cpatch%mmean_a_light         (ico) = cpatch%mmean_a_light         (ico)  &
  4654)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_a_light         (ico)  &
  4655)                                                      * ndaysi
  4656)                   cpatch%mmean_a_rubp          (ico) = cpatch%mmean_a_rubp          (ico)  &
  4657)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_a_rubp          (ico)  &
  4658)                                                      * ndaysi
  4659)                   cpatch%mmean_a_co2           (ico) = cpatch%mmean_a_co2           (ico)  &
  4660)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_a_co2           (ico)  &
  4661)                                                      * ndaysi
  4662)                   cpatch%mmean_psi_open        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_psi_open        (ico)  &
  4663)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_psi_open        (ico)  &
  4664)                                                      * ndaysi
  4665)                   cpatch%mmean_psi_closed      (ico) = cpatch%mmean_psi_closed      (ico)  &
  4666)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_psi_closed      (ico)  &
  4667)                                                      * ndaysi
  4668)                   cpatch%mmean_water_supply    (ico) = cpatch%mmean_water_supply    (ico)  &
  4669)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_water_supply    (ico)  &
  4670)                                                      * ndaysi
  4671) 
  4672)                   cpatch%mmean_par_level_beam  (ico) = cpatch%mmean_par_level_beam  (ico)  &
  4673)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_par_level_beam  (ico)  &
  4674)                                                      * ndaysi
  4675) 
  4676)                   cpatch%mmean_par_level_diffd (ico) = cpatch%mmean_par_level_diffd  (ico)  &
  4677)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffd  (ico)  &
  4678)                                                      * ndaysi
  4679) 
  4680)                   cpatch%mmean_par_level_diffu (ico) = cpatch%mmean_par_level_diffu  (ico)  &
  4681)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_par_level_diffu  (ico)  &
  4682)                                                      * ndaysi
  4683) 
  4684)                   cpatch%mmean_light_level     (ico) = cpatch%mmean_light_level     (ico)  &
  4685)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_light_level     (ico)  &
  4686)                                                      * ndaysi
  4687)                   cpatch%mmean_light_level_beam(ico) = cpatch%mmean_light_level_beam(ico)  &
  4688)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_light_level_beam(ico)  &
  4689)                                                      * ndaysi
  4690)                   cpatch%mmean_light_level_diff(ico) = cpatch%mmean_light_level_diff(ico)  &
  4691)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_light_level_diff(ico)  &
  4692)                                                      * ndaysi
  4693) 
  4694) 
  4695)                   cpatch%mmean_par_l           (ico) = cpatch%mmean_par_l           (ico)  &
  4696)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_par_l           (ico)  &
  4697)                                                      * ndaysi
  4698)                   cpatch%mmean_par_l_beam      (ico) = cpatch%mmean_par_l_beam      (ico)  &
  4699)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_par_l_beam      (ico)  &
  4700)                                                      * ndaysi
  4701)                   cpatch%mmean_par_l_diff      (ico) = cpatch%mmean_par_l_diff      (ico)  &
  4702)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_par_l_diff      (ico)  &
  4703)                                                      * ndaysi
  4704)                   cpatch%mmean_rshort_l        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_rshort_l        (ico)  &
  4705)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_rshort_l        (ico)  &
  4706)                                                      * ndaysi
  4707)                   cpatch%mmean_rlong_l         (ico) = cpatch%mmean_rlong_l         (ico)  &
  4708)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_rlong_l         (ico)  &
  4709)                                                      * ndaysi
  4710)                   cpatch%mmean_sensible_lc     (ico) = cpatch%mmean_sensible_lc     (ico)  &
  4711)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_sensible_lc     (ico)  &
  4712)                                                      * ndaysi
  4713)                   cpatch%mmean_vapor_lc        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_vapor_lc        (ico)  &
  4714)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_vapor_lc        (ico)  &
  4715)                                                      * ndaysi
  4716)                   cpatch%mmean_transp          (ico) = cpatch%mmean_transp          (ico)  &
  4717)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_transp          (ico)  &
  4718)                                                      * ndaysi
  4719)                   cpatch%mmean_intercepted_al  (ico) = cpatch%mmean_intercepted_al  (ico)  &
  4720)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_intercepted_al  (ico)  &
  4721)                                                      * ndaysi
  4722)                   cpatch%mmean_wshed_lg        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_wshed_lg        (ico)  &
  4723)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_wshed_lg        (ico)  &
  4724)                                                      * ndaysi
  4725)                   cpatch%mmean_rshort_w        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_rshort_w        (ico)  &
  4726)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_rshort_w        (ico)  &
  4727)                                                      * ndaysi
  4728)                   cpatch%mmean_rlong_w         (ico) = cpatch%mmean_rlong_w         (ico)  &
  4729)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_rlong_w         (ico)  &
  4730)                                                      * ndaysi
  4731)                   cpatch%mmean_rad_profile   (:,ico) = cpatch%mmean_rad_profile   (:,ico)  &
  4732)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_rad_profile   (:,ico)  &
  4733)                                                      * ndaysi
  4734)                   cpatch%mmean_sensible_wc     (ico) = cpatch%mmean_sensible_wc     (ico)  &
  4735)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_sensible_wc     (ico)  &
  4736)                                                      * ndaysi
  4737)                   cpatch%mmean_vapor_wc        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_vapor_wc        (ico)  &
  4738)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_vapor_wc        (ico)  &
  4739)                                                      * ndaysi
  4740)                   cpatch%mmean_intercepted_aw  (ico) = cpatch%mmean_intercepted_aw  (ico)  &
  4741)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_intercepted_aw  (ico)  &
  4742)                                                      * ndaysi
  4743)                   cpatch%mmean_wshed_wg        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_wshed_wg        (ico)  &
  4744)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_wshed_wg        (ico)  &
  4745)                                                      * ndaysi
  4746)                   cpatch%mmean_nppleaf         (ico) = cpatch%mmean_nppleaf         (ico)  &
  4747)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppleaf         (ico)  &
  4748)                                                      * ndaysi
  4749)                   cpatch%mmean_nppfroot        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_nppfroot        (ico)  &
  4750)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppfroot        (ico)  &
  4751)                                                      * ndaysi
  4752)                   cpatch%mmean_nppsapwood      (ico) = cpatch%mmean_nppsapwood      (ico)  &
  4753)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppsapwood      (ico)  &
  4754)                                                      * ndaysi
  4755)                   cpatch%mmean_nppcroot        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_nppcroot        (ico)  &
  4756)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppcroot        (ico)  &
  4757)                                                      * ndaysi
  4758)                   cpatch%mmean_nppseeds        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_nppseeds        (ico)  &
  4759)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppseeds        (ico)  &
  4760)                                                      * ndaysi
  4761)                   cpatch%mmean_nppwood         (ico) = cpatch%mmean_nppwood         (ico)  &
  4762)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppwood         (ico)  &
  4763)                                                      * ndaysi
  4764)                   cpatch%mmean_nppdaily        (ico) = cpatch%mmean_nppdaily        (ico)  &
  4765)                                                      + cpatch%dmean_nppdaily        (ico)  &
  4766)                                                      * ndaysi
  4767)                   !----- Integrate mean sum of squares. -----------------------------------!
  4768)                   cpatch%mmsqu_gpp        (ico) = cpatch%mmsqu_gpp                  (ico)  &
  4769)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%dmean_gpp         (ico)) &
  4770)                                                 * ndaysi
  4771)                   cpatch%mmsqu_npp        (ico) = cpatch%mmsqu_npp                  (ico)  &
  4772)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%dmean_npp         (ico)) &
  4773)                                                 * ndaysi
  4774)                   cpatch%mmsqu_plresp     (ico) = cpatch%mmsqu_plresp               (ico)  &
  4775)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%dmean_plresp      (ico)) &
  4776)                                                 * ndaysi
  4777)                   cpatch%mmsqu_sensible_lc(ico) = cpatch%mmsqu_sensible_lc          (ico)  &
  4778)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%dmean_sensible_lc (ico)) &
  4779)                                                 * ndaysi
  4780)                   cpatch%mmsqu_vapor_lc   (ico) = cpatch%mmsqu_vapor_lc             (ico)  &
  4781)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%dmean_vapor_lc    (ico)) &
  4782)                                                 * ndaysi
  4783)                   cpatch%mmsqu_transp     (ico) = cpatch%mmsqu_transp               (ico)  &
  4784)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%dmean_transp      (ico)) &
  4785)                                                 * ndaysi
  4786)                   cpatch%mmsqu_sensible_wc(ico) = cpatch%mmsqu_sensible_wc          (ico)  &
  4787)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%dmean_sensible_wc (ico)) &
  4788)                                                 * ndaysi
  4789)                   cpatch%mmsqu_vapor_wc   (ico) = cpatch%mmsqu_vapor_wc             (ico)  &
  4790)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%dmean_vapor_wc    (ico)) &
  4791)                                                 * ndaysi
  4792)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4793)                end do cohortloop
  4794)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4795)             end do patchloop
  4796)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4797)          end do siteloop
  4798)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4799)       end do polyloop
  4800)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4801) 
  4802)       return
  4803)    end subroutine integrate_ed_mmean_vars
  4804)    !=======================================================================================!
  4805)    !=======================================================================================!
  4806) 
  4807) 
  4808) 
  4809) 
  4810) 
  4811) 
  4812)    !=======================================================================================!
  4813)    !=======================================================================================!
  4814)    !    This subroutine normalises the daily mean variables of those variables that could  !
  4815)    ! not be integrated directly.  This includes temperatures, liquid fraction, and soil    !
  4816)    ! matric potential.                                                                     !
  4817)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4818)    subroutine normalize_ed_mmean_vars(cgrid)
  4819)       use ed_state_vars        , only : edtype             & ! structure
  4820)                                       , polygontype        & ! structure
  4821)                                       , sitetype           & ! structure
  4822)                                       , patchtype          ! ! structure
  4823)       use grid_coms            , only : nzg                ! ! intent(in)
  4824)       use therm_lib            , only : press2exner        & ! function
  4825)                                       , extheta2temp       & ! function
  4826)                                       , uextcm2tl          & ! subroutine
  4827)                                       , uint2tl            & ! subroutine
  4828)                                       , idealdenssh        ! ! function
  4829)       use soil_coms            , only : tiny_sfcwater_mass & ! intent(in)
  4830)                                       , soil               ! ! intent(in)
  4831)       use consts_coms          , only : t00                & ! intent(in)
  4832)                                       , wdns               ! ! intent(in)
  4833)       implicit none
  4834)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4835)       type(edtype)                          , target  :: cgrid
  4836)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  4837)       type(polygontype)                     , pointer :: cpoly
  4838)       type(sitetype)                        , pointer :: csite
  4839)       type(patchtype)                       , pointer :: cpatch
  4840)       real             , dimension(nzg)               :: cgrid_mmean_soil_hcap
  4841)       integer                                         :: ipy
  4842)       integer                                         :: isi
  4843)       integer                                         :: ipa
  4844)       integer                                         :: ico
  4845)       integer                                         :: k
  4846)       integer                                         :: nsoil
  4847)       real                                            :: can_exner
  4848)       real                                            :: atm_exner
  4849)       real                                            :: site_area_i
  4850)       real                                            :: poly_area_i
  4851)       real                                            :: site_wgt
  4852)       real                                            :: patch_wgt
  4853)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4854) 
  4855) 
  4856)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4857)       !     Loop over polygons.                                                            !
  4858)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4859)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  4860)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  4861) 
  4862) 
  4863)          !----- Inverse of this polygon area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
  4864)          poly_area_i = 1./sum(cpoly%area)
  4865)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4866) 
  4867) 
  4868)          !----- Re-set some support variables. --------------------------------------------!
  4869)          cgrid_mmean_soil_hcap(:) = 0.0
  4870)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4871) 
  4872) 
  4873) 
  4874)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4875)          !     Loop over sites.                                                            !
  4876)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4877)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  4878)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  4879) 
  4880)             !----- Inverse of this site area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
  4881)             site_area_i = 1./sum(csite%area)
  4882)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4883) 
  4884) 
  4885)             !----- Site weight. -----------------------------------------------------------!
  4886)             site_wgt = cpoly%area(isi) * poly_area_i
  4887)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4888) 
  4889) 
  4890) 
  4891)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4892)             !      Find the derived properties for the air above canopy.                   !
  4893)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4894)             atm_exner                 = press2exner (cpoly%mmean_atm_prss(isi))
  4895)             cpoly%mmean_atm_temp(isi) = extheta2temp(atm_exner,cpoly%mmean_atm_theta(isi))
  4896)             cpoly%mmean_atm_rhos(isi) = idealdenssh ( cpoly%mmean_atm_prss  (isi)          &
  4897)                                                     , cpoly%mmean_atm_temp  (isi)          &
  4898)                                                     , cpoly%mmean_atm_shv   (isi) )
  4899)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4900) 
  4901) 
  4902)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4903)             !     Loop over patches.                                                       !
  4904)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4905)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  4906)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  4907) 
  4908) 
  4909)                !----- Site weight. --------------------------------------------------------!
  4910)                patch_wgt = csite%area(ipa) * site_area_i * site_wgt
  4911)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4912) 
  4913) 
  4914) 
  4915) 
  4916)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4917)                !      Now we find the derived properties for the canopy air space.         !
  4918)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4919)                can_exner                 = press2exner (csite%mmean_can_prss(ipa))
  4920)                csite%mmean_can_temp(ipa) = extheta2temp( can_exner                         &
  4921)                                                        , csite%mmean_can_theta(ipa))
  4922)                csite%mmean_can_rhos(ipa) = idealdenssh ( csite%mmean_can_prss  (ipa)       &
  4923)                                                        , csite%mmean_can_temp  (ipa)       &
  4924)                                                        , csite%mmean_can_shv   (ipa)       )
  4925)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4926) 
  4927) 
  4928) 
  4929) 
  4930)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4931)                !     Soil matric potential, temperature, and liquid water.                 !
  4932)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4933)                do k=1,nzg
  4934)                   nsoil = cpoly%ntext_soil(k,isi)
  4935)                   call uextcm2tl( csite%mmean_soil_energy(k,ipa)                           &
  4936)                                 , csite%mmean_soil_water (k,ipa) * wdns                    &
  4937)                                 , soil(nsoil)%slcpd                                        &
  4938)                                 , csite%mmean_soil_temp  (k,ipa)                           &
  4939)                                 , csite%mmean_soil_fliq  (k,ipa))
  4940) 
  4941)                   cgrid_mmean_soil_hcap   (k)     = cgrid_mmean_soil_hcap(k)               &
  4942)                                                   + soil(nsoil)%slcpd * patch_wgt
  4943)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4944) 
  4945)                end do
  4946)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4947) 
  4948) 
  4949) 
  4950) 
  4951)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4952)                !   If the patch had some temporary snow/pounding layer, convert the mean   !
  4953)                ! energy to J/kg, then find the mean temperature and liquid fraction.       !
  4954)                ! Otherwise, set them to either zero or default values.                     !
  4955)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4956)                if (csite%mmean_sfcw_mass(ipa) > tiny_sfcwater_mass) then
  4957)                   csite%mmean_sfcw_energy(ipa) = csite%mmean_sfcw_energy(ipa)              &
  4958)                                                / csite%mmean_sfcw_mass  (ipa)
  4959)                   call uint2tl( csite%mmean_sfcw_energy(ipa), csite%mmean_sfcw_temp(ipa)   &
  4960)                               , csite%mmean_sfcw_fliq  (ipa))
  4961)                else
  4962)                   csite%mmean_sfcw_mass  (ipa)  = 0.
  4963)                   csite%mmean_sfcw_depth (ipa)  = 0.
  4964)                   csite%mmean_sfcw_energy(ipa)  = 0.
  4965)                   csite%mmean_sfcw_temp  (ipa)  = csite%mmean_soil_temp(nzg,ipa)
  4966)                   csite%mmean_sfcw_fliq  (ipa)  = csite%mmean_soil_fliq(nzg,ipa)
  4967)                end if
  4968)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4969) 
  4970) 
  4971) 
  4972)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4973)                !      Loop over the cohorts.                                               !
  4974)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4975)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  4976) 
  4977) 
  4978) 
  4979)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4980)                   !     Find the vegetation temperature and liquid fraction.               !
  4981)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  4982)                   !----- Leaf. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  4983)                   if (cpatch%mmean_leaf_hcap(ico) > 0.) then
  4984)                      call uextcm2tl( cpatch%mmean_leaf_energy(ico)                         &
  4985)                                    , cpatch%mmean_leaf_water (ico)                         &
  4986)                                    , cpatch%mmean_leaf_hcap  (ico)                         &
  4987)                                    , cpatch%mmean_leaf_temp  (ico)                         &
  4988)                                    , cpatch%mmean_leaf_fliq  (ico) )
  4989)                   else
  4990)                      cpatch%mmean_leaf_vpdef(ico) = csite%mmean_can_vpdef(ipa)
  4991)                      cpatch%mmean_leaf_temp (ico) = csite%mmean_can_temp (ipa)
  4992)                      if (csite%mmean_can_temp(ipa) > t00) then
  4993)                         cpatch%mmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 1.0
  4994)                      elseif (csite%mmean_can_temp(ipa) == t00) then
  4995)                         cpatch%mmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 0.5
  4996)                      else
  4997)                         cpatch%mmean_leaf_fliq(ico) = 0.0
  4998)                      end if
  4999)                   end if
  5000)                   !----- Wood. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  5001)                   if (cpatch%mmean_wood_hcap(ico) > 0.) then
  5002)                      call uextcm2tl( cpatch%mmean_wood_energy(ico)                         &
  5003)                                    , cpatch%mmean_wood_water (ico)                         &
  5004)                                    , cpatch%mmean_wood_hcap  (ico)                         &
  5005)                                    , cpatch%mmean_wood_temp  (ico)                         &
  5006)                                    , cpatch%mmean_wood_fliq  (ico) )
  5007)                   else
  5008)                      cpatch%mmean_wood_temp(ico) = csite%mmean_can_temp(ipa)
  5009)                      if (csite%mmean_can_temp(ipa) > t00) then
  5010)                         cpatch%mmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 1.0
  5011)                      elseif (csite%mmean_can_temp(ipa) == t00) then
  5012)                         cpatch%mmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 0.5
  5013)                      else
  5014)                         cpatch%mmean_wood_fliq(ico) = 0.0
  5015)                      end if
  5016)                   end if
  5017)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5018)                end do cohortloop
  5019)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5020)             end do patchloop
  5021)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5022)          end do siteloop
  5023)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5024) 
  5025) 
  5026) 
  5027) 
  5028) 
  5029) 
  5030)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5031)          !      Find the derived properties for the air above canopy.                      !
  5032)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5033)          atm_exner                 = press2exner (cgrid%mmean_atm_prss(ipy))
  5034)          cgrid%mmean_atm_temp(ipy) = extheta2temp(atm_exner,cgrid%mmean_atm_theta(ipy))
  5035)          cgrid%mmean_atm_rhos(ipy) = idealdenssh ( cgrid%mmean_atm_prss  (ipy)             &
  5036)                                                  , cgrid%mmean_atm_temp  (ipy)             &
  5037)                                                  , cgrid%mmean_atm_shv   (ipy) )
  5038)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5039) 
  5040) 
  5041) 
  5042) 
  5043)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5044)          !      Find the derived properties for the canopy air space.                      !
  5045)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5046)          can_exner                 = press2exner (cgrid%mmean_can_prss(ipy))
  5047)          cgrid%mmean_can_temp(ipy) = extheta2temp(can_exner,cgrid%mmean_can_theta(ipy))
  5048)          cgrid%mmean_can_rhos(ipy) = idealdenssh ( cgrid%mmean_can_prss  (ipy)             &
  5049)                                                  , cgrid%mmean_can_temp  (ipy)             &
  5050)                                                  , cgrid%mmean_can_shv   (ipy) )
  5051)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5052) 
  5053) 
  5054) 
  5055) 
  5056)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5057)          !   If the patch had some temporary snow/pounding layer, convert the mean energy  !
  5058)          ! to J/kg, then find the mean temperature and liquid fraction.  Otherwise, set    !
  5059)          ! them to either zero or default values.                                          !
  5060)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5061)          if (cgrid%mmean_sfcw_mass(ipy) > tiny_sfcwater_mass) then
  5062)             cgrid%mmean_sfcw_energy(ipy) = cgrid%mmean_sfcw_energy(ipy)                    &
  5063)                                          / cgrid%mmean_sfcw_mass(ipy)
  5064)             call uint2tl(cgrid%mmean_sfcw_energy(ipy),cgrid%mmean_sfcw_temp(ipy)           &
  5065)                         ,cgrid%mmean_sfcw_fliq(ipy))
  5066)          else
  5067)             cgrid%mmean_sfcw_mass  (ipy)  = 0.
  5068)             cgrid%mmean_sfcw_depth (ipy)  = 0.
  5069)             cgrid%mmean_sfcw_energy(ipy)  = 0.
  5070)             cgrid%mmean_sfcw_temp  (ipy)  = cgrid%mmean_soil_temp(nzg,ipy)
  5071)             cgrid%mmean_sfcw_fliq  (ipy)  = cgrid%mmean_soil_fliq(nzg,ipy)
  5072)          end if
  5073)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5074) 
  5075) 
  5076) 
  5077) 
  5078)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5079)          !     Find the temperature and the fraction of liquid water.                      !
  5080)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5081)          do k=1,nzg
  5082)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%mmean_soil_energy(k,ipy)                                 &
  5083)                           , cgrid%mmean_soil_water (k,ipy) * wdns                          &
  5084)                           , cgrid_mmean_soil_hcap  (k)                                     &
  5085)                           , cgrid%mmean_soil_temp  (k,ipy)                                 &
  5086)                           , cgrid%mmean_soil_fliq  (k,ipy) )
  5087)          end do
  5088)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5089) 
  5090) 
  5091) 
  5092)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5093)          !     Find the vegetation temperature and liquid fraction.                        !
  5094)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5095)          !----- Leaf. ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5096)          if (cgrid%mmean_leaf_hcap(ipy) > 0.) then
  5097)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%mmean_leaf_energy(ipy), cgrid%mmean_leaf_water (ipy)     &
  5098)                           , cgrid%mmean_leaf_hcap  (ipy), cgrid%mmean_leaf_temp  (ipy)     &
  5099)                           , cgrid%mmean_leaf_fliq  (ipy) )
  5100)          else
  5101)             cgrid%mmean_leaf_temp (ipy) = cgrid%mmean_can_temp (ipy)
  5102)             if (cgrid%mmean_can_temp(ipy) > t00) then
  5103)                cgrid%mmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 1.0
  5104)             elseif (cgrid%mmean_can_temp(ipy) == t00) then
  5105)                cgrid%mmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 0.5
  5106)             else
  5107)                cgrid%mmean_leaf_fliq(ipy) = 0.0
  5108)             end if
  5109)          end if
  5110)          !----- Wood. ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5111)          if (cgrid%mmean_wood_hcap(ipy) > 0.) then
  5112)             call uextcm2tl( cgrid%mmean_wood_energy(ipy)                                   &
  5113)                           , cgrid%mmean_wood_water (ipy)                                   &
  5114)                           , cgrid%mmean_wood_hcap  (ipy)                                   &
  5115)                           , cgrid%mmean_wood_temp  (ipy)                                   &
  5116)                           , cgrid%mmean_wood_fliq  (ipy) )
  5117)          else
  5118)             cgrid%mmean_wood_temp(ipy) = cgrid%mmean_can_temp(ipy)
  5119)             if (cgrid%mmean_can_temp(ipy) > t00) then
  5120)                cgrid%mmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 1.0
  5121)             elseif (cgrid%mmean_can_temp(ipy) == t00) then
  5122)                cgrid%mmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 0.5
  5123)             else
  5124)                cgrid%mmean_wood_fliq(ipy) = 0.0
  5125)             end if
  5126)          end if
  5127)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5128)       end do polyloop
  5129)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5130) 
  5131)       return
  5132)    end subroutine normalize_ed_mmean_vars
  5133)    !=======================================================================================!
  5134)    !=======================================================================================!
  5135) 
  5136) 
  5137) 
  5138) 
  5139) 
  5140) 
  5141)    !=======================================================================================!
  5142)    !=======================================================================================!
  5143)    !    This subroutine resets the monthly averages for variables actually used in the     !
  5144)    ! integration.                                                                          !
  5145)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5146)    subroutine zero_ed_mmean_vars(cgrid)
  5147)       use ed_state_vars  , only : edtype         & ! structure
  5148)                                 , polygontype    & ! structure
  5149)                                 , sitetype       & ! structure
  5150)                                 , patchtype      ! ! structure
  5151)       use physiology_coms, only : iddmort_scheme ! ! intent(in)
  5152)       implicit none
  5153)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5154)       type(edtype)     , target  :: cgrid
  5155)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  5156)       type(polygontype), pointer :: cpoly
  5157)       type(sitetype)   , pointer :: csite
  5158)       type(patchtype)  , pointer :: cpatch
  5159)       integer                    :: ipy
  5160)       integer                    :: isi
  5161)       integer                    :: ipa
  5162)       integer                    :: ico
  5163)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5164) 
  5165) 
  5166)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5167)       !       Loop over polygons.                                                          !
  5168)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5169)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  5170)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  5171) 
  5172)          cgrid%mmean_lai             (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5173)          cgrid%mmean_bleaf           (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5174)          cgrid%mmean_broot           (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5175)          cgrid%mmean_bstorage        (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5176)          cgrid%mmean_bleaf_n         (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5177)          cgrid%mmean_broot_n         (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5178)          cgrid%mmean_bstorage_n      (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5179)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_maintenance(:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5180)          cgrid%mmean_root_maintenance(:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5181)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_drop       (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  5182)          cgrid%mmean_fast_soil_c         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5183)          cgrid%mmean_slow_soil_c         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5184)          cgrid%mmean_struct_soil_c       (ipy) = 0.0 
  5185)          cgrid%mmean_struct_soil_l       (ipy) = 0.0 
  5186)          cgrid%mmean_cwd_c               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5187)          cgrid%mmean_fast_soil_n         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5188)          cgrid%mmean_mineral_soil_n      (ipy) = 0.0 
  5189)          cgrid%mmean_cwd_n               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5190)          cgrid%mmean_gpp                 (ipy) = 0.0 
  5191)          cgrid%mmean_npp                 (ipy) = 0.0 
  5192)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_resp           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5193)          cgrid%mmean_root_resp           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5194)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_growth_resp    (ipy) = 0.0 
  5195)          cgrid%mmean_root_growth_resp    (ipy) = 0.0 
  5196)          cgrid%mmean_sapa_growth_resp    (ipy) = 0.0 
  5197)          cgrid%mmean_sapb_growth_resp    (ipy) = 0.0 
  5198)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_storage_resp   (ipy) = 0.0 
  5199)          cgrid%mmean_root_storage_resp   (ipy) = 0.0 
  5200)          cgrid%mmean_sapa_storage_resp   (ipy) = 0.0 
  5201)          cgrid%mmean_sapb_storage_resp   (ipy) = 0.0 
  5202)          cgrid%mmean_plresp              (ipy) = 0.0 
  5203)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_energy         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5204)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_water          (ipy) = 0.0 
  5205)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_hcap           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5206)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_vpdef          (ipy) = 0.0 
  5207)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_temp           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5208)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_fliq           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5209)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_gsw            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5210)          cgrid%mmean_leaf_gbw            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5211)          cgrid%mmean_wood_energy         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5212)          cgrid%mmean_wood_water          (ipy) = 0.0

  5214)          cgrid%mmean_wood_temp           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5215)          cgrid%mmean_wood_fliq           (ipy) = 0.0

  5218)          cgrid%mmean_fsw                 (ipy) = 0.0 
  5219)          cgrid%mmean_fsn                 (ipy) = 0.0 
  5220)          cgrid%mmean_a_open              (ipy) = 0.0 
  5221)          cgrid%mmean_a_closed            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5222)          cgrid%mmean_a_net               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5223)          cgrid%mmean_a_light             (ipy) = 0.0
  5224)          cgrid%mmean_a_rubp              (ipy) = 0.0
  5225)          cgrid%mmean_a_co2               (ipy) = 0.0
  5226)          cgrid%mmean_psi_open            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5227)          cgrid%mmean_psi_closed          (ipy) = 0.0 
  5228)          cgrid%mmean_water_supply        (ipy) = 0.0

  5231)          cgrid%mmean_par_l_diff          (ipy) = 0.0 
  5232)          cgrid%mmean_rshort_l            (ipy) = 0.0

  5234)          cgrid%mmean_sensible_lc         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5235)          cgrid%mmean_vapor_lc            (ipy) = 0.0

  5255)          cgrid%mmean_rk4step             (ipy) = 0.0 
  5256)          cgrid%mmean_available_water     (ipy) = 0.0

  5278)          cgrid%mmean_rshort_gnd          (ipy) = 0.0 
  5279)          cgrid%mmean_par_gnd             (ipy) = 0.0 
  5280)          cgrid%mmean_rlong_gnd           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5281)          cgrid%mmean_rlongup             (ipy) = 0.0 
  5282)          cgrid%mmean_parup               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5283)          cgrid%mmean_nirup               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5284)          cgrid%mmean_rshortup            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5285)          cgrid%mmean_rnet                (ipy) = 0.0 
  5286)          cgrid%mmean_albedo              (ipy) = 0.0 
  5287)          cgrid%mmean_albedo_par          (ipy) = 0.0 
  5288)          cgrid%mmean_albedo_nir          (ipy) = 0.0 
  5289)          cgrid%mmean_rlong_albedo        (ipy) = 0.0 
  5290)          cgrid%mmean_ustar               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5291)          cgrid%mmean_tstar               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5292)          cgrid%mmean_qstar               (ipy) = 0.0

  5294)          cgrid%mmean_carbon_ac           (ipy) = 0.0

  5304)          cgrid%mmean_sensible_ac         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5305)          cgrid%mmean_sensible_gg       (:,ipy) = 0.0 
  5306)          cgrid%mmean_qthroughfall        (ipy) = 0.0 
  5307)          cgrid%mmean_qrunoff             (ipy) = 0.0 
  5308)          cgrid%mmean_qdrainage           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5309)          cgrid%mmean_nppleaf             (ipy) = 0.0
  5310)          cgrid%mmean_nppfroot            (ipy) = 0.0
  5311)          cgrid%mmean_nppsapwood          (ipy) = 0.0
  5312)          cgrid%mmean_nppcroot            (ipy) = 0.0
  5313)          cgrid%mmean_nppseeds            (ipy) = 0.0
  5314)          cgrid%mmean_nppwood             (ipy) = 0.0
  5315)          cgrid%mmean_nppdaily            (ipy) = 0.0
  5316)          cgrid%mmean_A_decomp            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5317)          cgrid%mmean_Af_decomp           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5318)          cgrid%mmean_co2_residual        (ipy) = 0.0 
  5319)          cgrid%mmean_energy_residual     (ipy) = 0.0 
  5320)          cgrid%mmean_water_residual      (ipy) = 0.0 
  5321)          cgrid%mmean_atm_theiv           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5322)          cgrid%mmean_atm_theta           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5323)          cgrid%mmean_atm_temp            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5324)          cgrid%mmean_atm_vpdef           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5325)          cgrid%mmean_atm_shv             (ipy) = 0.0 
  5326)          cgrid%mmean_atm_rshort          (ipy) = 0.0 
  5327)          cgrid%mmean_atm_rshort_diff     (ipy) = 0.0 
  5328)          cgrid%mmean_atm_par             (ipy) = 0.0 
  5329)          cgrid%mmean_atm_par_diff        (ipy) = 0.0 
  5330)          cgrid%mmean_atm_rlong           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5331)          cgrid%mmean_atm_vels            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5332)          cgrid%mmean_atm_rhos            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5333)          cgrid%mmean_atm_prss            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5334)          cgrid%mmean_atm_co2             (ipy) = 0.0 
  5335)          cgrid%mmean_pcpg                (ipy) = 0.0 
  5336)          cgrid%mmean_qpcpg               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5337)          cgrid%mmean_dpcpg               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5338)          cgrid%mmsqu_gpp                 (ipy) = 0.0 
  5339)          cgrid%mmsqu_npp                 (ipy) = 0.0 
  5340)          cgrid%mmsqu_plresp              (ipy) = 0.0 
  5341)          cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_lc         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5342)          cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_lc            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5343)          cgrid%mmsqu_transp              (ipy) = 0.0 
  5344)          cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_wc         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5345)          cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_wc            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5346)          cgrid%mmsqu_rh                  (ipy) = 0.0 
  5347)          cgrid%mmsqu_cwd_rh              (ipy) = 0.0 
  5348)          cgrid%mmsqu_nep                 (ipy) = 0.0 
  5349)          cgrid%mmsqu_rlongup             (ipy) = 0.0 
  5350)          cgrid%mmsqu_parup               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5351)          cgrid%mmsqu_nirup               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5352)          cgrid%mmsqu_rshortup            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5353)          cgrid%mmsqu_rnet                (ipy) = 0.0 
  5354)          cgrid%mmsqu_albedo              (ipy) = 0.0 
  5355)          cgrid%mmsqu_ustar               (ipy) = 0.0 
  5356)          cgrid%mmsqu_carbon_ac           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5357)          cgrid%mmsqu_carbon_st           (ipy) = 0.0 
  5358)          cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_gc            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5359)          cgrid%mmsqu_vapor_ac            (ipy) = 0.0 
  5360)          cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_gc         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5361)          cgrid%mmsqu_sensible_ac         (ipy) = 0.0 
  5362) 
  5363) 
  5364)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5365)          !       Loop over sites.                                                          !
  5366)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5367)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  5368)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  5369) 
  5370)             cpoly%mmean_atm_theiv      (isi) = 0.0
  5371)             cpoly%mmean_atm_theta      (isi) = 0.0
  5372)             cpoly%mmean_atm_temp       (isi) = 0.0
  5373)             cpoly%mmean_atm_vpdef      (isi) = 0.0
  5374)             cpoly%mmean_atm_shv        (isi) = 0.0
  5375)             cpoly%mmean_atm_rshort     (isi) = 0.0
  5376)             cpoly%mmean_atm_rshort_diff(isi) = 0.0
  5377)             cpoly%mmean_atm_par        (isi) = 0.0
  5378)             cpoly%mmean_atm_par_diff   (isi) = 0.0
  5379)             cpoly%mmean_atm_rlong      (isi) = 0.0
  5380)             cpoly%mmean_atm_vels       (isi) = 0.0
  5381)             cpoly%mmean_atm_rhos       (isi) = 0.0
  5382)             cpoly%mmean_atm_prss       (isi) = 0.0
  5383)             cpoly%mmean_atm_co2        (isi) = 0.0
  5384)             cpoly%mmean_pcpg           (isi) = 0.0
  5385)             cpoly%mmean_qpcpg          (isi) = 0.0
  5386)             cpoly%mmean_dpcpg          (isi) = 0.0
  5387) 
  5388) 
  5389)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5390)             !       Loop over sites.                                                       !
  5391)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5392)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  5393)                cpatch=> csite%patch(ipa)
  5394) 
  5395)                csite%mmean_fast_soil_c      (ipa) = 0.0
  5396)                csite%mmean_slow_soil_c      (ipa) = 0.0
  5397)                csite%mmean_struct_soil_c    (ipa) = 0.0
  5398)                csite%mmean_struct_soil_l    (ipa) = 0.0
  5399)                csite%mmean_fast_soil_n      (ipa) = 0.0
  5400)                csite%mmean_mineral_soil_n   (ipa) = 0.0
  5401)                csite%mmean_co2_residual     (ipa) = 0.0
  5402)                csite%mmean_energy_residual  (ipa) = 0.0
  5403)                csite%mmean_water_residual   (ipa) = 0.0
  5404)                csite%mmean_rh               (ipa) = 0.0
  5405)                csite%mmean_cwd_rh           (ipa) = 0.0
  5406)                csite%mmean_nep              (ipa) = 0.0
  5407)                csite%mmean_A_decomp         (ipa) = 0.0
  5408)                csite%mmean_Af_decomp        (ipa) = 0.0
  5409)                csite%mmean_rk4step          (ipa) = 0.0
  5410)                csite%mmean_available_water  (ipa) = 0.0
  5411)                csite%mmean_can_theiv        (ipa) = 0.0
  5412)                csite%mmean_can_theta        (ipa) = 0.0
  5413)                csite%mmean_can_vpdef        (ipa) = 0.0
  5414)                csite%mmean_can_temp         (ipa) = 0.0
  5415)                csite%mmean_can_shv          (ipa) = 0.0
  5416)                csite%mmean_can_co2          (ipa) = 0.0
  5417)                csite%mmean_can_rhos         (ipa) = 0.0
  5418)                csite%mmean_can_prss         (ipa) = 0.0
  5419)                csite%mmean_gnd_temp         (ipa) = 0.0
  5420)                csite%mmean_gnd_shv          (ipa) = 0.0
  5421)                csite%mmean_can_ggnd         (ipa) = 0.0
  5422)                csite%mmean_sfcw_depth       (ipa) = 0.0
  5423)                csite%mmean_sfcw_energy      (ipa) = 0.0
  5424)                csite%mmean_sfcw_mass        (ipa) = 0.0
  5425)                csite%mmean_sfcw_temp        (ipa) = 0.0
  5426)                csite%mmean_sfcw_fliq        (ipa) = 0.0
  5427)                csite%mmean_soil_energy    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  5428)                csite%mmean_soil_mstpot    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  5429)                csite%mmean_soil_water     (:,ipa) = 0.0
  5430)                csite%mmean_soil_temp      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  5431)                csite%mmean_soil_fliq      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  5432)                csite%mmean_rshort_gnd       (ipa) = 0.0
  5433)                csite%mmean_par_gnd          (ipa) = 0.0
  5434)                csite%mmean_rlong_gnd        (ipa) = 0.0
  5435)                csite%mmean_rlongup          (ipa) = 0.0
  5436)                csite%mmean_parup            (ipa) = 0.0
  5437)                csite%mmean_nirup            (ipa) = 0.0
  5438)                csite%mmean_rshortup         (ipa) = 0.0
  5439)                csite%mmean_rnet             (ipa) = 0.0
  5440)                csite%mmean_albedo           (ipa) = 0.0
  5441)                csite%mmean_albedo_par       (ipa) = 0.0
  5442)                csite%mmean_albedo_nir       (ipa) = 0.0
  5443)                csite%mmean_rlong_albedo     (ipa) = 0.0
  5444)                csite%mmean_ustar            (ipa) = 0.0
  5445)                csite%mmean_tstar            (ipa) = 0.0
  5446)                csite%mmean_qstar            (ipa) = 0.0
  5447)                csite%mmean_cstar            (ipa) = 0.0
  5448)                csite%mmean_carbon_ac        (ipa) = 0.0
  5449)                csite%mmean_carbon_st        (ipa) = 0.0
  5450)                csite%mmean_vapor_gc         (ipa) = 0.0
  5451)                csite%mmean_vapor_ac         (ipa) = 0.0
  5452)                csite%mmean_smoist_gg      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  5453)                csite%mmean_throughfall      (ipa) = 0.0
  5454)                csite%mmean_transloss      (:,ipa) = 0.0
  5455)                csite%mmean_runoff           (ipa) = 0.0
  5456)                csite%mmean_drainage         (ipa) = 0.0
  5457)                csite%mmean_sensible_gc      (ipa) = 0.0
  5458)                csite%mmean_sensible_ac      (ipa) = 0.0
  5459)                csite%mmean_sensible_gg    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  5460)                csite%mmean_qthroughfall     (ipa) = 0.0
  5461)                csite%mmean_qrunoff          (ipa) = 0.0
  5462)                csite%mmean_qdrainage        (ipa) = 0.0
  5463)                csite%mmean_A_decomp         (ipa) = 0.0
  5464)                csite%mmean_Af_decomp        (ipa) = 0.0
  5465)                csite%mmean_co2_residual     (ipa) = 0.0
  5466)                csite%mmean_energy_residual  (ipa) = 0.0
  5467)                csite%mmean_water_residual   (ipa) = 0.0
  5468)                csite%mmsqu_rh               (ipa) = 0.0
  5469)                csite%mmsqu_cwd_rh           (ipa) = 0.0
  5470)                csite%mmsqu_nep              (ipa) = 0.0
  5471)                csite%mmsqu_rlongup          (ipa) = 0.0
  5472)                csite%mmsqu_parup            (ipa) = 0.0
  5473)                csite%mmsqu_nirup            (ipa) = 0.0
  5474)                csite%mmsqu_rshortup         (ipa) = 0.0
  5475)                csite%mmsqu_rnet             (ipa) = 0.0
  5476)                csite%mmsqu_albedo           (ipa) = 0.0
  5477)                csite%mmsqu_ustar            (ipa) = 0.0
  5478)                csite%mmsqu_carbon_ac        (ipa) = 0.0
  5479)                csite%mmsqu_carbon_st        (ipa) = 0.0
  5480)                csite%mmsqu_vapor_gc         (ipa) = 0.0
  5481)                csite%mmsqu_vapor_ac         (ipa) = 0.0
  5482)                csite%mmsqu_sensible_gc      (ipa) = 0.0
  5483)                csite%mmsqu_sensible_ac      (ipa) = 0.0
  5484) 
  5485) 
  5486)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5487)                !       Loop over cohorts.                                                  !
  5488)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5489)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  5490)                   cpatch%mmean_lai               (ico) = 0.0
  5491)                   cpatch%mmean_bleaf             (ico) = 0.0
  5492)                   cpatch%mmean_broot             (ico) = 0.0
  5493)                   cpatch%mmean_bstorage          (ico) = 0.0
  5494)                   cpatch%mmean_mort_rate       (:,ico) = 0.0
  5495)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_maintenance  (ico) = 0.0
  5496)                   cpatch%mmean_root_maintenance  (ico) = 0.0
  5497)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_drop         (ico) = 0.0
  5498)                   select case (iddmort_scheme)
  5499)                   case (0)
  5500)                      cpatch%mmean_cb             (ico) = 0.0
  5501)                   case (1)
  5502)                      cpatch%mmean_cb             (ico) = cpatch%bstorage(ico)
  5503)                   end select
  5504)                   cpatch%mmean_gpp               (ico) = 0.0
  5505)                   cpatch%mmean_npp               (ico) = 0.0
  5506)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_resp         (ico) = 0.0
  5507)                   cpatch%mmean_root_resp         (ico) = 0.0
  5508)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  5509)                   cpatch%mmean_root_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  5510)                   cpatch%mmean_sapa_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  5511)                   cpatch%mmean_sapb_growth_resp  (ico) = 0.0
  5512)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  5513)                   cpatch%mmean_root_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  5514)                   cpatch%mmean_sapa_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  5515)                   cpatch%mmean_sapb_storage_resp (ico) = 0.0
  5516)                   cpatch%mmean_plresp            (ico) = 0.0
  5517)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_energy       (ico) = 0.0
  5518)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_water        (ico) = 0.0
  5519)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_hcap         (ico) = 0.0
  5520)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_vpdef        (ico) = 0.0
  5521)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_temp         (ico) = 0.0
  5522)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_fliq         (ico) = 0.0
  5523)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_gsw          (ico) = 0.0
  5524)                   cpatch%mmean_leaf_gbw          (ico) = 0.0
  5525)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_energy       (ico) = 0.0
  5526)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_water        (ico) = 0.0
  5527)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_hcap         (ico) = 0.0
  5528)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_temp         (ico) = 0.0
  5529)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_fliq         (ico) = 0.0
  5530)                   cpatch%mmean_wood_gbw          (ico) = 0.0
  5531)                   cpatch%mmean_fs_open           (ico) = 0.0
  5532)                   cpatch%mmean_fsw               (ico) = 0.0
  5533)                   cpatch%mmean_fsn               (ico) = 0.0
  5534)                   cpatch%mmean_a_open            (ico) = 0.0
  5535)                   cpatch%mmean_a_closed          (ico) = 0.0
  5536)                   cpatch%mmean_a_net             (ico) = 0.0
  5537)                   cpatch%mmean_a_light           (ico) = 0.0
  5538)                   cpatch%mmean_a_rubp            (ico) = 0.0
  5539)                   cpatch%mmean_a_co2             (ico) = 0.0
  5540)                   cpatch%mmean_psi_open          (ico) = 0.0
  5541)                   cpatch%mmean_psi_closed        (ico) = 0.0
  5542)                   cpatch%mmean_water_supply      (ico) = 0.0
  5543)                   cpatch%mmean_light_level       (ico) = 0.0
  5544)                   cpatch%mmean_light_level_beam  (ico) = 0.0
  5545)                   cpatch%mmean_light_level_diff  (ico) = 0.0
  5546) 
  5547)                   cpatch%mmean_par_level_beam    (ico) = 0.0
  5548)                   cpatch%mmean_par_level_diffd   (ico) = 0.0
  5549)                   cpatch%mmean_par_level_diffu   (ico) = 0.0
  5550) 
  5551)                   cpatch%mmean_par_l             (ico) = 0.0
  5552)                   cpatch%mmean_par_l_beam        (ico) = 0.0
  5553)                   cpatch%mmean_par_l_diff        (ico) = 0.0
  5554)                   cpatch%mmean_rshort_l          (ico) = 0.0
  5555)                   cpatch%mmean_rlong_l           (ico) = 0.0
  5556)                   cpatch%mmean_sensible_lc       (ico) = 0.0
  5557)                   cpatch%mmean_vapor_lc          (ico) = 0.0
  5558)                   cpatch%mmean_transp            (ico) = 0.0
  5559)                   cpatch%mmean_intercepted_al    (ico) = 0.0
  5560)                   cpatch%mmean_wshed_lg          (ico) = 0.0
  5561)                   cpatch%mmean_rshort_w          (ico) = 0.0
  5562)                   cpatch%mmean_rlong_w           (ico) = 0.0
  5563)                   cpatch%mmean_rad_profile     (:,ico) = 0.0
  5564)                   cpatch%mmean_sensible_wc       (ico) = 0.0
  5565)                   cpatch%mmean_vapor_wc          (ico) = 0.0
  5566)                   cpatch%mmean_intercepted_aw    (ico) = 0.0
  5567)                   cpatch%mmean_wshed_wg          (ico) = 0.0
  5568)                   cpatch%mmean_nppleaf           (ico) = 0.0
  5569)                   cpatch%mmean_nppfroot          (ico) = 0.0
  5570)                   cpatch%mmean_nppsapwood        (ico) = 0.0
  5571)                   cpatch%mmean_nppcroot          (ico) = 0.0
  5572)                   cpatch%mmean_nppseeds          (ico) = 0.0
  5573)                   cpatch%mmean_nppwood           (ico) = 0.0
  5574)                   cpatch%mmean_nppdaily          (ico) = 0.0
  5575)                   cpatch%mmsqu_gpp               (ico) = 0.0
  5576)                   cpatch%mmsqu_npp               (ico) = 0.0
  5577)                   cpatch%mmsqu_plresp            (ico) = 0.0
  5578)                   cpatch%mmsqu_sensible_lc       (ico) = 0.0
  5579)                   cpatch%mmsqu_vapor_lc          (ico) = 0.0
  5580)                   cpatch%mmsqu_transp            (ico) = 0.0
  5581)                   cpatch%mmsqu_sensible_wc       (ico) = 0.0
  5582)                   cpatch%mmsqu_vapor_wc          (ico) = 0.0
  5583)                end do cohortloop
  5584)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5585)             end do patchloop
  5586)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5587)          end do siteloop
  5588)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5589)       end do polyloop
  5590)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5591) 
  5592)       return
  5593)    end subroutine zero_ed_mmean_vars
  5594)    !=======================================================================================!
  5595)    !=======================================================================================!
  5596) 
  5597) 
  5598) 
  5599) 
  5600) 
  5601) 
  5602) 
  5603) 
  5604) 
  5605) 
  5606)    !=======================================================================================!
  5607)    !=======================================================================================!
  5608)    !=======================================================================================!
  5609)    !=======================================================================================!
  5610)    !=======================================================================================!
  5611)    !=======================================================================================!
  5612)    !                             |-------------------------------|                         !
  5613)    !                             |**** MEAN DIEL SUBROUTINES ****|                         !
  5614)    !                             |-------------------------------|                         !
  5615)    !=======================================================================================!
  5616)    !=======================================================================================!
  5617)    !=======================================================================================!
  5618)    !=======================================================================================!
  5619)    !=======================================================================================!
  5620)    !=======================================================================================!
  5621) 
  5622) 
  5623) 
  5624) 
  5625) 
  5626) 
  5627)    !=======================================================================================!
  5628)    !=======================================================================================!
  5629)    !    This subroutine integrates most of the mean diel variables.  This subroutine is    !
  5630)    ! called after the fmean variables have been normalised, so we can take advantage of    !
  5631)    ! their values.                                                                         !
  5632)    !                                                                                       !
  5633)    !    A few variables are _NOT_ integrated here: quantities such as temperature and      !
  5634)    ! liquid fraction are found after the mean diel of the extensive variables have been    !
  5635)    ! normalised.                                                                           !
  5636)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5637)    subroutine integrate_ed_qmean_vars(cgrid)
  5638)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype              & ! structure
  5639)                               , polygontype         & ! structure
  5640)                               , sitetype            & ! structure
  5641)                               , patchtype           ! ! structure
  5642)       use ed_misc_coms , only : frqfast             & ! intent(in)
  5643)                               , current_time        & ! intent(in)
  5644)                               , simtime             ! ! structure
  5645)       use consts_coms  , only : day_sec             ! ! intent(in)
  5646)       implicit none
  5647)       !----- Argument ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5648)       type(edtype)      , target  :: cgrid
  5649)       !----- Local variables --------------------------------------------------------------!
  5650)       type(polygontype) , pointer :: cpoly
  5651)       type(sitetype)    , pointer :: csite
  5652)       type(patchtype)   , pointer :: cpatch
  5653)       type(simtime)               :: daybefore
  5654)       integer                     :: ipy
  5655)       integer                     :: isi
  5656)       integer                     :: ipa
  5657)       integer                     :: ico
  5658)       integer                     :: t
  5659)       real                        :: ndaysi
  5660)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5661) 
  5662) 
  5663) 
  5664)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5665)       !     Find the index corresponding to this time of the day for the mean diurnal      !
  5666)       ! cycle averages.                                                                    !
  5667)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5668)       t = ceiling(mod(current_time%time,day_sec)/frqfast)
  5669)       if (t == 0) t = nint(day_sec/frqfast)
  5670)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5671) 
  5672) 
  5673) 
  5674)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5675)       !     Find which day we have just integrated, we will use it to determine the right  !
  5676)       ! scaling factor.                                                                    !
  5677)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5678)       call yesterday_info(current_time,daybefore,ndaysi)
  5679)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5680) 
  5681) 
  5682)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5683)       !      Use the variables that have been already aggregated.                          !
  5684)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5685)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  5686)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  5687) 
  5688) 
  5689)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5690)          !    Integrate polygon-level variables.                                           !
  5691)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  5692)          cgrid%qmean_gpp              (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_gpp              (t,ipy)       &
  5693)                                               + cgrid%fmean_gpp                (ipy)       &
  5694)                                               * ndaysi
  5695)          cgrid%qmean_npp              (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_npp              (t,ipy)       &
  5696)                                               + cgrid%fmean_npp                (ipy)       &
  5697)                                               * ndaysi
  5698)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_resp        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_resp        (t,ipy)       &
  5699)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_resp          (ipy)       &
  5700)                                               * ndaysi
  5701)          cgrid%qmean_root_resp        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_root_resp        (t,ipy)       &
  5702)                                               + cgrid%fmean_root_resp          (ipy)       &
  5703)                                               * ndaysi
  5704)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_growth_resp (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_growth_resp (t,ipy)       &
  5705)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_growth_resp   (ipy)       &
  5706)                                               * ndaysi
  5707)          cgrid%qmean_root_growth_resp (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_root_growth_resp (t,ipy)       &
  5708)                                               + cgrid%fmean_root_growth_resp   (ipy)       &
  5709)                                               * ndaysi
  5710)          cgrid%qmean_sapa_growth_resp (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sapa_growth_resp (t,ipy)       &
  5711)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sapa_growth_resp   (ipy)       &
  5712)                                               * ndaysi
  5713)          cgrid%qmean_sapb_growth_resp (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sapb_growth_resp (t,ipy)       &
  5714)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sapb_growth_resp   (ipy)       &
  5715)                                               * ndaysi
