  5716)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_storage_resp(t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_storage_resp(t,ipy)       &
  5717)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_storage_resp  (ipy)       &
  5718)                                               * ndaysi
  5719)          cgrid%qmean_root_storage_resp(t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sapa_storage_resp(t,ipy)       &
  5720)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sapa_storage_resp  (ipy)       &
  5721)                                               * ndaysi
  5722)          cgrid%qmean_sapa_storage_resp(t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sapb_storage_resp(t,ipy)       &
  5723)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sapb_storage_resp  (ipy)       &
  5724)                                               * ndaysi
  5725)          cgrid%qmean_sapb_storage_resp(t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sapb_storage_resp(t,ipy)       &
  5726)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sapb_storage_resp  (ipy)       &
  5727)                                               * ndaysi
  5728)          cgrid%qmean_plresp           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_plresp           (t,ipy)       &
  5729)                                               + cgrid%fmean_plresp             (ipy)       &
  5730)                                               * ndaysi
  5731)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_energy      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_energy      (t,ipy)       &
  5732)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_energy        (ipy)       &
  5733)                                               * ndaysi
  5734)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_water       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_water       (t,ipy)       &
  5735)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_water         (ipy)       &
  5736)                                               * ndaysi
  5737)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_hcap        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_hcap        (t,ipy)       &
  5738)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_hcap          (ipy)       &
  5739)                                               * ndaysi
  5740)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_vpdef       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_vpdef       (t,ipy)       &
  5741)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_vpdef         (ipy)       &
  5742)                                               * ndaysi
  5743)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_gsw         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_gsw         (t,ipy)       &
  5744)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_gsw           (ipy)       &
  5745)                                               * ndaysi
  5746)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_gbw         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_leaf_gbw         (t,ipy)       &
  5747)                                               + cgrid%fmean_leaf_gbw           (ipy)       &
  5748)                                               * ndaysi
  5749)          cgrid%qmean_wood_energy      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_wood_energy      (t,ipy)       &
  5750)                                               + cgrid%fmean_wood_energy        (ipy)       &
  5751)                                               * ndaysi
  5752)          cgrid%qmean_wood_water       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_wood_water       (t,ipy)       &
  5753)                                               + cgrid%fmean_wood_water         (ipy)       &
  5754)                                               * ndaysi
  5755)          cgrid%qmean_wood_hcap        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_wood_hcap        (t,ipy)       &
  5756)                                               + cgrid%fmean_wood_hcap          (ipy)       &
  5757)                                               * ndaysi
  5758)          cgrid%qmean_wood_gbw         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_wood_gbw         (t,ipy)       &
  5759)                                               + cgrid%fmean_wood_gbw           (ipy)       &
  5760)                                               * ndaysi
  5761)          cgrid%qmean_fs_open          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_fs_open          (t,ipy)       &
  5762)                                               + cgrid%fmean_fs_open            (ipy)       &
  5763)                                               * ndaysi
  5764)          cgrid%qmean_fsw              (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_fsw              (t,ipy)       &
  5765)                                               + cgrid%fmean_fsw                (ipy)       &
  5766)                                               * ndaysi
  5767)          cgrid%qmean_fsn              (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_fsn              (t,ipy)       &
  5768)                                               + cgrid%fmean_fsn                (ipy)       &
  5769)                                               * ndaysi
  5770)          cgrid%qmean_a_open           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_a_open           (t,ipy)       &
  5771)                                               + cgrid%fmean_a_open             (ipy)       &
  5772)                                               * ndaysi
  5773)          cgrid%qmean_a_closed         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_a_closed         (t,ipy)       &
  5774)                                               + cgrid%fmean_a_closed           (ipy)       &
  5775)                                               * ndaysi
  5776)          cgrid%qmean_a_net            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_a_net            (t,ipy)       &
  5777)                                               + cgrid%fmean_a_net              (ipy)       &
  5778)                                               * ndaysi
  5779)          cgrid%qmean_a_light          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_a_light          (t,ipy)       &
  5780)                                               + cgrid%fmean_a_light            (ipy)       &
  5781)                                               * ndaysi
  5782)          cgrid%qmean_a_rubp           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_a_rubp           (t,ipy)       &
  5783)                                               + cgrid%fmean_a_rubp             (ipy)       &
  5784)                                               * ndaysi
  5785)          cgrid%qmean_a_co2            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_a_co2            (t,ipy)       &
  5786)                                               + cgrid%fmean_a_co2              (ipy)       &
  5787)                                               * ndaysi
  5788)          cgrid%qmean_psi_open         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_psi_open         (t,ipy)       &
  5789)                                               + cgrid%fmean_psi_open           (ipy)       &
  5790)                                               * ndaysi
  5791)          cgrid%qmean_psi_closed       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_psi_closed       (t,ipy)       &
  5792)                                               + cgrid%fmean_psi_closed         (ipy)       &
  5793)                                               * ndaysi
  5794)          cgrid%qmean_water_supply     (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_water_supply     (t,ipy)       &
  5795)                                               + cgrid%fmean_water_supply       (ipy)       &
  5796)                                               * ndaysi
  5797)          cgrid%qmean_par_l            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_par_l            (t,ipy)       &
  5798)                                               + cgrid%fmean_par_l              (ipy)       &
  5799)                                               * ndaysi
  5800)          cgrid%qmean_par_l_beam       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_par_l_beam       (t,ipy)       &
  5801)                                               + cgrid%fmean_par_l_beam         (ipy)       &
  5802)                                               * ndaysi
  5803)          cgrid%qmean_par_l_diff       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_par_l_diff       (t,ipy)       &
  5804)                                               + cgrid%fmean_par_l_diff         (ipy)       &
  5805)                                               * ndaysi
  5806)          cgrid%qmean_rshort_l         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rshort_l         (t,ipy)       &
  5807)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rshort_l           (ipy)       &
  5808)                                               * ndaysi
  5809)          cgrid%qmean_rlong_l          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rlong_l          (t,ipy)       &
  5810)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rlong_l            (ipy)       &
  5811)                                               * ndaysi
  5812)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_lc      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sensible_lc      (t,ipy)       &
  5813)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sensible_lc        (ipy)       &
  5814)                                               * ndaysi
  5815)          cgrid%qmean_vapor_lc         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_vapor_lc         (t,ipy)       &
  5816)                                               + cgrid%fmean_vapor_lc           (ipy)       &
  5817)                                               * ndaysi
  5818)          cgrid%qmean_transp           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_transp           (t,ipy)       &
  5819)                                               + cgrid%fmean_transp             (ipy)       &
  5820)                                               * ndaysi
  5821)          cgrid%qmean_intercepted_al   (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_intercepted_al   (t,ipy)       &
  5822)                                               + cgrid%fmean_intercepted_al     (ipy)       &
  5823)                                               * ndaysi
  5824)          cgrid%qmean_wshed_lg         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_wshed_lg         (t,ipy)       &
  5825)                                               + cgrid%fmean_wshed_lg           (ipy)       &
  5826)                                               * ndaysi
  5827)          cgrid%qmean_rshort_w         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rshort_w         (t,ipy)       &
  5828)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rshort_w           (ipy)       &
  5829)                                               * ndaysi
  5830)          cgrid%qmean_rlong_w          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rlong_w          (t,ipy)       &
  5831)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rlong_w            (ipy)       &
  5832)                                               * ndaysi
  5833)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_wc      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sensible_wc      (t,ipy)       &
  5834)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sensible_wc        (ipy)       &
  5835)                                               * ndaysi
  5836)          cgrid%qmean_vapor_wc         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_vapor_wc         (t,ipy)       &
  5837)                                               + cgrid%fmean_vapor_wc           (ipy)       &
  5838)                                               * ndaysi
  5839)          cgrid%qmean_intercepted_aw   (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_intercepted_aw   (t,ipy)       &
  5840)                                               + cgrid%fmean_intercepted_aw     (ipy)       &
  5841)                                               * ndaysi
  5842)          cgrid%qmean_wshed_wg         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_wshed_wg         (t,ipy)       &
  5843)                                               + cgrid%fmean_wshed_wg           (ipy)       &
  5844)                                               * ndaysi
  5845)          cgrid%qmean_rh               (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rh               (t,ipy)       &
  5846)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rh                 (ipy)       &
  5847)                                               * ndaysi
  5848)          cgrid%qmean_cwd_rh           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_cwd_rh           (t,ipy)       &
  5849)                                               + cgrid%fmean_cwd_rh             (ipy)       &
  5850)                                               * ndaysi
  5851)          cgrid%qmean_nep              (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_nep              (t,ipy)       &
  5852)                                               + cgrid%fmean_nep                (ipy)       &
  5853)                                               * ndaysi
  5854)          cgrid%qmean_rk4step          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rk4step          (t,ipy)       &
  5855)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rk4step            (ipy)       &
  5856)                                               * ndaysi
  5857)          cgrid%qmean_available_water  (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_available_water  (t,ipy)       &
  5858)                                               + cgrid%fmean_available_water    (ipy)       &
  5859)                                               * ndaysi
  5860)          cgrid%qmean_can_theiv        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_theiv        (t,ipy)       &
  5861)                                               + cgrid%fmean_can_theiv          (ipy)       &
  5862)                                               * ndaysi
  5863)          cgrid%qmean_can_theta        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_theta        (t,ipy)       &
  5864)                                               + cgrid%fmean_can_theta          (ipy)       &
  5865)                                               * ndaysi
  5866)          cgrid%qmean_can_vpdef        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_vpdef        (t,ipy)       &
  5867)                                               + cgrid%fmean_can_vpdef          (ipy)       &
  5868)                                               * ndaysi
  5869)          cgrid%qmean_can_shv          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_shv          (t,ipy)       &
  5870)                                               + cgrid%fmean_can_shv            (ipy)       &
  5871)                                               * ndaysi
  5872)          cgrid%qmean_can_co2          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_co2          (t,ipy)       &
  5873)                                               + cgrid%fmean_can_co2            (ipy)       &
  5874)                                               * ndaysi
  5875)          cgrid%qmean_can_prss         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_prss         (t,ipy)       &
  5876)                                               + cgrid%fmean_can_prss           (ipy)       &
  5877)                                               * ndaysi
  5878)          cgrid%qmean_gnd_temp         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_gnd_temp         (t,ipy)       &
  5879)                                               + cgrid%fmean_gnd_temp           (ipy)       &
  5880)                                               * ndaysi
  5881)          cgrid%qmean_gnd_shv          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_gnd_shv          (t,ipy)       &
  5882)                                               + cgrid%fmean_gnd_shv            (ipy)       &
  5883)                                               * ndaysi
  5884)          cgrid%qmean_can_ggnd         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_ggnd         (t,ipy)       &
  5885)                                               + cgrid%fmean_can_ggnd           (ipy)       &
  5886)                                               * ndaysi
  5887)          cgrid%qmean_sfcw_depth       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sfcw_depth       (t,ipy)       &
  5888)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sfcw_depth         (ipy)       &
  5889)                                               * ndaysi
  5890)          !----- During the integration, pounding internal energy must be in J/m2. ---------!
  5891)          cgrid%qmean_sfcw_energy      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sfcw_energy      (t,ipy)       &
  5892)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sfcw_energy        (ipy)       &
  5893)                                               * cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass          (ipy)       &
  5894)                                               * ndaysi
  5895)          cgrid%qmean_sfcw_mass        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sfcw_mass        (t,ipy)       &
  5896)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sfcw_mass          (ipy)       &
  5897)                                               * ndaysi
  5898)          cgrid%qmean_soil_energy    (:,t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_soil_energy    (:,t,ipy)       &
  5899)                                               + cgrid%fmean_soil_energy      (:,ipy)       &
  5900)                                               * ndaysi
  5901)          cgrid%qmean_soil_mstpot    (:,t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_soil_mstpot    (:,t,ipy)       &
  5902)                                               + cgrid%fmean_soil_mstpot      (:,ipy)       &
  5903)                                               * ndaysi
  5904)          cgrid%qmean_soil_water     (:,t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_soil_water     (:,t,ipy)       &
  5905)                                               + cgrid%fmean_soil_water       (:,ipy)       &
  5906)                                               * ndaysi
  5907)          cgrid%qmean_rshort_gnd       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rshort_gnd       (t,ipy)       &
  5908)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rshort_gnd         (ipy)       &
  5909)                                               * ndaysi
  5910)          cgrid%qmean_par_gnd          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_par_gnd          (t,ipy)       &
  5911)                                               + cgrid%fmean_par_gnd            (ipy)       &
  5912)                                               * ndaysi
  5913)          cgrid%qmean_rlong_gnd        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rlong_gnd        (t,ipy)       &
  5914)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rlong_gnd          (ipy)       &
  5915)                                               * ndaysi
  5916)          cgrid%qmean_rlongup          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rlongup          (t,ipy)       &
  5917)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rlongup            (ipy)       &
  5918)                                               * ndaysi
  5919)          cgrid%qmean_parup            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_parup            (t,ipy)       &
  5920)                                               + cgrid%fmean_parup              (ipy)       &
  5921)                                               * ndaysi
  5922)          cgrid%qmean_nirup            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_nirup            (t,ipy)       &
  5923)                                               + cgrid%fmean_nirup              (ipy)       &
  5924)                                               * ndaysi
  5925)          cgrid%qmean_rshortup         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rshortup         (t,ipy)       &
  5926)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rshortup           (ipy)       &
  5927)                                               * ndaysi
  5928)          cgrid%qmean_rnet             (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rnet             (t,ipy)       &
  5929)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rnet               (ipy)       &
  5930)                                               * ndaysi
  5931)          cgrid%qmean_albedo           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_albedo           (t,ipy)       &
  5932)                                               + cgrid%fmean_albedo             (ipy)       &
  5933)                                               * ndaysi
  5934)          cgrid%qmean_albedo_par       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_albedo_par       (t,ipy)       &
  5935)                                               + cgrid%fmean_albedo_par         (ipy)       &
  5936)                                               * ndaysi
  5937)          cgrid%qmean_albedo_nir       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_albedo_nir       (t,ipy)       &
  5938)                                               + cgrid%fmean_albedo_nir         (ipy)       &
  5939)                                               * ndaysi
  5940)          cgrid%qmean_rlong_albedo     (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_rlong_albedo     (t,ipy)       &
  5941)                                               + cgrid%fmean_rlong_albedo       (ipy)       &
  5942)                                               * ndaysi
  5943)          cgrid%qmean_ustar            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_ustar            (t,ipy)       &
  5944)                                               + cgrid%fmean_ustar              (ipy)       &
  5945)                                               * ndaysi
  5946)          cgrid%qmean_tstar            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_tstar            (t,ipy)       &
  5947)                                               + cgrid%fmean_tstar              (ipy)       &
  5948)                                               * ndaysi
  5949)          cgrid%qmean_qstar            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_qstar            (t,ipy)       &
  5950)                                               + cgrid%fmean_qstar              (ipy)       &
  5951)                                               * ndaysi
  5952)          cgrid%qmean_cstar            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_cstar            (t,ipy)       &
  5953)                                               + cgrid%fmean_cstar              (ipy)       &
  5954)                                               * ndaysi
  5955)          cgrid%qmean_carbon_ac        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_carbon_ac        (t,ipy)       &
  5956)                                               + cgrid%fmean_carbon_ac          (ipy)       &
  5957)                                               * ndaysi
  5958)          cgrid%qmean_carbon_st        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_carbon_st        (t,ipy)       &
  5959)                                               + cgrid%fmean_carbon_st          (ipy)       &
  5960)                                               * ndaysi
  5961)          cgrid%qmean_vapor_gc         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_vapor_gc         (t,ipy)       &
  5962)                                               + cgrid%fmean_vapor_gc           (ipy)       &
  5963)                                               * ndaysi
  5964)          cgrid%qmean_vapor_ac         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_vapor_ac         (t,ipy)       &
  5965)                                               + cgrid%fmean_vapor_ac           (ipy)       &
  5966)                                               * ndaysi
  5967)          cgrid%qmean_smoist_gg      (:,t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_smoist_gg      (:,t,ipy)       &
  5968)                                               + cgrid%fmean_smoist_gg        (:,ipy)       &
  5969)                                               * ndaysi
  5970)          cgrid%qmean_throughfall      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_throughfall      (t,ipy)       &
  5971)                                               + cgrid%fmean_throughfall        (ipy)       &
  5972)                                               * ndaysi
  5973)          cgrid%qmean_transloss      (:,t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_transloss      (:,t,ipy)       &
  5974)                                               + cgrid%fmean_transloss        (:,ipy)       &
  5975)                                               * ndaysi
  5976)          cgrid%qmean_runoff           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_runoff           (t,ipy)       &
  5977)                                               + cgrid%fmean_runoff             (ipy)       &
  5978)                                               * ndaysi
  5979)          cgrid%qmean_drainage         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_drainage         (t,ipy)       &
  5980)                                               + cgrid%fmean_drainage           (ipy)       &
  5981)                                               * ndaysi
  5982)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_gc      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sensible_gc      (t,ipy)       &
  5983)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sensible_gc        (ipy)       &
  5984)                                               * ndaysi
  5985)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_ac      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sensible_ac      (t,ipy)       &
  5986)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sensible_ac        (ipy)       &
  5987)                                               * ndaysi
  5988)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_gg    (:,t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sensible_gg    (:,t,ipy)       &
  5989)                                               + cgrid%fmean_sensible_gg      (:,ipy)       &
  5990)                                               * ndaysi
  5991)          cgrid%qmean_qthroughfall     (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_qthroughfall     (t,ipy)       &
  5992)                                               + cgrid%fmean_qthroughfall       (ipy)       &
  5993)                                               * ndaysi
  5994)          cgrid%qmean_qrunoff          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_qrunoff          (t,ipy)       &
  5995)                                               + cgrid%fmean_qrunoff            (ipy)       &
  5996)                                               * ndaysi
  5997)          cgrid%qmean_qdrainage        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_qdrainage        (t,ipy)       &
  5998)                                               + cgrid%fmean_qdrainage          (ipy)       &
  5999)                                               * ndaysi
  6000)          cgrid%qmean_atm_theiv        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_theiv        (t,ipy)       &
  6001)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_theiv          (ipy)       &
  6002)                                               * ndaysi
  6003)          cgrid%qmean_atm_theta        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_theta        (t,ipy)       &
  6004)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_theta          (ipy)       &
  6005)                                               * ndaysi
  6006)          cgrid%qmean_atm_vpdef        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_vpdef        (t,ipy)       &
  6007)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_vpdef          (ipy)       &
  6008)                                               * ndaysi
  6009)          cgrid%qmean_atm_shv          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_shv          (t,ipy)       &
  6010)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_shv            (ipy)       &
  6011)                                               * ndaysi
  6012)          cgrid%qmean_atm_rshort       (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_rshort       (t,ipy)       &
  6013)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort         (ipy)       &
  6014)                                               * ndaysi
  6015)          cgrid%qmean_atm_rshort_diff  (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_rshort_diff  (t,ipy)       &
  6016)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_rshort_diff    (ipy)       &
  6017)                                               * ndaysi
  6018)          cgrid%qmean_atm_par          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_par          (t,ipy)       &
  6019)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_par            (ipy)       &
  6020)                                               * ndaysi
  6021)          cgrid%qmean_atm_par_diff     (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_par_diff     (t,ipy)       &
  6022)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_par_diff       (ipy)       &
  6023)                                               * ndaysi
  6024)          cgrid%qmean_atm_rlong        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_rlong        (t,ipy)       &
  6025)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_rlong          (ipy)       &
  6026)                                               * ndaysi
  6027)          cgrid%qmean_atm_vels         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_vels         (t,ipy)       &
  6028)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_vels           (ipy)       &
  6029)                                               * ndaysi
  6030)          cgrid%qmean_atm_prss         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_prss         (t,ipy)       &
  6031)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_prss           (ipy)       &
  6032)                                               * ndaysi
  6033)          cgrid%qmean_atm_co2          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_atm_co2          (t,ipy)       &
  6034)                                               + cgrid%fmean_atm_co2            (ipy)       &
  6035)                                               * ndaysi
  6036)          cgrid%qmean_pcpg             (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_pcpg             (t,ipy)       &
  6037)                                               + cgrid%fmean_pcpg               (ipy)       &
  6038)                                               * ndaysi
  6039)          cgrid%qmean_qpcpg            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_qpcpg            (t,ipy)       &
  6040)                                               + cgrid%fmean_qpcpg              (ipy)       &
  6041)                                               * ndaysi
  6042)          cgrid%qmean_dpcpg            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_dpcpg            (t,ipy)       &
  6043)                                               + cgrid%fmean_dpcpg              (ipy)       &
  6044)                                               * ndaysi
  6045)          !----- Mean sum of squares. ------------------------------------------------------#
  6046)          cgrid%qmsqu_gpp              (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_gpp                 (t,ipy)    &
  6047)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_gpp          (ipy))   &
  6048)                                               * ndaysi
  6049)          cgrid%qmsqu_npp              (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_npp                 (t,ipy)    &
  6050)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_npp          (ipy))   &
  6051)                                               * ndaysi
  6052)          cgrid%qmsqu_plresp           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_plresp              (t,ipy)    &
  6053)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_plresp       (ipy))   &
  6054)                                               * ndaysi
  6055)          cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_lc      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_lc         (t,ipy)    &
  6056)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_sensible_lc  (ipy))   &
  6057)                                               * ndaysi
  6058)          cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_lc         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_lc            (t,ipy)    &
  6059)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_vapor_lc     (ipy))   &
  6060)                                               * ndaysi
  6061)          cgrid%qmsqu_transp           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_transp              (t,ipy)    &
  6062)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_transp       (ipy))   &
  6063)                                               * ndaysi
  6064)          cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_wc      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_wc         (t,ipy)    &
  6065)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_sensible_wc  (ipy))   &
  6066)                                               * ndaysi
  6067)          cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_wc         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_wc            (t,ipy)    &
  6068)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_vapor_wc     (ipy))   &
  6069)                                               * ndaysi
  6070)          cgrid%qmsqu_rh               (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_rh                  (t,ipy)    &
  6071)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_rh           (ipy))   &
  6072)                                               * ndaysi
  6073)          cgrid%qmsqu_cwd_rh           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_cwd_rh              (t,ipy)    &
  6074)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_cwd_rh       (ipy))   &
  6075)                                               * ndaysi
  6076)          cgrid%qmsqu_nep              (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_nep                 (t,ipy)    &
  6077)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_nep          (ipy))   &
  6078)                                               * ndaysi
  6079)          cgrid%qmsqu_rlongup          (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_rlongup             (t,ipy)    &
  6080)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_rlongup      (ipy))   &
  6081)                                               * ndaysi
  6082)          cgrid%qmsqu_parup            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_parup               (t,ipy)    &
  6083)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_parup        (ipy))   &
  6084)                                               * ndaysi
  6085)          cgrid%qmsqu_nirup            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_nirup               (t,ipy)    &
  6086)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_nirup        (ipy))   &
  6087)                                               * ndaysi
  6088)          cgrid%qmsqu_rshortup         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_rshortup            (t,ipy)    &
  6089)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_rshortup     (ipy))   &
  6090)                                               * ndaysi
  6091)          cgrid%qmsqu_rnet             (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_rnet                (t,ipy)    &
  6092)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_rnet         (ipy))   &
  6093)                                               * ndaysi
  6094)          cgrid%qmsqu_albedo           (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_albedo              (t,ipy)    &
  6095)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_albedo       (ipy))   &
  6096)                                               * ndaysi
  6097)          cgrid%qmsqu_ustar            (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_ustar               (t,ipy)    &
  6098)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_ustar        (ipy))   &
  6099)                                               * ndaysi
  6100)          cgrid%qmsqu_carbon_ac        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_carbon_ac           (t,ipy)    &
  6101)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_carbon_ac    (ipy))   &
  6102)                                               * ndaysi
  6103)          cgrid%qmsqu_carbon_st        (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_carbon_st           (t,ipy)    &
  6104)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_carbon_st    (ipy))   &
  6105)                                               * ndaysi
  6106)          cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_gc         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_gc            (t,ipy)    &
  6107)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_vapor_gc     (ipy))   &
  6108)                                               * ndaysi
  6109)          cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_ac         (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_ac            (t,ipy)    &
  6110)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_vapor_ac     (ipy))   &
  6111)                                               * ndaysi
  6112)          cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_gc      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_gc         (t,ipy)    &
  6113)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_sensible_gc  (ipy))   &
  6114)                                               * ndaysi
  6115)          cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_ac      (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_ac         (t,ipy)    &
  6116)                                               + isqu_ftz(cgrid%fmean_sensible_ac  (ipy))   &
  6117)                                               * ndaysi
  6118)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6119) 
  6120) 
  6121) 
  6122)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6123)          !      Site loop.                                                                 !
  6124)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6125)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  6126)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  6127) 
  6128)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6129)             !    Integrate site-level variables.                                           !
  6130)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6131)             cpoly%qmean_atm_theiv      (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_theiv      (t,isi)        &
  6132)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_theiv        (isi)        &
  6133)                                                * ndaysi
  6134)             cpoly%qmean_atm_theta      (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_theta      (t,isi)        &
  6135)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_theta        (isi)        &
  6136)                                                * ndaysi
  6137)             cpoly%qmean_atm_vpdef      (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_vpdef      (t,isi)        &
  6138)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_vpdef        (isi)        &
  6139)                                                * ndaysi
  6140)             cpoly%qmean_atm_shv        (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_shv        (t,isi)        &
  6141)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_shv          (isi)        &
  6142)                                                * ndaysi
  6143)             cpoly%qmean_atm_rshort     (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_rshort     (t,isi)        &
  6144)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort       (isi)        &
  6145)                                                * ndaysi
  6146)             cpoly%qmean_atm_rshort_diff(t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_rshort_diff(t,isi)        &
  6147)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_rshort_diff  (isi)        &
  6148)                                                * ndaysi
  6149)             cpoly%qmean_atm_par        (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_par        (t,isi)        &
  6150)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_par          (isi)        &
  6151)                                                * ndaysi
  6152)             cpoly%qmean_atm_par_diff   (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_par_diff   (t,isi)        &
  6153)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_par_diff     (isi)        &
  6154)                                                * ndaysi
  6155)             cpoly%qmean_atm_rlong      (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_rlong      (t,isi)        &
  6156)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_rlong        (isi)        &
  6157)                                                * ndaysi
  6158)             cpoly%qmean_atm_vels       (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_vels       (t,isi)        &
  6159)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_vels         (isi)        &
  6160)                                                * ndaysi
  6161)             cpoly%qmean_atm_prss       (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_prss       (t,isi)        &
  6162)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_prss         (isi)        &
  6163)                                                * ndaysi
  6164)             cpoly%qmean_atm_co2        (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_atm_co2        (t,isi)        &
  6165)                                                + cpoly%fmean_atm_co2          (isi)        &
  6166)                                                * ndaysi
  6167)             cpoly%qmean_pcpg           (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_pcpg           (t,isi)        &
  6168)                                                + cpoly%fmean_pcpg             (isi)        &
  6169)                                                * ndaysi
  6170)             cpoly%qmean_qpcpg          (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_qpcpg          (t,isi)        &
  6171)                                                + cpoly%fmean_qpcpg            (isi)        &
  6172)                                                * ndaysi
  6173)             cpoly%qmean_dpcpg          (t,isi) = cpoly%qmean_dpcpg          (t,isi)        &
  6174)                                                + cpoly%fmean_dpcpg            (isi)        &
  6175)                                                * ndaysi
  6176)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6177) 
  6178) 
  6179) 
  6180)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6181)             !      Patch loop.                                                             !
  6182)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6183)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  6184)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  6185) 
  6186)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6187)                !      Integrate patch-level variables.                                     !
  6188)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6189)                csite%qmean_rh               (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_rh               (t,ipa) &
  6190)                                                     + csite%fmean_rh                 (ipa) &
  6191)                                                     * ndaysi
  6192)                csite%qmean_cwd_rh           (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_cwd_rh           (t,ipa) &
  6193)                                                     + csite%fmean_cwd_rh             (ipa) &
  6194)                                                     * ndaysi
  6195)                csite%qmean_nep              (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_nep              (t,ipa) &
  6196)                                                     + csite%fmean_nep                (ipa) &
  6197)                                                     * ndaysi
  6198)                csite%qmean_rk4step          (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_rk4step          (t,ipa) &
  6199)                                                     + csite%fmean_rk4step            (ipa) &
  6200)                                                     * ndaysi
  6201)                csite%qmean_available_water  (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_available_water  (t,ipa) &
  6202)                                                     + csite%fmean_available_water    (ipa) &
  6203)                                                     * ndaysi
  6204)                csite%qmean_can_theiv        (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_can_theiv        (t,ipa) &
  6205)                                                     + csite%fmean_can_theiv          (ipa) &
  6206)                                                     * ndaysi
  6207)                csite%qmean_can_theta        (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_can_theta        (t,ipa) &
  6208)                                                     + csite%fmean_can_theta          (ipa) &
  6209)                                                     * ndaysi
  6210)                csite%qmean_can_vpdef        (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_can_vpdef        (t,ipa) &
  6211)                                                     + csite%fmean_can_vpdef          (ipa) &
  6212)                                                     * ndaysi
  6213)                csite%qmean_can_shv          (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_can_shv          (t,ipa) &
  6214)                                                     + csite%fmean_can_shv            (ipa) &
  6215)                                                     * ndaysi
  6216)                csite%qmean_can_co2          (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_can_co2          (t,ipa) &
  6217)                                                     + csite%fmean_can_co2            (ipa) &
  6218)                                                     * ndaysi
  6219)                csite%qmean_can_prss         (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_can_prss         (t,ipa) &
  6220)                                                     + csite%fmean_can_prss           (ipa) &
  6221)                                                     * ndaysi
  6222)                csite%qmean_gnd_temp         (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_gnd_temp         (t,ipa) &
  6223)                                                     + csite%fmean_gnd_temp           (ipa) &
  6224)                                                     * ndaysi
  6225)                csite%qmean_gnd_shv          (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_gnd_shv          (t,ipa) &
  6226)                                                     + csite%fmean_gnd_shv            (ipa) &
  6227)                                                     * ndaysi
  6228)                csite%qmean_can_ggnd         (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_can_ggnd         (t,ipa) &
  6229)                                                     + csite%fmean_can_ggnd           (ipa) &
  6230)                                                     * ndaysi
  6231)                csite%qmean_sfcw_depth       (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_sfcw_depth       (t,ipa) &
  6232)                                                     + csite%fmean_sfcw_depth         (ipa) &
  6233)                                                     * ndaysi
  6234)                !------ Integrate pounding internal energy in extensive format [J/m2]. -----!
  6235)                csite%qmean_sfcw_energy      (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_sfcw_energy      (t,ipa) &
  6236)                                                     + csite%fmean_sfcw_energy        (ipa) &
  6237)                                                     * csite%fmean_sfcw_mass          (ipa) &
  6238)                                                     * ndaysi
  6239)                csite%qmean_sfcw_mass        (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_sfcw_mass        (t,ipa) &
  6240)                                                     + csite%fmean_sfcw_mass          (ipa) &
  6241)                                                     * ndaysi
  6242)                csite%qmean_soil_energy    (:,t,ipa) = csite%qmean_soil_energy    (:,t,ipa) &
  6243)                                                     + csite%fmean_soil_energy      (:,ipa) &
  6244)                                                     * ndaysi
  6245)                csite%qmean_soil_mstpot    (:,t,ipa) = csite%qmean_soil_mstpot    (:,t,ipa) &
  6246)                                                     + csite%fmean_soil_mstpot      (:,ipa) &
  6247)                                                     * ndaysi
  6248)                csite%qmean_soil_water     (:,t,ipa) = csite%qmean_soil_water     (:,t,ipa) &
  6249)                                                     + csite%fmean_soil_water       (:,ipa) &
  6250)                                                     * ndaysi
  6251)                csite%qmean_rshort_gnd       (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_rshort_gnd       (t,ipa) &
  6252)                                                     + csite%fmean_rshort_gnd         (ipa) &
  6253)                                                     * ndaysi
  6254)                csite%qmean_par_gnd          (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_par_gnd          (t,ipa) &
  6255)                                                     + csite%fmean_par_gnd            (ipa) &
  6256)                                                     * ndaysi
  6257)                csite%qmean_rlong_gnd        (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_rlong_gnd        (t,ipa) &
  6258)                                                     + csite%fmean_rlong_gnd          (ipa) &
  6259)                                                     * ndaysi
  6260)                csite%qmean_rlongup          (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_rlongup          (t,ipa) &
  6261)                                                     + csite%fmean_rlongup            (ipa) &
  6262)                                                     * ndaysi
  6263)                csite%qmean_parup            (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_parup            (t,ipa) &
  6264)                                                     + csite%fmean_parup              (ipa) &
  6265)                                                     * ndaysi
  6266)                csite%qmean_nirup            (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_nirup            (t,ipa) &
  6267)                                                     + csite%fmean_nirup              (ipa) &
  6268)                                                     * ndaysi
  6269)                csite%qmean_rshortup         (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_rshortup         (t,ipa) &
  6270)                                                     + csite%fmean_rshortup           (ipa) &
  6271)                                                     * ndaysi
  6272)                csite%qmean_rnet             (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_rnet             (t,ipa) &
  6273)                                                     + csite%fmean_rnet               (ipa) &
  6274)                                                     * ndaysi
  6275)                csite%qmean_albedo           (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_albedo           (t,ipa) &
  6276)                                                     + csite%fmean_albedo             (ipa) &
  6277)                                                     * ndaysi
  6278)                csite%qmean_albedo_par       (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_albedo_par       (t,ipa) &
  6279)                                                     + csite%fmean_albedo_par         (ipa) &
  6280)                                                     * ndaysi
  6281)                csite%qmean_albedo_nir       (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_albedo_nir       (t,ipa) &
  6282)                                                     + csite%fmean_albedo_nir         (ipa) &
  6283)                                                     * ndaysi
  6284)                csite%qmean_rlong_albedo     (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_rlong_albedo     (t,ipa) &
  6285)                                                     + csite%fmean_rlong_albedo       (ipa) &
  6286)                                                     * ndaysi
  6287)                csite%qmean_ustar            (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_ustar            (t,ipa) &
  6288)                                                     + csite%fmean_ustar              (ipa) &
  6289)                                                     * ndaysi
  6290)                csite%qmean_tstar            (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_tstar            (t,ipa) &
  6291)                                                     + csite%fmean_tstar              (ipa) &
  6292)                                                     * ndaysi
  6293)                csite%qmean_qstar            (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_qstar            (t,ipa) &
  6294)                                                     + csite%fmean_qstar              (ipa) &
  6295)                                                     * ndaysi
  6296)                csite%qmean_cstar            (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_cstar            (t,ipa) &
  6297)                                                     + csite%fmean_cstar              (ipa) &
  6298)                                                     * ndaysi
  6299)                csite%qmean_carbon_ac        (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_carbon_ac        (t,ipa) &
  6300)                                                     + csite%fmean_carbon_ac          (ipa) &
  6301)                                                     * ndaysi
  6302)                csite%qmean_carbon_st        (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_carbon_st        (t,ipa) &
  6303)                                                     + csite%fmean_carbon_st          (ipa) &
  6304)                                                     * ndaysi
  6305)                csite%qmean_vapor_gc         (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_vapor_gc         (t,ipa) &
  6306)                                                     + csite%fmean_vapor_gc           (ipa) &
  6307)                                                     * ndaysi
  6308)                csite%qmean_vapor_ac         (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_vapor_ac         (t,ipa) &
  6309)                                                     + csite%fmean_vapor_ac           (ipa) &
  6310)                                                     * ndaysi
  6311)                csite%qmean_smoist_gg      (:,t,ipa) = csite%qmean_smoist_gg      (:,t,ipa) &
  6312)                                                     + csite%fmean_smoist_gg        (:,ipa) &
  6313)                                                     * ndaysi
  6314)                csite%qmean_throughfall      (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_throughfall      (t,ipa) &
  6315)                                                     + csite%fmean_throughfall        (ipa) &
  6316)                                                     * ndaysi
  6317)                csite%qmean_transloss      (:,t,ipa) = csite%qmean_transloss      (:,t,ipa) &
  6318)                                                     + csite%fmean_transloss        (:,ipa) &
  6319)                                                     * ndaysi
  6320)                csite%qmean_runoff           (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_runoff           (t,ipa) &
  6321)                                                     + csite%fmean_runoff             (ipa) &
  6322)                                                     * ndaysi
  6323)                csite%qmean_drainage         (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_drainage         (t,ipa) &
  6324)                                                     + csite%fmean_drainage           (ipa) &
  6325)                                                     * ndaysi
  6326)                csite%qmean_sensible_gc      (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_sensible_gc      (t,ipa) &
  6327)                                                     + csite%fmean_sensible_gc        (ipa) &
  6328)                                                     * ndaysi
  6329)                csite%qmean_sensible_ac      (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_sensible_ac      (t,ipa) &
  6330)                                                     + csite%fmean_sensible_ac        (ipa) &
  6331)                                                     * ndaysi
  6332)                csite%qmean_sensible_gg    (:,t,ipa) = csite%qmean_sensible_gg    (:,t,ipa) &
  6333)                                                     + csite%fmean_sensible_gg      (:,ipa) &
  6334)                                                     * ndaysi
  6335)                csite%qmean_qthroughfall     (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_qthroughfall     (t,ipa) &
  6336)                                                     + csite%fmean_qthroughfall       (ipa) &
  6337)                                                     * ndaysi
  6338)                csite%qmean_qrunoff          (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_qrunoff          (t,ipa) &
  6339)                                                     + csite%fmean_qrunoff            (ipa) &
  6340)                                                     * ndaysi
  6341)                csite%qmean_qdrainage        (t,ipa) = csite%qmean_qdrainage        (t,ipa) &
  6342)                                                     + csite%fmean_qdrainage          (ipa) &
  6343)                                                     * ndaysi
  6344)                !------ Integrate the mean sum of squares. ---------------------------------!
  6345)                csite%qmsqu_rh           (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_rh                  (t,ipa)  &
  6346)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_rh           (ipa)) &
  6347)                                                 * ndaysi                                 
  6348)                csite%qmsqu_cwd_rh       (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_cwd_rh              (t,ipa)  &
  6349)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_cwd_rh       (ipa)) &
  6350)                                                 * ndaysi
  6351)                csite%qmsqu_nep          (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_nep                 (t,ipa)  &
  6352)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_nep          (ipa)) &
  6353)                                                 * ndaysi
  6354)                csite%qmsqu_rlongup      (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_rlongup             (t,ipa)  &
  6355)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_rlongup      (ipa)) &
  6356)                                                 * ndaysi
  6357)                csite%qmsqu_parup        (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_parup               (t,ipa)  &
  6358)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_parup        (ipa)) &
  6359)                                                 * ndaysi
  6360)                csite%qmsqu_nirup        (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_nirup               (t,ipa)  &
  6361)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_nirup        (ipa)) &
  6362)                                                 * ndaysi                                 
  6363)                csite%qmsqu_rshortup     (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_rshortup            (t,ipa)  &
  6364)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_rshortup     (ipa)) &
  6365)                                                 * ndaysi
  6366)                csite%qmsqu_rnet         (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_rnet                (t,ipa)  &
  6367)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_rnet         (ipa)) &
  6368)                                                 * ndaysi
  6369)                csite%qmsqu_albedo       (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_albedo              (t,ipa)  &
  6370)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_albedo       (ipa)) &
  6371)                                                 * ndaysi
  6372)                csite%qmsqu_ustar        (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_ustar               (t,ipa)  &
  6373)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_ustar        (ipa)) &
  6374)                                                 * ndaysi
  6375)                csite%qmsqu_carbon_ac    (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_carbon_ac           (t,ipa)  &
  6376)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_carbon_ac    (ipa)) &
  6377)                                                 * ndaysi
  6378)                csite%qmsqu_carbon_st    (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_carbon_st           (t,ipa)  &
  6379)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_carbon_st    (ipa)) &
  6380)                                                 * ndaysi
  6381)                csite%qmsqu_vapor_gc     (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_vapor_gc            (t,ipa)  &
  6382)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_vapor_gc     (ipa)) &
  6383)                                                 * ndaysi
  6384)                csite%qmsqu_vapor_ac     (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_vapor_ac            (t,ipa)  &
  6385)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_vapor_ac     (ipa)) &
  6386)                                                 * ndaysi
  6387)                csite%qmsqu_sensible_gc  (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_sensible_gc         (t,ipa)  &
  6388)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_sensible_gc  (ipa)) &
  6389)                                                 * ndaysi
  6390)                csite%qmsqu_sensible_ac  (t,ipa) = csite%qmsqu_sensible_ac         (t,ipa)  &
  6391)                                                 + isqu_ftz(csite%fmean_sensible_ac  (ipa)) &
  6392)                                                 * ndaysi
  6393)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6394) 
  6395) 
  6396) 
  6397)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6398)                !      Patch loop.                                                          !
  6399)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6400)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  6401)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6402)                   !      Integrate cohort-level variables.                                 !
  6403)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6404)                   cpatch%qmean_gpp           (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_gpp           (t,ico)  &
  6405)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_gpp             (ico)  &
  6406)                                                      * ndaysi
  6407)                   cpatch%qmean_npp           (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_npp           (t,ico)  &
  6408)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_npp             (ico)  &
  6409)                                                      * ndaysi
  6410)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_resp     (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_leaf_resp     (t,ico)  &
  6411)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_resp       (ico)  &
  6412)                                                      * ndaysi
  6413)                   cpatch%qmean_root_resp     (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_root_resp     (t,ico)  &
  6414)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_root_resp       (ico)  &
  6415)                                                      * ndaysi
  6416)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_growth_resp(t,ico)=cpatch%qmean_leaf_growth_resp(t,ico)&
  6417)                                                       +cpatch%fmean_leaf_growth_resp  (ico)&
  6418)                                                       *ndaysi
  6419)                   cpatch%qmean_root_growth_resp(t,ico)=cpatch%qmean_root_growth_resp(t,ico)&
  6420)                                                       +cpatch%fmean_root_growth_resp  (ico)&
  6421)                                                       *ndaysi
  6422)                   cpatch%qmean_sapa_growth_resp(t,ico)=cpatch%qmean_sapa_growth_resp(t,ico)&
  6423)                                                       +cpatch%fmean_sapa_growth_resp  (ico)&
  6424)                                                       *ndaysi
  6425)                   cpatch%qmean_sapb_growth_resp(t,ico)=cpatch%qmean_sapb_growth_resp(t,ico)&
  6426)                                                       +cpatch%fmean_sapb_growth_resp  (ico)&
  6427)                                                       *ndaysi
  6428)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_storage_resp(t,ico)= cpatch%qmean_leaf_storage_resp(t,ico)&
  6429)                                                        + cpatch%fmean_leaf_storage_resp  (ico)&
  6430)                                                        * ndaysi
  6431)                   cpatch%qmean_root_storage_resp(t,ico)= cpatch%qmean_root_storage_resp(t,ico)&
  6432)                                                        + cpatch%fmean_root_storage_resp  (ico)&
  6433)                                                        * ndaysi
  6434)                   cpatch%qmean_sapa_storage_resp(t,ico)= cpatch%qmean_sapa_storage_resp(t,ico)&
  6435)                                                        + cpatch%fmean_sapa_storage_resp  (ico)&
  6436)                                                        * ndaysi
  6437)                   cpatch%qmean_sapb_storage_resp(t,ico)= cpatch%qmean_sapb_storage_resp(t,ico)&
  6438)                                                        + cpatch%fmean_sapb_storage_resp  (ico)&
  6439)                                                        * ndaysi
  6440)                   cpatch%qmean_plresp        (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_plresp        (t,ico)  &
  6441)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_plresp          (ico)  &
  6442)                                                      * ndaysi
  6443)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_energy   (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_leaf_energy   (t,ico)  &
  6444)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_energy     (ico)  &
  6445)                                                      * ndaysi
  6446)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_water    (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_leaf_water    (t,ico)  &
  6447)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_water      (ico)  &
  6448)                                                      * ndaysi
  6449)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_hcap     (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_leaf_hcap     (t,ico)  &
  6450)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_hcap       (ico)  &
  6451)                                                      * ndaysi
  6452)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_vpdef    (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_leaf_vpdef    (t,ico)  &
  6453)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_vpdef      (ico)  &
  6454)                                                      * ndaysi
  6455)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_gsw      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_leaf_gsw      (t,ico)  &
  6456)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_gsw        (ico)  &
  6457)                                                      * ndaysi
  6458)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_gbw      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_leaf_gbw      (t,ico)  &
  6459)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_leaf_gbw        (ico)  &
  6460)                                                      * ndaysi
  6461)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_energy   (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_wood_energy   (t,ico)  &
  6462)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_wood_energy     (ico)  &
  6463)                                                      * ndaysi
  6464)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_water    (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_wood_water    (t,ico)  &
  6465)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_wood_water      (ico)  &
  6466)                                                      * ndaysi
  6467)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_hcap     (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_wood_hcap     (t,ico)  &
  6468)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_wood_hcap       (ico)  &
  6469)                                                      * ndaysi
  6470)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_gbw      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_wood_gbw      (t,ico)  &
  6471)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_wood_gbw        (ico)  &
  6472)                                                      * ndaysi
  6473)                   cpatch%qmean_fs_open       (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_fs_open       (t,ico)  &
  6474)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_fs_open         (ico)  &
  6475)                                                      * ndaysi
  6476)                   cpatch%qmean_fsw           (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_fsw           (t,ico)  &
  6477)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_fsw             (ico)  &
  6478)                                                      * ndaysi
  6479)                   cpatch%qmean_fsn           (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_fsn           (t,ico)  &
  6480)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_fsn             (ico)  &
  6481)                                                      * ndaysi
  6482)                   cpatch%qmean_a_open        (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_a_open        (t,ico)  &
  6483)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_a_open          (ico)  &
  6484)                                                      * ndaysi
  6485)                   cpatch%qmean_a_closed      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_a_closed      (t,ico)  &
  6486)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_a_closed        (ico)  &
  6487)                                                      * ndaysi
  6488)                   cpatch%qmean_a_net         (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_a_net         (t,ico)  &
  6489)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_a_net           (ico)  &
  6490)                                                      * ndaysi
  6491)                   cpatch%qmean_a_rubp        (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_a_rubp        (t,ico)  &
  6492)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_a_rubp          (ico)  &
  6493)                                                      * ndaysi
  6494)                   cpatch%qmean_a_co2         (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_a_co2         (t,ico)  &
  6495)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_a_co2           (ico)  &
  6496)                                                      * ndaysi
  6497)                   cpatch%qmean_psi_open      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_psi_open      (t,ico)  &
  6498)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_psi_open        (ico)  &
  6499)                                                      * ndaysi
  6500)                   cpatch%qmean_psi_closed    (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_psi_closed    (t,ico)  &
  6501)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_psi_closed      (ico)  &
  6502)                                                      * ndaysi
  6503)                   cpatch%qmean_water_supply  (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_water_supply  (t,ico)  &
  6504)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_water_supply    (ico)  &
  6505)                                                      * ndaysi
  6506)                   
  6507)                   cpatch%qmean_par_level_beam(t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_par_level_beam(t,ico) &
  6508)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_par_level_beam(ico)    &
  6509)                                                      * ndaysi
  6510) 
  6511)                   cpatch%qmean_par_level_diffd(t,ico)= cpatch%qmean_par_level_diffd(t,ico) &
  6512)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_par_level_diffd(ico)    &
  6513)                                                      * ndaysi
  6514) 
  6515)                   cpatch%qmean_par_level_diffu(t,ico)= cpatch%qmean_par_level_diffu(t,ico) &
  6516)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_par_level_diffu(ico)    &
  6517)                                                      * ndaysi
  6518) 
  6519)                   cpatch%qmean_light_level   (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_light_level   (t,ico)  &
  6520)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_light_level     (ico)  &
  6521)                                                      * ndaysi
  6522) 
  6523)                   cpatch%qmean_light_level_beam(t,ico) =                                   &
  6524)                                                       cpatch%qmean_light_level_beam(t,ico) &
  6525)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_light_level_beam  (ico) &
  6526)                                                     * ndaysi
  6527)                   cpatch%qmean_light_level_diff(t,ico) =                                   &
  6528)                                                       cpatch%qmean_light_level_diff(t,ico) &
  6529)                                                     + cpatch%fmean_light_level_diff  (ico) &
  6530)                                                     * ndaysi
  6531)                   cpatch%qmean_par_l         (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_par_l         (t,ico)  &
  6532)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_par_l           (ico)  &
  6533)                                                      * ndaysi
  6534)                   cpatch%qmean_par_l_beam    (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_par_l_beam    (t,ico)  &
  6535)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_par_l_beam      (ico)  &
  6536)                                                      * ndaysi
  6537)                   cpatch%qmean_par_l_diff    (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_par_l_diff    (t,ico)  &
  6538)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_par_l_diff      (ico)  &
  6539)                                                      * ndaysi
  6540)                   cpatch%qmean_rshort_l      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_rshort_l      (t,ico)  &
  6541)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_rshort_l        (ico)  &
  6542)                                                      * ndaysi
  6543)                   cpatch%qmean_rlong_l       (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_rlong_l       (t,ico)  &
  6544)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_rlong_l         (ico)  &
  6545)                                                      * ndaysi
  6546)                   cpatch%qmean_sensible_lc   (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_sensible_lc   (t,ico)  &
  6547)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_sensible_lc     (ico)  &
  6548)                                                      * ndaysi
  6549)                   cpatch%qmean_vapor_lc      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_vapor_lc      (t,ico)  &
  6550)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_vapor_lc        (ico)  &
  6551)                                                      * ndaysi
  6552)                   cpatch%qmean_transp        (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_transp        (t,ico)  &
  6553)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_transp          (ico)  &
  6554)                                                      * ndaysi
  6555)                   cpatch%qmean_intercepted_al(t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_intercepted_al(t,ico)  &
  6556)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_intercepted_al  (ico)  &
  6557)                                                      * ndaysi
  6558)                   cpatch%qmean_wshed_lg      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_wshed_lg      (t,ico)  &
  6559)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_wshed_lg        (ico)  &
  6560)                                                      * ndaysi
  6561)                   cpatch%qmean_rshort_w      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_rshort_w      (t,ico)  &
  6562)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_rshort_w        (ico)  &
  6563)                                                      * ndaysi
  6564)                   cpatch%qmean_rlong_w       (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_rlong_w       (t,ico)  &
  6565)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_rlong_w         (ico)  &
  6566)                                                      * ndaysi
  6567)                   cpatch%qmean_rad_profile (:,t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_rad_profile (:,t,ico)  &
  6568)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_rad_profile   (:,ico)  &
  6569)                                                      * ndaysi
  6570)                   cpatch%qmean_sensible_wc   (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_sensible_wc   (t,ico)  &
  6571)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_sensible_wc     (ico)  &
  6572)                                                      * ndaysi
  6573)                   cpatch%qmean_vapor_wc      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_vapor_wc      (t,ico)  &
  6574)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_vapor_wc        (ico)  &
  6575)                                                      * ndaysi
  6576)                   cpatch%qmean_intercepted_aw(t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_intercepted_aw(t,ico)  &
  6577)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_intercepted_aw  (ico)  &
  6578)                                                      * ndaysi
  6579)                   cpatch%qmean_wshed_wg      (t,ico) = cpatch%qmean_wshed_wg      (t,ico)  &
  6580)                                                      + cpatch%fmean_wshed_wg        (ico)  &
  6581)                                                      * ndaysi
  6582)                   !------ Mean sum of squares. --------------------------------------------!
  6583)                   cpatch%qmsqu_gpp        (t,ico) = cpatch%qmsqu_gpp              (t,ico)  &
  6584)                                                   + isqu_ftz(cpatch%fmean_gpp       (ico)) &
  6585)                                                   * ndaysi
  6586)                   cpatch%qmsqu_npp        (t,ico) = cpatch%qmsqu_npp              (t,ico)  &
  6587)                                                   + isqu_ftz(cpatch%fmean_npp       (ico)) &
  6588)                                                   * ndaysi
  6589)                   cpatch%qmsqu_plresp     (t,ico) = cpatch%qmsqu_plresp           (t,ico)  &
  6590)                                                   + isqu_ftz(cpatch%fmean_plresp    (ico)) &
  6591)                                                   * ndaysi
  6592)                   cpatch%qmsqu_sensible_lc(t,ico) = cpatch%qmsqu_sensible_lc      (t,ico)  &
  6593)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%fmean_sensible_lc (ico)) &
  6594)                                                 * ndaysi
  6595)                   cpatch%qmsqu_vapor_lc   (t,ico) = cpatch%qmsqu_vapor_lc         (t,ico)  &
  6596)                                                   + isqu_ftz(cpatch%fmean_vapor_lc  (ico)) &
  6597)                                                   * ndaysi
  6598)                   cpatch%qmsqu_transp     (t,ico) = cpatch%qmsqu_transp           (t,ico)  &
  6599)                                                   + isqu_ftz(cpatch%fmean_transp    (ico)) &
  6600)                                                   * ndaysi
  6601)                   cpatch%qmsqu_sensible_wc(t,ico) = cpatch%qmsqu_sensible_wc      (t,ico)  &
  6602)                                                 + isqu_ftz(cpatch%fmean_sensible_wc (ico)) &
  6603)                                                 * ndaysi
  6604)                   cpatch%qmsqu_vapor_wc   (t,ico) = cpatch%qmsqu_vapor_wc         (t,ico)  &
  6605)                                                   + isqu_ftz(cpatch%fmean_vapor_wc  (ico)) &
  6606)                                                   * ndaysi
  6607)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6608)                end do cohortloop
  6609)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6610)             end do patchloop
  6611)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6612)          end do siteloop
  6613)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6614)       end do polyloop
  6615)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6616)       return
  6617)    end subroutine integrate_ed_qmean_vars
  6618)    !=======================================================================================!
  6619)    !=======================================================================================!
  6620) 
  6621) 
  6622) 
  6623) 
  6624) 
  6625) 
  6626)    !=======================================================================================!
  6627)    !=======================================================================================!
  6628)    !    This subroutine normalises the daily mean variables of those variables that could  !
  6629)    ! not be integrated directly.  These are pretty much just temperature, density, and     !
