  6630)    ! liquid water fraction.                                                                !
  6631)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6632)    subroutine normalize_ed_qmean_vars(cgrid)
  6633)       use ed_state_vars        , only : edtype             & ! structure
  6634)                                       , polygontype        & ! structure
  6635)                                       , sitetype           & ! structure
  6636)                                       , patchtype          ! ! structure
  6637)       use ed_misc_coms         , only : ndcycle            ! ! intent(in)
  6638)       use therm_lib            , only : press2exner        & ! function
  6639)                                       , extheta2temp       & ! function
  6640)                                       , uextcm2tl          & ! subroutine
  6641)                                       , uint2tl            & ! subroutine
  6642)                                       , idealdenssh        ! ! function
  6643)       use soil_coms            , only : tiny_sfcwater_mass & ! intent(in)
  6644)                                       , soil               ! ! intent(in)
  6645)       use consts_coms          , only : t00                & ! intent(in)
  6646)                                       , wdns               ! ! intent(in)
  6647)       use grid_coms            , only : nzg                ! ! intent(in)
  6648)       implicit none
  6649)       !----- Argument ---------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6650)       type(edtype)                     , target  :: cgrid
  6651)       !----- Local variables --------------------------------------------------------------!
  6652)       type(polygontype)                , pointer :: cpoly
  6653)       type(sitetype)                   , pointer :: csite
  6654)       type(patchtype)                  , pointer :: cpatch
  6655)       real             , dimension(nzg)          :: cgrid_qmean_soil_hcap
  6656)       integer                                    :: ipy
  6657)       integer                                    :: isi
  6658)       integer                                    :: ipa
  6659)       integer                                    :: ico
  6660)       integer                                    :: nsoil
  6661)       integer                                    :: k
  6662)       integer                                    :: t
  6663)       real                                       :: can_exner
  6664)       real                                       :: atm_exner
  6665)       real                                       :: site_area_i
  6666)       real                                       :: poly_area_i
  6667)       real                                       :: site_wgt
  6668)       real                                       :: patch_wgt
  6669)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6670) 
  6671) 
  6672) 
  6673)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6674)       !      Use the variables that have been already aggregated.                          !
  6675)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6676)       polyloop: do ipy=1,cgrid%npolygons
  6677)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  6678) 
  6679) 
  6680)          !----- Inverse of this polygon area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
  6681)          poly_area_i = 1./sum(cpoly%area)
  6682)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6683) 
  6684)          !----- Re-set some support variables. --------------------------------------------!
  6685)          cgrid_qmean_soil_hcap(:) = 0.0
  6686)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6687) 
  6688) 
  6689) 
  6690)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6691)          !      Site loop.                                                                 !
  6692)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6693)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  6694)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  6695) 
  6696)             !----- Inverse of this site area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
  6697)             site_area_i = 1./sum(csite%area)
  6698)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6699) 
  6700) 
  6701)             !----- Site weight. -----------------------------------------------------------!
  6702)             site_wgt = cpoly%area(isi) * poly_area_i
  6703)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6704) 
  6705) 
  6706) 
  6707)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6708)             !      Find the derived properties for the air above canopy.                   !
  6709)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6710)             do t=1,ndcycle
  6711)                atm_exner                   = press2exner ( cpoly%qmean_atm_prss  (t,isi) )
  6712)                cpoly%qmean_atm_temp(t,isi) = extheta2temp( atm_exner                       &
  6713)                                                          , cpoly%qmean_atm_theta (t,isi) )
  6714)                cpoly%qmean_atm_rhos(t,isi) = idealdenssh ( cpoly%qmean_atm_prss  (t,isi)   &
  6715)                                                          , cpoly%qmean_atm_temp  (t,isi)   &
  6716)                                                          , cpoly%qmean_atm_shv   (t,isi) )
  6717)             end do
  6718)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6719) 
  6720) 
  6721) 
  6722)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6723)             !      Patch loop.                                                             !
  6724)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6725)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  6726)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  6727) 
  6728) 
  6729)                !----- Site weight. --------------------------------------------------------!
  6730)                patch_wgt = csite%area(ipa) * site_area_i * site_wgt
  6731)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6732) 
  6733) 
  6734) 
  6735) 
  6736)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6737)                !     Soil matric potential, temperature, and liquid water.                 !
  6738)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6739)                do k=1,nzg
  6740)                   nsoil = cpoly%ntext_soil(k,isi)
  6741) 
  6742)                   !----- Heat capacity stays outside the time loop. -----------------------!
  6743)                   cgrid_qmean_soil_hcap(k) = cgrid_qmean_soil_hcap(k)                      &
  6744)                                            + soil(nsoil)%slcpd * patch_wgt
  6745)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6746) 
  6747) 
  6748) 
  6749)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6750)                   !     Find the soil properties, and integrate polygon-level soil matric  !
  6751)                   ! potential.                                                             !
  6752)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6753)                   do t=1,ndcycle
  6754)                      call uextcm2tl( csite%qmean_soil_energy(k,t,ipa)                      &
  6755)                                    , csite%qmean_soil_water (k,t,ipa) * wdns               &
  6756)                                    , soil(nsoil)%slcpd                                     &
  6757)                                    , csite%qmean_soil_temp  (k,t,ipa)                      &
  6758)                                    , csite%qmean_soil_fliq  (k,t,ipa))
  6759)                   end do
  6760)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6761)                end do
  6762)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6763) 
  6764) 
  6765) 
  6766) 
  6767)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6768)                !   If the patch had some temporary snow/pounding layer, convert the mean   !
  6769)                ! energy to J/kg, then find the mean temperature and liquid fraction.       !
  6770)                ! Otherwise, set them to either zero or default values.                     !
  6771)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6772)                do t=1,ndcycle
  6773)                   if (csite%qmean_sfcw_mass(t,ipa) > tiny_sfcwater_mass) then
  6774)                      csite%qmean_sfcw_energy(t,ipa) = csite%qmean_sfcw_energy(t,ipa)       &
  6775)                                                     / csite%qmean_sfcw_mass  (t,ipa)
  6776)                      call uint2tl( csite%qmean_sfcw_energy(t,ipa)                          &
  6777)                                  , csite%qmean_sfcw_temp  (t,ipa)                          &
  6778)                                  , csite%qmean_sfcw_fliq  (t,ipa))
  6779)                   else
  6780)                      csite%qmean_sfcw_mass  (t,ipa)  = 0.
  6781)                      csite%qmean_sfcw_depth (t,ipa)  = 0.
  6782)                      csite%qmean_sfcw_energy(t,ipa)  = 0.
  6783)                      csite%qmean_sfcw_temp  (t,ipa)  = csite%qmean_soil_temp(nzg,t,ipa)
  6784)                      csite%qmean_sfcw_fliq  (t,ipa)  = csite%qmean_soil_fliq(nzg,t,ipa)
  6785)                   end if
  6786)                end do
  6787)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6788) 
  6789) 
  6790) 
  6791)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6792)                !      Cohort loop.                                                         !
  6793)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6794)                cohortloop: do ico=1,cpatch%ncohorts
  6795) 
  6796) 
  6797) 
  6798)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6799)                   !     Find the vegetation temperature and liquid fraction.               !
  6800)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6801)                   do t=1,ndcycle
  6802)                      !----- Leaf. ---------------------------------------------------------!
  6803)                      if (cpatch%qmean_leaf_hcap(t,ico) > 0.) then
  6804)                         call uextcm2tl( cpatch%qmean_leaf_energy(t,ico)                    &
  6805)                                       , cpatch%qmean_leaf_water (t,ico)                    &
  6806)                                       , cpatch%qmean_leaf_hcap  (t,ico)                    &
  6807)                                       , cpatch%qmean_leaf_temp  (t,ico)                    &
  6808)                                       , cpatch%qmean_leaf_fliq  (t,ico) )
  6809)                      else
  6810)                         cpatch%qmean_leaf_vpdef(t,ico) = csite%qmean_can_vpdef(t,ipa)
  6811)                         cpatch%qmean_leaf_temp (t,ico) = csite%qmean_can_temp (t,ipa)
  6812)                         if (csite%qmean_can_temp(t,ipa) > t00) then
  6813)                            cpatch%qmean_leaf_fliq(t,ico) = 1.0
  6814)                         elseif (csite%qmean_can_temp(t,ipa) == t00) then
  6815)                            cpatch%qmean_leaf_fliq(t,ico) = 0.5
  6816)                         else
  6817)                            cpatch%qmean_leaf_fliq(t,ico) = 0.0
  6818)                         end if
  6819)                      end if
  6820)                      !----- Wood. ---------------------------------------------------------!
  6821)                      if (cpatch%qmean_wood_hcap(t,ico) > 0.) then
  6822)                         call uextcm2tl( cpatch%qmean_wood_energy(t,ico)                    &
  6823)                                       , cpatch%qmean_wood_water (t,ico)                    &
  6824)                                       , cpatch%qmean_wood_hcap  (t,ico)                    &
  6825)                                       , cpatch%qmean_wood_temp  (t,ico)                    &
  6826)                                       , cpatch%qmean_wood_fliq  (t,ico) )
  6827)                      else
  6828)                         cpatch%qmean_wood_temp(t,ico) = csite%qmean_can_temp(t,ipa)
  6829)                         if (csite%qmean_can_temp(t,ipa) > t00) then
  6830)                            cpatch%qmean_wood_fliq(t,ico) = 1.0
  6831)                         elseif (csite%qmean_can_temp(t,ipa) == t00) then
  6832)                            cpatch%qmean_wood_fliq(t,ico) = 0.5
  6833)                         else
  6834)                            cpatch%qmean_wood_fliq(t,ico) = 0.0
  6835)                         end if
  6836)                         !------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6837)                      end if
  6838)                      !---------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6839)                   end do
  6840)                   !------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6841)                end do cohortloop
  6842)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6843)             end do patchloop
  6844)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6845)          end do siteloop
  6846)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6847) 
  6848) 
  6849) 
  6850) 
  6851) 
  6852) 
  6853)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6854)          !      Find the derived properties for the air above canopy.                      !
  6855)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6856)          do t=1,ndcycle
  6857)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6858)             !      Find the derived properties for the air above canopy.                   !
  6859)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6860)             atm_exner                   = press2exner ( cgrid%qmean_atm_prss     (t,ipy) )
  6861)             cgrid%qmean_atm_temp(t,ipy) = extheta2temp( atm_exner                          &
  6862)                                                       , cgrid%qmean_atm_theta    (t,ipy) )
  6863)             cgrid%qmean_atm_rhos(t,ipy) = idealdenssh ( cgrid%qmean_atm_prss     (t,ipy)   &
  6864)                                                       , cgrid%qmean_atm_temp     (t,ipy)   &
  6865)                                                       , cgrid%qmean_atm_shv      (t,ipy) )
  6866)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6867) 
  6868) 
  6869) 
  6870) 
  6871)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6872)             !      Find the derived properties for the canopy air space.                   !
  6873)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6874)             can_exner                   = press2exner ( cgrid%qmean_can_prss (t,ipy) )
  6875)             cgrid%qmean_can_temp(t,ipy) = extheta2temp( can_exner                          &
  6876)                                                       , cgrid%qmean_can_theta(t,ipy) )
  6877)             cgrid%qmean_can_rhos(t,ipy) = idealdenssh ( cgrid%qmean_can_prss (t,ipy)       &
  6878)                                                       , cgrid%qmean_can_temp (t,ipy)       &
  6879)                                                       , cgrid%qmean_can_shv  (t,ipy) )
  6880)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6881) 
  6882) 
  6883) 
  6884) 
  6885)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6886)             !   If the patch had some temporary snow/pounding layer, convert the mean      !
  6887)             ! energy to J/kg, then find the mean temperature and liquid fraction.  Other-  !
  6888)             ! wise, set them to either zero or default values.                             !
  6889)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6890)             if (cgrid%qmean_sfcw_mass(t,ipy) > tiny_sfcwater_mass) then
  6891)                cgrid%qmean_sfcw_energy(t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_sfcw_energy(t,ipy)             &
  6892)                                               / cgrid%qmean_sfcw_mass  (t,ipy)
  6893)                call uint2tl(cgrid%qmean_sfcw_energy(t,ipy),cgrid%qmean_sfcw_temp(t,ipy)    &
  6894)                            ,cgrid%qmean_sfcw_fliq(t,ipy))
  6895)             else
  6896)                cgrid%qmean_sfcw_mass  (t,ipy)  = 0.
  6897)                cgrid%qmean_sfcw_depth (t,ipy)  = 0.
  6898)                cgrid%qmean_sfcw_energy(t,ipy)  = 0.
  6899)                cgrid%qmean_sfcw_temp  (t,ipy)  = cgrid%qmean_soil_temp(nzg,t,ipy)
  6900)                cgrid%qmean_sfcw_fliq  (t,ipy)  = cgrid%qmean_soil_fliq(nzg,t,ipy)
  6901)             end if
  6902)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6903) 
  6904) 
  6905) 
  6906) 
  6907)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6908)             !     Find the temperature and the fraction of liquid water.                   !
  6909)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6910)             do k=1,nzg
  6911)                call uextcm2tl( cgrid%qmean_soil_energy(k,t,ipy)                            &
  6912)                              , cgrid%qmean_soil_water (k,t,ipy) * wdns                     &
  6913)                              , cgrid_qmean_soil_hcap  (k)                                  &
  6914)                              , cgrid%qmean_soil_temp  (k,t,ipy)                            &
  6915)                              , cgrid%qmean_soil_fliq  (k,t,ipy) )
  6916)             end do
  6917)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6918) 
  6919) 
  6920) 
  6921)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6922)             !     Find the vegetation temperature and liquid fraction.                     !
  6923)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6924)             !----- Leaf. ------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6925)             if (cgrid%qmean_leaf_hcap(t,ipy) > 0.) then
  6926)                call uextcm2tl( cgrid%qmean_leaf_energy(t,ipy)                              &
  6927)                              , cgrid%qmean_leaf_water (t,ipy)                              &
  6928)                              , cgrid%qmean_leaf_hcap  (t,ipy)                              &
  6929)                              , cgrid%qmean_leaf_temp  (t,ipy)                              &
  6930)                              , cgrid%qmean_leaf_fliq  (t,ipy) )
  6931)             else
  6932)                cgrid%qmean_leaf_temp (t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_temp (t,ipy)
  6933)                if (cgrid%qmean_can_temp(t,ipy) > t00) then
  6934)                   cgrid%qmean_leaf_fliq(t,ipy) = 1.0
  6935)                elseif (cgrid%qmean_can_temp(t,ipy) == t00) then
  6936)                   cgrid%qmean_leaf_fliq(t,ipy) = 0.5
  6937)                else
  6938)                   cgrid%qmean_leaf_fliq(t,ipy) = 0.0
  6939)                end if
  6940)             end if
  6941)             !----- Wood. ------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6942)             if (cgrid%qmean_wood_hcap(t,ipy) > 0.) then
  6943)                call uextcm2tl( cgrid%qmean_wood_energy(t,ipy)                              &
  6944)                              , cgrid%qmean_wood_water (t,ipy)                              &
  6945)                              , cgrid%qmean_wood_hcap  (t,ipy)                              &
  6946)                              , cgrid%qmean_wood_temp  (t,ipy)                              &
  6947)                              , cgrid%qmean_wood_fliq  (t,ipy) )
  6948)             else
  6949)                cgrid%qmean_wood_temp(t,ipy) = cgrid%qmean_can_temp(t,ipy)
  6950)                if (cgrid%qmean_can_temp(t,ipy) > t00) then
  6951)                   cgrid%qmean_wood_fliq(t,ipy) = 1.0
  6952)                elseif (cgrid%qmean_can_temp(t,ipy) == t00) then
  6953)                   cgrid%qmean_wood_fliq(t,ipy) = 0.5
  6954)                else
  6955)                   cgrid%qmean_wood_fliq(t,ipy) = 0.0
  6956)                end if
  6957)             end if
  6958)          end do
  6959)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6960)       end do polyloop
  6961)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6962)       return
  6963)    end subroutine normalize_ed_qmean_vars
  6964)    !=======================================================================================!
  6965)    !=======================================================================================!
  6966) 
  6967) 
  6968) 
  6969) 
  6970) 
  6971) 
  6972)    !=======================================================================================!
  6973)    !=======================================================================================!
  6974)    !    This subroutine resets the mean diel once the "Q" file has been written.           !
  6975)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6976)    subroutine zero_ed_qmean_vars(cgrid)
  6977)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype        & ! structure
  6978)                               , polygontype   & ! structure
  6979)                               , sitetype      & ! structure
  6980)                               , patchtype     ! ! structure
  6981)       implicit none
  6982)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6983)       type(edtype)     , target  :: cgrid
  6984)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  6985)       type(polygontype), pointer :: cpoly
  6986)       type(sitetype)   , pointer :: csite
  6987)       type(patchtype)  , pointer :: cpatch
  6988)       integer                    :: ipy
  6989)       integer                    :: isi
  6990)       integer                    :: ipa
  6991)       integer                    :: ico
  6992)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6993) 
  6994) 
  6995)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6996)       !       Loop over polygons.                                                          !
  6997)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  6998)       polyloop: do ipy = 1,cgrid%npolygons
  6999)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  7000) 
  7001)          cgrid%qmean_gpp                (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7002)          cgrid%qmean_npp                (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7003)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_resp          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7004)          cgrid%qmean_root_resp          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7005)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_growth_resp   (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7006)          cgrid%qmean_root_growth_resp   (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7007)          cgrid%qmean_sapa_growth_resp   (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7008)          cgrid%qmean_sapb_growth_resp   (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7009)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_storage_resp  (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7010)          cgrid%qmean_root_storage_resp  (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7011)          cgrid%qmean_sapa_storage_resp  (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7012)          cgrid%qmean_sapb_storage_resp  (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7013)          cgrid%qmean_plresp             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7014)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_energy        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7015)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_water         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7016)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_hcap          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7017)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_vpdef         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7018)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_temp          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7019)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_fliq          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7020)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_gsw           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7021)          cgrid%qmean_leaf_gbw           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7022)          cgrid%qmean_wood_energy        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7023)          cgrid%qmean_wood_water         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7024)          cgrid%qmean_wood_hcap          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7025)          cgrid%qmean_wood_temp          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7026)          cgrid%qmean_wood_fliq          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7027)          cgrid%qmean_wood_gbw           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7028)          cgrid%qmean_fs_open            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7029)          cgrid%qmean_fsw                (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7030)          cgrid%qmean_fsn                (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7031)          cgrid%qmean_a_open             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7032)          cgrid%qmean_a_closed           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7033)          cgrid%qmean_a_net              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7034)          cgrid%qmean_a_light            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7035)          cgrid%qmean_a_rubp             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7036)          cgrid%qmean_a_co2              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7037)          cgrid%qmean_psi_open           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7038)          cgrid%qmean_psi_closed         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7039)          cgrid%qmean_water_supply       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7040)          cgrid%qmean_par_l              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7041)          cgrid%qmean_par_l_beam         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7042)          cgrid%qmean_par_l_diff         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7043)          cgrid%qmean_rshort_l           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7044)          cgrid%qmean_rlong_l            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7045)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_lc        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7046)          cgrid%qmean_vapor_lc           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7047)          cgrid%qmean_transp             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7048)          cgrid%qmean_intercepted_al     (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7049)          cgrid%qmean_wshed_lg           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7050)          cgrid%qmean_rshort_w           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7051)          cgrid%qmean_rlong_w            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7052)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_wc        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7053)          cgrid%qmean_vapor_wc           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7054)          cgrid%qmean_intercepted_aw     (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7055)          cgrid%qmean_wshed_wg           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7056)          cgrid%qmean_rh                 (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7057)          cgrid%qmean_cwd_rh             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7058)          cgrid%qmean_nep                (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7059)          cgrid%qmean_rk4step            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7060)          cgrid%qmean_available_water    (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7061)          cgrid%qmean_can_theiv          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7062)          cgrid%qmean_can_theta          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7063)          cgrid%qmean_can_vpdef          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7064)          cgrid%qmean_can_temp           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7065)          cgrid%qmean_can_shv            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7066)          cgrid%qmean_can_co2            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7067)          cgrid%qmean_can_rhos           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7068)          cgrid%qmean_can_prss           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7069)          cgrid%qmean_gnd_temp           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7070)          cgrid%qmean_gnd_shv            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7071)          cgrid%qmean_can_ggnd           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7072)          cgrid%qmean_sfcw_depth         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7073)          cgrid%qmean_sfcw_energy        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7074)          cgrid%qmean_sfcw_mass          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7075)          cgrid%qmean_sfcw_temp          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7076)          cgrid%qmean_sfcw_fliq          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7077)          cgrid%qmean_soil_energy      (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  7078)          cgrid%qmean_soil_mstpot      (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  7079)          cgrid%qmean_soil_water       (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  7080)          cgrid%qmean_soil_temp        (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  7081)          cgrid%qmean_soil_fliq        (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  7082)          cgrid%qmean_rshort_gnd         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7083)          cgrid%qmean_par_gnd            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7084)          cgrid%qmean_rlong_gnd          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7085)          cgrid%qmean_rlongup            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7086)          cgrid%qmean_parup              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7087)          cgrid%qmean_nirup              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7088)          cgrid%qmean_rshortup           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7089)          cgrid%qmean_rnet               (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7090)          cgrid%qmean_albedo             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7091)          cgrid%qmean_albedo_par         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7092)          cgrid%qmean_albedo_nir         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7093)          cgrid%qmean_rlong_albedo       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7094)          cgrid%qmean_ustar              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7095)          cgrid%qmean_tstar              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7096)          cgrid%qmean_qstar              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7097)          cgrid%qmean_cstar              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7098)          cgrid%qmean_carbon_ac          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7099)          cgrid%qmean_carbon_st          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7100)          cgrid%qmean_vapor_gc           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7101)          cgrid%qmean_vapor_ac           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7102)          cgrid%qmean_smoist_gg        (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  7103)          cgrid%qmean_throughfall        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7104)          cgrid%qmean_transloss        (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  7105)          cgrid%qmean_runoff             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7106)          cgrid%qmean_drainage           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7107)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_gc        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7108)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_ac        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7109)          cgrid%qmean_sensible_gg      (:,:,ipy) = 0.0
  7110)          cgrid%qmean_qthroughfall       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7111)          cgrid%qmean_qrunoff            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7112)          cgrid%qmean_qdrainage          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7113)          cgrid%qmean_atm_theiv          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7114)          cgrid%qmean_atm_theta          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7115)          cgrid%qmean_atm_temp           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7116)          cgrid%qmean_atm_vpdef          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7117)          cgrid%qmean_atm_shv            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7118)          cgrid%qmean_atm_rshort         (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7119)          cgrid%qmean_atm_rshort_diff    (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7120)          cgrid%qmean_atm_par            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7121)          cgrid%qmean_atm_par_diff       (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7122)          cgrid%qmean_atm_rlong          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7123)          cgrid%qmean_atm_vels           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7124)          cgrid%qmean_atm_rhos           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7125)          cgrid%qmean_atm_prss           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7126)          cgrid%qmean_atm_co2            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7127)          cgrid%qmean_pcpg               (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7128)          cgrid%qmean_qpcpg              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7129)          cgrid%qmean_dpcpg              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7130)          cgrid%qmsqu_gpp                (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7131)          cgrid%qmsqu_npp                (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7132)          cgrid%qmsqu_plresp             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7133)          cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_lc        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7134)          cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_lc           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7135)          cgrid%qmsqu_transp             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7136)          cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_wc        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7137)          cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_wc           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7138)          cgrid%qmsqu_rh                 (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7139)          cgrid%qmsqu_cwd_rh             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7140)          cgrid%qmsqu_nep                (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7141)          cgrid%qmsqu_rlongup            (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7142)          cgrid%qmsqu_parup              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7143)          cgrid%qmsqu_nirup              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7144)          cgrid%qmsqu_rshortup           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7145)          cgrid%qmsqu_rnet               (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7146)          cgrid%qmsqu_albedo             (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7147)          cgrid%qmsqu_ustar              (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7148)          cgrid%qmsqu_carbon_ac          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7149)          cgrid%qmsqu_carbon_st          (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7150)          cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_gc           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7151)          cgrid%qmsqu_vapor_ac           (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7152)          cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_gc        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7153)          cgrid%qmsqu_sensible_ac        (:,ipy) = 0.0
  7154) 
  7155) 
  7156)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7157)          !       Loop over sites.                                                          !
  7158)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7159)          siteloop: do isi=1,cpoly%nsites
  7160)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  7161) 
  7162)             cpoly%qmean_atm_theiv      (:,isi) = 0.0
  7163)             cpoly%qmean_atm_theta      (:,isi) = 0.0
  7164)             cpoly%qmean_atm_temp       (:,isi) = 0.0
  7165)             cpoly%qmean_atm_vpdef      (:,isi) = 0.0
  7166)             cpoly%qmean_atm_shv        (:,isi) = 0.0
  7167)             cpoly%qmean_atm_rshort     (:,isi) = 0.0
  7168)             cpoly%qmean_atm_rshort_diff(:,isi) = 0.0
  7169)             cpoly%qmean_atm_par        (:,isi) = 0.0
  7170)             cpoly%qmean_atm_par_diff   (:,isi) = 0.0
  7171)             cpoly%qmean_atm_rlong      (:,isi) = 0.0
  7172)             cpoly%qmean_atm_vels       (:,isi) = 0.0
  7173)             cpoly%qmean_atm_rhos       (:,isi) = 0.0
  7174)             cpoly%qmean_atm_prss       (:,isi) = 0.0
  7175)             cpoly%qmean_atm_co2        (:,isi) = 0.0
  7176)             cpoly%qmean_pcpg           (:,isi) = 0.0
  7177)             cpoly%qmean_qpcpg          (:,isi) = 0.0
  7178)             cpoly%qmean_dpcpg          (:,isi) = 0.0
  7179) 
  7180)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7181)             !       Loop over sites.                                                       !
  7182)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7183)             patchloop: do ipa=1,csite%npatches
  7184)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  7185)                csite%qmean_rh                     (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7186)                csite%qmean_cwd_rh                 (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7187)                csite%qmean_nep                    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7188)                csite%qmean_rk4step                (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7189)                csite%qmean_available_water        (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7190)                csite%qmean_can_theiv              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7191)                csite%qmean_can_theta              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7192)                csite%qmean_can_vpdef              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7193)                csite%qmean_can_temp               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7194)                csite%qmean_can_shv                (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7195)                csite%qmean_can_co2                (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7196)                csite%qmean_can_rhos               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7197)                csite%qmean_can_prss               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7198)                csite%qmean_gnd_temp               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7199)                csite%qmean_gnd_shv                (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7200)                csite%qmean_can_ggnd               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7201)                csite%qmean_sfcw_depth             (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7202)                csite%qmean_sfcw_energy            (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7203)                csite%qmean_sfcw_mass              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7204)                csite%qmean_sfcw_temp              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7205)                csite%qmean_sfcw_fliq              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7206)                csite%qmean_soil_energy          (:,:,ipa) = 0.0
  7207)                csite%qmean_soil_mstpot          (:,:,ipa) = 0.0
  7208)                csite%qmean_soil_water           (:,:,ipa) = 0.0
  7209)                csite%qmean_soil_temp            (:,:,ipa) = 0.0
  7210)                csite%qmean_soil_fliq            (:,:,ipa) = 0.0
  7211)                csite%qmean_rshort_gnd             (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7212)                csite%qmean_par_gnd                (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7213)                csite%qmean_rlong_gnd              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7214)                csite%qmean_rlongup                (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7215)                csite%qmean_parup                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7216)                csite%qmean_nirup                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7217)                csite%qmean_rshortup               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7218)                csite%qmean_rnet                   (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7219)                csite%qmean_albedo                 (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7220)                csite%qmean_albedo_par             (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7221)                csite%qmean_albedo_nir             (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7222)                csite%qmean_rlong_albedo           (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7223)                csite%qmean_ustar                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7224)                csite%qmean_tstar                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7225)                csite%qmean_qstar                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7226)                csite%qmean_cstar                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7227)                csite%qmean_carbon_ac              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7228)                csite%qmean_carbon_st              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7229)                csite%qmean_vapor_gc               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7230)                csite%qmean_vapor_ac               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7231)                csite%qmean_smoist_gg            (:,:,ipa) = 0.0
  7232)                csite%qmean_throughfall            (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7233)                csite%qmean_transloss            (:,:,ipa) = 0.0
  7234)                csite%qmean_runoff                 (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7235)                csite%qmean_drainage               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7236)                csite%qmean_sensible_gc            (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7237)                csite%qmean_sensible_ac            (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7238)                csite%qmean_sensible_gg          (:,:,ipa) = 0.0
  7239)                csite%qmean_qthroughfall           (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7240)                csite%qmean_qrunoff                (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7241)                csite%qmean_qdrainage              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7242)                csite%qmsqu_rh                     (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7243)                csite%qmsqu_cwd_rh                 (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7244)                csite%qmsqu_nep                    (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7245)                csite%qmsqu_rlongup                (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7246)                csite%qmsqu_parup                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7247)                csite%qmsqu_nirup                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7248)                csite%qmsqu_rshortup               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7249)                csite%qmsqu_rnet                   (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7250)                csite%qmsqu_albedo                 (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7251)                csite%qmsqu_ustar                  (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7252)                csite%qmsqu_carbon_ac              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7253)                csite%qmsqu_carbon_st              (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7254)                csite%qmsqu_vapor_gc               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7255)                csite%qmsqu_vapor_ac               (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7256)                csite%qmsqu_sensible_gc            (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7257)                csite%qmsqu_sensible_ac            (:,ipa) = 0.0
  7258) 
  7259) 
  7260) 
  7261)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7262)                !       Loop over cohorts.                                                  !
  7263)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7264)                cohortloop: do ico=1, cpatch%ncohorts
  7265)                   cpatch%qmean_gpp                 (:,ico) = 0.0
  7266)                   cpatch%qmean_npp                 (:,ico) = 0.0
  7267)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_resp           (:,ico) = 0.0
  7268)                   cpatch%qmean_root_resp           (:,ico) = 0.0
  7269)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_growth_resp    (:,ico) = 0.0
  7270)                   cpatch%qmean_root_growth_resp    (:,ico) = 0.0
  7271)                   cpatch%qmean_sapa_growth_resp    (:,ico) = 0.0
  7272)                   cpatch%qmean_sapb_growth_resp    (:,ico) = 0.0
  7273)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_storage_resp   (:,ico) = 0.0
  7274)                   cpatch%qmean_root_storage_resp   (:,ico) = 0.0
  7275)                   cpatch%qmean_sapa_storage_resp   (:,ico) = 0.0
  7276)                   cpatch%qmean_sapb_storage_resp   (:,ico) = 0.0
  7277)                   cpatch%qmean_plresp              (:,ico) = 0.0
  7278)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_energy         (:,ico) = 0.0
  7279)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_water          (:,ico) = 0.0
  7280)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_hcap           (:,ico) = 0.0
  7281)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_vpdef          (:,ico) = 0.0
  7282)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_temp           (:,ico) = 0.0
  7283)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_fliq           (:,ico) = 0.0
  7284)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_gsw            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7285)                   cpatch%qmean_leaf_gbw            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7286)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_energy         (:,ico) = 0.0
  7287)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_water          (:,ico) = 0.0
  7288)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_hcap           (:,ico) = 0.0
  7289)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_temp           (:,ico) = 0.0
  7290)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_fliq           (:,ico) = 0.0
  7291)                   cpatch%qmean_wood_gbw            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7292)                   cpatch%qmean_fs_open             (:,ico) = 0.0
  7293)                   cpatch%qmean_fsw                 (:,ico) = 0.0
  7294)                   cpatch%qmean_fsn                 (:,ico) = 0.0
  7295)                   cpatch%qmean_a_open              (:,ico) = 0.0
  7296)                   cpatch%qmean_a_closed            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7297)                   cpatch%qmean_a_net               (:,ico) = 0.0
  7298)                   cpatch%qmean_a_light             (:,ico) = 0.0
  7299)                   cpatch%qmean_a_rubp              (:,ico) = 0.0
  7300)                   cpatch%qmean_a_co2               (:,ico) = 0.0
  7301)                   cpatch%qmean_psi_open            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7302)                   cpatch%qmean_psi_closed          (:,ico) = 0.0
  7303)                   cpatch%qmean_water_supply        (:,ico) = 0.0
  7304) 
  7305)                   cpatch%qmean_par_level_beam      (:,ico) = 0.0
  7306)                   cpatch%qmean_par_level_diffu     (:,ico) = 0.0
  7307)                   cpatch%qmean_par_level_diffd     (:,ico) = 0.0
  7308) 
  7309)                   cpatch%qmean_light_level         (:,ico) = 0.0
  7310)                   cpatch%qmean_light_level_beam    (:,ico) = 0.0
  7311)                   cpatch%qmean_light_level_diff    (:,ico) = 0.0
  7312)                   cpatch%qmean_par_l               (:,ico) = 0.0
  7313)                   cpatch%qmean_par_l_beam          (:,ico) = 0.0
  7314)                   cpatch%qmean_par_l_diff          (:,ico) = 0.0
  7315)                   cpatch%qmean_rshort_l            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7316)                   cpatch%qmean_rlong_l             (:,ico) = 0.0
  7317)                   cpatch%qmean_sensible_lc         (:,ico) = 0.0
  7318)                   cpatch%qmean_vapor_lc            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7319)                   cpatch%qmean_transp              (:,ico) = 0.0
  7320)                   cpatch%qmean_intercepted_al      (:,ico) = 0.0
  7321)                   cpatch%qmean_wshed_lg            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7322)                   cpatch%qmean_rshort_w            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7323)                   cpatch%qmean_rlong_w             (:,ico) = 0.0
  7324)                   cpatch%qmean_rad_profile       (:,:,ico) = 0.0
  7325)                   cpatch%qmean_sensible_wc         (:,ico) = 0.0
  7326)                   cpatch%qmean_vapor_wc            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7327)                   cpatch%qmean_intercepted_aw      (:,ico) = 0.0
  7328)                   cpatch%qmean_wshed_wg            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7329)                   cpatch%qmsqu_gpp                 (:,ico) = 0.0
  7330)                   cpatch%qmsqu_npp                 (:,ico) = 0.0
  7331)                   cpatch%qmsqu_plresp              (:,ico) = 0.0
  7332)                   cpatch%qmsqu_sensible_lc         (:,ico) = 0.0
  7333)                   cpatch%qmsqu_vapor_lc            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7334)                   cpatch%qmsqu_transp              (:,ico) = 0.0
  7335)                   cpatch%qmsqu_sensible_wc         (:,ico) = 0.0
  7336)                   cpatch%qmsqu_vapor_wc            (:,ico) = 0.0
  7337)                end do cohortloop
  7338)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7339)             end do patchloop
  7340)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7341)          end do siteloop
  7342)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7343)       end do polyloop
  7344)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7345) 
  7346)       return
  7347)    end subroutine zero_ed_qmean_vars
  7348)    !=======================================================================================!
  7349)    !=======================================================================================!
  7350)    !=======================================================================================!
  7351)    !=======================================================================================!
  7352)    !=======================================================================================!
  7353)    !=======================================================================================!
  7354)    !=======================================================================================!
  7355)    !=======================================================================================!
  7356) 
  7357) 
  7358) 
  7359) 
  7360) 
  7361) 
  7362) 
  7363) 
  7364) 
  7365) 
  7366)    !=======================================================================================!
  7367)    !=======================================================================================!
  7368)    !=======================================================================================!
  7369)    !=======================================================================================!
  7370)    !=======================================================================================!
  7371)    !=======================================================================================!
  7372)    !                             |--------------------------------|                        !
  7373)    !                             |** YEARLY AVERAGE SUBROUTINES **|                        !
  7374)    !                             |--------------------------------|                        !
  7375)    !=======================================================================================!
  7376)    !=======================================================================================!
  7377)    !=======================================================================================!
  7378)    !=======================================================================================!
  7379)    !=======================================================================================!
  7380)    !=======================================================================================!
  7381) 
  7382) 
  7383) 
  7384) 
  7385) 
  7386) 
  7387)    !=======================================================================================!
  7388)    !=======================================================================================!
  7389)    !      This sub-routine updates the yearly variables.                                   !
  7390)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7391)    subroutine update_ed_yearly_vars(cgrid)
  7392) 
  7393)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype      & ! structure
  7394)                               , polygontype & ! structure
  7395)                               , sitetype    & ! structure
  7396)                               , patchtype   ! ! structure
  7397)       use ed_max_dims  , only : n_pft       & ! intent(in)
  7398)                               , n_dbh       ! ! intent(in)
  7399)       use consts_coms  , only : pi1         ! ! intent(in)
  7400)      
  7401)       implicit none
  7402)       !------ Arguments. ------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7403)       type(edtype)     , target  :: cgrid
  7404)       !------ Local variables. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  7405)       type(polygontype), pointer :: cpoly
  7406)       type(sitetype)   , pointer :: csite
  7407)       type(patchtype)  , pointer :: cpatch
  7408)       integer                    :: ipy
  7409)       integer                    :: isi
  7410)       integer                    :: ipa
  7411)       integer                    :: ico
  7412)       real                       :: poly_area_i
  7413)       real                       :: site_area_i
  7414)       real                       :: site_wgt
  7415)       real                       :: patch_wgt
  7416)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7417) 
  7418) 
  7419)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7420)       !      All above-ground biomass variables are in kgC/m2 or kgC/m2/yr; and all basal  !
  7421)       ! areas are in cm2/m2 or cm2/m2/yr.                                                  !
  7422)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7423) 
  7424) 
  7425)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7426)       !      Loop over polygons.                                                           !
  7427)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7428)       polyloop: do ipy = 1,cgrid%npolygons
  7429)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  7430) 
  7431) 
  7432)          !----- Re-set the variables. -----------------------------------------------------!
  7433)          cgrid%total_basal_area        (ipy) = 0.0
  7434)          cgrid%total_basal_area_growth (ipy) = 0.0
  7435)          cgrid%total_basal_area_mort   (ipy) = 0.0
  7436)          cgrid%total_basal_area_recruit(ipy) = 0.0
  7437)          cgrid%total_agb               (ipy) = 0.0
  7438)          cgrid%total_agb_growth        (ipy) = 0.0
  7439)          cgrid%total_agb_mort          (ipy) = 0.0
  7440)          cgrid%total_agb_recruit       (ipy) = 0.0
  7441)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7442) 
  7443) 
  7444)          !----- Inverse of this polygon area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
  7445)          poly_area_i = 1./sum(cpoly%area)
  7446)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7447) 
  7448) 
  7449)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7450)          !      Loop over polygons.                                                        !
  7451)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7452)          siteloop: do isi = 1,cpoly%nsites
  7453)             csite => cpoly%site(isi)
  7454) 
  7455)             !----- Inverse of this site area (it should be always 1.) ---------------------!
  7456)             site_area_i=1./sum(csite%area)
  7457)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7458) 
  7459) 
  7460)             !----- Site weight. -----------------------------------------------------------!
  7461)             site_wgt = cpoly%area(isi) * poly_area_i
  7462)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7463) 
  7464) 
  7465) 
  7466) 
  7467)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7468)             !      Do growth, mortality, harvesting.                                       !
  7469)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7470)             cgrid%total_agb              (ipy) = cgrid%total_agb              (ipy)        &
  7471)                                                + sum(cpoly%agb           (:,:,isi))        &
  7472)                                                * site_wgt
  7473)             cgrid%total_basal_area       (ipy) = cgrid%total_basal_area       (ipy)        &
  7474)                                                + sum(cpoly%basal_area    (:,:,isi))        &
  7475)                                                * site_wgt
  7476)             cgrid%total_agb_growth       (ipy) = cgrid%total_agb_growth       (ipy)        &
  7477)                                                + sum(cpoly%agb_growth    (:,:,isi))        &
  7478)                                                * site_wgt
  7479)             cgrid%total_agb_mort         (ipy) = cgrid%total_agb_mort         (ipy)        &
  7480)                                                + sum(cpoly%agb_mort(1:n_pft,1:n_dbh,isi))  &
  7481)                                                * site_wgt
  7482)             cgrid%total_basal_area_growth(ipy) = cgrid%total_basal_area_growth(ipy)        &
  7483)                                        + sum(cpoly%basal_area_growth(1:n_pft,2:n_dbh,isi)) &
  7484)                                        * site_wgt
  7485)             cgrid%total_basal_area_mort  (ipy) = cgrid%total_basal_area_mort  (ipy)        &
  7486)                                        + sum(cpoly%basal_area_mort  (1:n_pft,2:n_dbh,isi)) &
  7487)                                        * site_wgt
  7488)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7489) 
  7490) 
  7491) 
  7492) 
  7493)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7494)             !      Loop over patches and cohorts to get recruitment.                       !
  7495)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7496)             patchloop: do ipa = 1,csite%npatches
  7497)                cpatch => csite%patch(ipa)
  7498) 
  7499) 
  7500)                !----- Site weight. --------------------------------------------------------!
  7501)                patch_wgt = csite%area(ipa) * site_area_i * site_wgt
  7502)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7503) 
  7504) 
  7505)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7506)                !      Loop over patches and cohorts to get recruitment.                    !
  7507)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7508)                cohortloop: do ico = 1,cpatch%ncohorts
  7509) 
  7510)                   if (cpatch%new_recruit_flag(ico) == 1) then
  7511)                      cgrid%total_agb_recruit       (ipy) =                                 &
  7512)                             cgrid%total_agb_recruit      (ipy)                             &
  7513)                           + cpatch%agb                   (ico)                             &
  7514)                           * cpatch%nplant                (ico)                             &
  7515)                           * patch_wgt
  7516)                      cgrid%total_basal_area_recruit(ipy) =                                 &
  7517)                             cgrid%total_basal_area_recruit(ipy)                            &
  7518)                           + cpatch%basarea(ico)                                            &
  7519)                           * cpatch%nplant (ico)                                            &
  7520)                           * patch_wgt
  7521)                      cpatch%new_recruit_flag       (ico) = 0
  7522)                   end if
  7523)                   cpatch%first_census (ico) = 1
  7524)                end do cohortloop
  7525)                !---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7526)             end do patchloop
  7527)             !------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7528)          end do siteloop
  7529)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7530)       end do polyloop
  7531)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7532)       return
  7533)    end subroutine update_ed_yearly_vars
  7534)    !=======================================================================================!
  7535)    !=======================================================================================!
  7536) 
  7537) 
  7538) 
  7539) 
  7540) 
  7541) 
  7542)    !=======================================================================================!
  7543)    !=======================================================================================!
  7544)    !      This sub-routine re-sets the yearly variables.                                   !
  7545)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7546)    subroutine zero_ed_yearly_vars(cgrid)
  7547) 
  7548)       use ed_max_dims  , only : n_pft       & ! intent(in)
  7549)                               , n_dbh       ! ! intent(in)
  7550)       use ed_state_vars, only : edtype      & ! structure
  7551)                               , polygontype ! ! structure
  7552) 
  7553)       implicit none
  7554)       !------ Arguments. ------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7555)       type(edtype)     , target  :: cgrid
  7556)       !------ Local variables. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  7557)       integer                    :: ipy
  7558)       integer                    :: isi
  7559)       type(polygontype), pointer :: cpoly
  7560)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7561) 
  7562) 
  7563) 
  7564)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7565)       !     Loop over polygons.                                                            !
  7566)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7567)       do ipy = 1,cgrid%npolygons
  7568)          
  7569)          cpoly => cgrid%polygon(ipy)
  7570)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7571)          !     Loop over sites.                                                            !
  7572)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7573)          do isi = 1,cpoly%nsites
  7574)             cpoly%agb_growth        (:,:,isi) = 0.0
  7575)             cpoly%agb_mort          (:,:,isi) = 0.0
  7576)             cpoly%agb_cut           (:,:,isi) = 0.0
  7577)             cpoly%basal_area_growth (:,:,isi) = 0.0
  7578)             cpoly%basal_area_mort   (:,:,isi) = 0.0
  7579)             cpoly%basal_area_cut    (:,:,isi) = 0.0
  7580)          end do
  7581)          !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7582)       end do
  7583)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7584) 
  7585)       return
  7586)    end subroutine zero_ed_yearly_vars
  7587)    !=======================================================================================!
  7588)    !=======================================================================================!
  7589) 
  7590) 
  7591) 
  7592) 
  7593)    !=======================================================================================!
  7594)    !=======================================================================================!
  7595)    !     This function finds the intergrator for sum of squares.  This checks that the     !
  7596)    ! squared term does not cause underflow, and if it does, it flushes results to zero.    !
  7597)    ! This is very similar to sngloff.                                                      !
  7598)    !---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7599)    real(kind=4) function isqu_ftz(x)
  7600)       implicit none
  7601) 
  7602)       !----- Arguments. -------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7603)       real(kind=4), intent(in) :: x
  7604)       !----- Local variables. -------------------------------------------------------------!
  7605)       real(kind=8)             :: x8
  7606)       real(kind=8)             :: xsqu8
  7607)       !----- Local parameters. ------------------------------------------------------------!
  7608)       real(kind=8), parameter  :: off8 = 1.d-30
  7609)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7610) 
  7611) 
  7612)       !----- Convert values to double precision. ------------------------------------------!
  7613)       x8    = dble(x)
  7614)       xsqu8 = x8 * x8
  7615)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7616) 
  7617)       !----- Check whether overflow is about to happen. -----------------------------------!
  7618)       if (abs(xsqu8) < off8) then
  7619)          isqu_ftz = 0.
  7620)       else
  7621)          isqu_ftz = sngl(xsqu8)
  7622)       end if
  7623)       !------------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
  7624) 
  7625)       return
  7626)    end function isqu_ftz
  7627)    !=======================================================================================!
  7628)    !=======================================================================================!
  7629) end module average_utils
  7630) !==========================================================================================!
  7631) !==========================================================================================!
generated by
Intel(R) C++/Fortran Compiler code-coverage tool
Web-Page Owner: Nobody
